68b5(bstod tshogs): ni ma yin te/ kho bo ni ming tsam ma bzod pa'i phyir de skad du smra ba ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na don gyi nyes pa yod pa yin no// des ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ gal te lha chen po dang / khyab 'jug dag la ni ji skad
68b6(bstod tshogs): bshad pa'i nyes pa yod pas de dag ston par gyur pa ma yin no zhes smra ba ni rigs na/ tshangs pa la ni nyes pa 'ga' dang ldan pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de ni sa ma lus pa'i smyon par rigs pa yin no//
68b7(bstod tshogs): yang na 'di la nyes pa yod na smros shig ce na/ de brjod par bya ste/ yang dag par na 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin na/ nyes pa'i dri ma ma lus pa 'di la med do// zhes brjod par ltag la bya ste/
68b8(bstod tshogs): nyes pa de nyid 'di la brgya phrag yod de/ lha 'di gnyis dang tshangs pa mtshungs pa nyid du bshad de/ de yang lha mo u ma bag mar blangs pa'i tshe/ kha khyer la bskor ba byed pa na/ de'i gzugs phul du byung ba mthong
69a1(bstod tshogs): bas sems shor te brgyal zhing / tshangs pa khu ba shor bar gyur to// zhes grag la/ de nas ngo tsha bas rkang pas mnyes pas dum bu brgya phrag du mar gyes pa dang de las byis pa brtse ba zhes
69a2(bstod tshogs): bya ba'i drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu skyes par gyur to zhes bshad pa dang / tshangs pas mchog byin pa las/ sa gsum la sun d+ha dang / u pa sun d+ha zhes bya ba spun gnyis kyis shin tu gnod par byas pa dang /
69a3(bstod tshogs): de dag bsad pa'i phyir lha thams cad kyi rang gis lus kyi gzi byin gyi cha bsdus pa las theg le'i mchog ma zhes bya ba sprul la/ de ji tsam na tshangs pa la phyag byed pa na de la chags pa'i dbang gis tshangs pas
69a4(bstod tshogs): ngos bzhir gdong bzhi sprul la/ lha chen pos de'i mgo dbus mA ni bcad par gyur to zhes bya la sogs pa/ 'chol ba'i spyod pa mang du smos pa yin no// gzhan yang 'di'i ming gi rjes thogs las nyes
69a5(bstod tshogs): pa gzhan yang 'byung zhing / gzhan lung byed rnams ni das stsal pa yin nyes log pa nyid du byed pa por yang ston pa yin no nas bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag gi rmugs la nyes pa mang pa yod par bos kyi/ btsum
69a6(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni nyes pa'i dri ma 'ga' yang mnga' ba ma yin no// de yang mos ldan phongs pa las 'dod pa// 'tsho ba'i tshe na mi nus kyi// de ni 'chi nas gdon bya zhes// lha de smra ba rdzun tshig yin// /
69a7(bstod tshogs): mes ni rigs pas mi 'tshig gi/ dran na tshig ces gang smra ba// gal te tshig de bden gyur tam// 'di gnyis kyang ni de dang 'dra// bcom ldan yang ni de 'dra na// las kyi bdag nyid can mi gsung // nyi mas
69a8(bstod tshogs): sa yi gzhi lta bur// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gsal bar mdzad// 'jig rten las min 'bras mi spyod// rang gi nyon mongs kyis las bsags// dge dang mi dge 'dod mi 'dod// 'bras bskyed sa bon lta bu yin//
69b1(bstod tshogs): chos kun yongs su mkhyen pa dang // zhes pa thams cad zad pa dang // sems can kun la phan gyur pa// de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs// zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no// don 'di nyid
69b2(bstod tshogs): rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir/ gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa'o// thugs rje can zhes bya ba ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/ de yang lha'i spyan rnam par dag
69b3(bstod tshogs): pas 'jig rten ma lus pa la rgyun tu rnam par gzigs par mdzad de/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du 'jig rten rnams la gzigs par mdzad do// zhes ji skad smos pa
69b4(bstod tshogs): lta bu'o// de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba 'di dag sdug bsngal las gdon par mdzad cing / skyabs dang rten gyi dam pa yin pas de la skyabs su 'chi zhing rten par byed do zhes bya ba'i don to//
69b5(bstod tshogs): de ltar bstod pa de yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ pad+ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs kyi yon tan phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'i phyir/ ut+pal sngon po kha bye
69b6(bstod tshogs): zhing / 'dab ma rgyas pa ltar kyus ring la mdzes pa'i spyan mnga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste/ gzugs kyi sku'i dbang po'i mchog yin pa'i phyir/ spyan gyi mtshan nyid nye bar mtshon pa tsam du smos pa yin
69b7(bstod tshogs): no// de 'ba' zhig du ma zad kyi yon tan thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yang yin te/ ji ltar chu klung stong phrag du ma 'bab pa'i rten dang gnas ni rgya mtsho yin pa dang 'dra bar yon tan gyi bstod pa'i chu klung brgya stong
69b8(bstod tshogs): mang po 'byung ba'i gnas dang bzhi ni bcom ldan 'das yin la/ de lta bu'i bstod pa'i gnas su gyur pa de la tshul de ltar bstod cing bsngags pa brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig las/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing
70a1(bstod tshogs): bskyed pa cung zad ci mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces smos pa yin te/ 'dir nges par legs pa ni bde ba kha na ma
70a2(bstod tshogs): tho ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to// // skyob la lha las phul byung bar// bstod pa bdag gis rnam phye bas// 'di las bsod nams gang bsags pa// des ni
70a3(bstod tshogs): mya ngan 'das thob shog/ lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzA ran+da na'i zhal snga nas dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin
70a4(bstod tshogs): chen bzang pos sgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// !// mang+ga laM/ @#// sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes byab/ rgya gar skad du/ bud d+ha s+ya sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
70a5(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// gang gis lhun po'i tshad las lhag pa'i dbu ni rab tu byin// gang gis rgyu skar bas kyang mang ba'i brgya phrag spyan rnams kyang ni gtang // sa gzhi dang mnyam rgya mtsho lta bu'i sha dang khrag rnams kyang // de ltar dka'
70a6(bstod tshogs): ba spyod mdzad sangs rgyas bcom ldan rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// g.yo zhing 'khrug 'gro'i glog 'dra'i sems ni gang gis dbang du gnas pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mi shis rgya mtsho las ni gang gis yang
70a7(bstod tshogs): dag sgrol// srid 'joms bdud 'jig phyir du gang zhig slar yang srid par 'jug/ de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis snying rje'i sdom pa'i khur bus sems can 'don la
70a8(bstod tshogs): dgyes pa'i phyir// lha dang lha min 'jig rten gsum po'i gtso bos mi rtog rnam par spong // bkres sdug srog chags rnams la brtse ba mchog gnas gang zhig lus rab ster// de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom
70b1(bstod tshogs): ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis snying rjes 'thob pa'i sems can myur du bsgral zhing bskyab pa'i phyir// gang zhig phyugs dang nya dang ri dwags 'gro bar dgon pa'i nang du gnas//
70b2(bstod tshogs): yun ring ngal dang dub pa bzod cing lus rnams kyang ni kun tu gtong // de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sems can mang ba'i lus kyi nad la sman gyi
70b3(bstod tshogs): phyir du ni// 'gro la byams pa'am snying rje'i dbang gis mchog tu mu ge'i dgon pa ru// nags 'tshal rnams su glang chen lus rnyed gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel la sbyor// de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom
70b4(bstod tshogs): ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// mu ge'i zug du zug pa'i dus su dbu la skyes pa'i rin po che// bcad nas byin pas bram ze dang ni mi bdag la sogs gnas pa'i phyir// kun tu de bzhin
70b5(bstod tshogs): thugs kyi byed pa sla bas thams cad sems can don// de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// nags rnams so sor gnas mdzad rmi lam bzang pos yang dag smra ba
70b6(bstod tshogs): ba pan pa spyong pa byung ba d+hAg pa sa te grab sa rnams can/ ga pa drug san
70b7(bstod tshogs): rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin dang tshul khrims yon tan bzod pa'i rang bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang // shes rab rab gsung mtshungs par spyod pa'i byams dang snying rje'i yon tan
70b8(bstod tshogs): gyis// 'brog dgon gnas pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon thob cing yang dag rtogs// de ltar dga' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags ma nor rgyun pas mdzad pa'i
71a1(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa rdzogs so// // rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra'i mkhan po dpal rgyal ba'i spyan bzang po dang / shAkya'i dge slong
71a2(bstod tshogs): nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bskur ba'o// sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/ @#// chos kyi sul gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa bzhugs so// chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon
71a3(bstod tshogs): tan thun mongs ma yin pa la bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba// phrad dang bral bar dgongs pa can// mi 'bral dgongs shing
71a4(bstod tshogs): bde ba can// dgongs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrib pa kun las nges par grol// thub pas 'jig rten kun zil mnan// khyod kyi mkhyen pas shes bya khyab// sems grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
71a5(bstod tshogs): sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun// ma lus pa dag 'dul mdzad pa// nyon mongs sel ba nyon mongs pa// brtser bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lhun gyis grub cing chags mi mnga'// thogs
71a6(bstod tshogs): pa mi mda' rtag tu yang // mnyam par gzhag cing 'dri kun gyi// lan ldon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dang gnas pa bshad bya dang // tshig dang shes pa ston pa la// rtag tu blo gros mi thogs pa// /
71a7(bstod tshogs): ston mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ched du bzhud dang de dag gi/ tshig dang spyod mkhyen 'ongs pa dang // 'gro dang nges 'byung sems can la// legs 'doms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lus can kun gyis//
71a8(bstod tshogs): khyod mthong na// skyes bu mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis dad 'gyur bar// mdzad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// len dang gnas dang gtong ba dang // sprul pa dang ni bskur ba dang //
71b1(bstod tshogs): ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes la// mnga' brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs dang skyabs dang dag pa dang // nges 'byung theg pa chen po la// sems can rnams la bslu ba yi// bdud 'joms khyod la
71b2(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes dang ni spangs pa dang // nges 'byung bgegs byed ston mdzod pa// bdag gzhan don la mu stegs gzhan// mi tshugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor du che bcad gsung
71b3(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa// kun nas nyon mongs gtan spangs pa// bsrung ba mi mnga' bsnyel mi mnga'// tshogs sdud khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gshegs bzhugs kun tu rtag par yang // kun mkhyen ma lags spyod mi
71b4(bstod tshogs): mnga'// khyod ni yang dag don du na// kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa// khyod ni dus las yod mi 'da'// rtag tu 'bras bu yod mdzad pa// mi bsnyel khyod la
71b5(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten kun la gdugs zhag gcig/ lan drug tu mi gzigs mdzad pa// thugs rje tshe dang ldan pa po// pan dgongs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gshegs dang thugs su chud pa
71b6(bstod tshogs): mkhyen pa dang ni phrin las kyis// nyan thos dang ni rang sangs rgyas// kun mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub chen po'i rnam pa kun// sku gsung dag gis brnyes gyur pa// kun tu sems can thams cad kyi/
71b7(bstod tshogs): dogs gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// srib mi mnga' skyon mi mnga'// rnyog pa mi mnga' bzhugs mi mda'o// g.yo ba mo mda' chos kun la// maM smos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sprul gnas
71b8(bstod tshogs): yon tan 'di la bdag gis rab bstod pas// yon tan drug ldan su gsum po ni yongs su rdzogs par ni// bdag sogs 'gro ba rnams kyis mung du rtogs par gag/ chos kyi skul gnas pa'i yon ta
72a1(bstod tshogs): thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgyu gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na mi rba dang / shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes
72a2(bstod tshogs): bsnur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @// de can na ma da pa/ rgya gar skad du/ ta tra swAb/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur g+hur pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
72a3(bstod tshogs): thogs pa kun las rnam grol ba// kha dog bral zhing ma skyes shing // rang gi ngo bo 'jig med pa'i// su mnga' de bzhin gshegs phyag 'tshal// nyon mongs rags dang phra spangs pa// bdag gi mi mnga' sgrib pa dag
72a4(bstod tshogs): dag po yod pas stong pa'i phyir// don dam mkha' dkyil 'dra phyag 'tshal// rnam rtog sprul ni spangs pas na// ci dgyes par ni mdzad gyur pa// gter mchog de nyid rtag gzigs pa// ngan 'gro'i rgud
72a5(bstod tshogs): pa spangs phyag 'tshal// rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs// nyid kyis dgyes bdar ma byas su// 'khor dang zhi bar ro mnyam su// rnam rtog dri ma med phyag 'tshal// yang dag dgongs pas brnal mo
72a6(bstod tshogs): mnga'// gti mug bral zhing spangs pas bzhugs// rtag tu de nyid ma bsal ba// rang bzhin mkhas pas shar phyag 'tshal// bsam gtan tshes grangs yongs rdzogs pas// mi rnams dga' ba skyed
72a7(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa// rnam grol zla ba yid 'ong ba// lhan rab rib sel phyag 'tshal// dngos po dngos med gnyis 'das nas// rtog pa'i dri ma las grol ba// rtsen dor med de sa mnyam gnas// spros mi mnga' la phyag
72a8(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// dri med chu rlabs bde ba'i rgyu// ma lus srog chags mtsho mdzad pa// che zhing mtha' med tshad dang bral// de nyid rgya mtsho che phyag 'tshal// legs spyad du ma rgyas thob pa// dpe med ro nam
72b1(bstod tshogs): yid la 'bab// rga shes 'jigs pa med mdzad pa// de nyid bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal// rang gi yid la brtan ldan yang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug tshangs dbang dang // lha dang drang srong thabs med pa// thabs de
72b2(bstod tshogs): skad cig brnyes phyag 'tshal// dri med rin thang mnyam med pa// ngo bos 'dod rnams yongs rdzogs mdzad// bsod nams bsags pas dmigs gyur pa// yid bzhin byang chub sems phyag 'tshal//
72b3(bstod tshogs): srid pa'i 'khor bas yongs dub pa'i// mchog tu lta ba bde ba'i gnas// byang chub yan lag me tog ldan// zhi ba'i dpag bsam shing phyag 'tshal// shes bya shes med gnyis med cing // phra sbom dbye ba
72b4(bstod tshogs): rnams las grol// sna tshogs dpe lngas 'das gyur pa// tshig gis brjod mi nus phyag 'tshal// rtag tu rgyal zhing bsnyems mi mnga'// gzhan stobs 'joms byed mdud pa med// gnyis su med
72b5(bstod tshogs): skya bsam mi khyab// gcig dpa' srid pa 'joms phyag 'tshal// bye brag med par dbang 'gyur zhing // dngos tshogs skad cig la bsregs pa// shin tu drag pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rab 'bar
72b6(bstod tshogs): de nyid me phyag 'tshal// 'di ltar yang dag bstod pa las// bdag gis dge ba gang thob pa'i// bsod nams des ni 'gro ba ma lus zad 'gyur zhing // sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal dag dang/
72b7(bstod tshogs): bral gyur pa// bde ba dang ldan sgrib med mya ngan 'das thob shog/ de kho na nyid la bstod pa// / shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu shrI
72b8(bstod tshogs): b+ha dra dang / dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam gtan phyin ci log gis ci zhig dgongs mdzad skad cig legs
73a1(bstod tshogs): par spyan dbye gzigs// lus med mda' yis gzer ba'i skye bo bdag cag skyob pas kyang ni bsrung bar mi mdzad na// thugs rje ldan pa phyin ci log gyur khyod las mchog tu ma rung skyes
73a2(bstod tshogs): bu gzhan ma mchis// phrag dog ldan pa bdud kyi bud med de skad smras yang rgyal ba skyob pa byang chub gyur// gzhan yang 'dod dbang gis ni kun tu gzhu ba kang bdud gzhan lag pa myur ba pa Ta ha sgra 'jebs
73a3(bstod tshogs): dang ldan// dpa' bo smin ma bskyod dang nyer g.yo lta bur sgeg dang 'dzum dang rol pa maud rnams kyis// thub dbang skyob pa byang chub ma bsnyes bar du bsam gtan las ni bskyod mi nus pa mthong gyur nas//
73a4(bstod tshogs): ngo mtshar gyur pas ba spu langs pa'i lus kyis grub pa rnams dang yan lag mchog rnams 'dud// ral pa 'khrugs shing lce rnams g.yo gsal kun tu bltams pas gang gi thugs rnams 'khrul par ma gyur
73a5(bstod tshogs): cing // rab gsal 'dod lha'i bdud rnams rtse mo mchog dag lag thogs glang po rta rnams gdong ldan seng ge dang // stag gi gdong rnams rtsa bzhin grangs med gyur pa 'khor ba yis ni gang zhig brnyengs par
73a6(bstod tshogs): ma gyur pa// de ni kun la gnod pa'i rnam pa 'dres pa med par skyob pa sangs rgyas thub dbang 'jig rten mgon// bdud btul ba la bstod pa// rab dga'i lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// 5// mang+ga laM//
73a7(bstod tshogs): chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa/ rgya gar skad du/ d+harma d+hA tu sto tra/ bod skad du/ chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig kun tu ma shes
73a8(bstod tshogs): na// srid pa gsum du rnam 'khor ba// sems can kun la nges gnas pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa// de nyid sbyang ba byas pa las// dag pa de nyid mya ngan 'das
73b1(bstod tshogs): chos kyi sku yang de nyid do// ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres pas// mar gyi snying po mi snang ba// de bzhin nyon mongs dang 'dres pas// chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo // ji ltar 'o ma rnams sbyangs pas// mar gyi
73b2(bstod tshogs): snying po dri med 'gyur// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams sbyang pas// chos dbyings shin tu dri med 'gyur// ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas// cung zhig snang bar mi 'gyur ba/ de bzhin nyon mongs bum nang gnas//
73b3(bstod tshogs): chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo // phyogs ni gang dang gang dag nas// bum pa bug gtod gyur pa// de dang de yi phyogs nyid nas// 'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur// gang tshe ting 'dzin rdo rje yis/
73b4(bstod tshogs): bum pa de ni bcug gyur pa// de tshe de ni nam mkha' yi// mthar thug par du snang bar byed// chos kyi dbyings ni skye ma yin// nam yang 'gag par 'gyur ba med// dus rnams kun tu nyon mongs med// thog ma bar mtha' dri ma bral//
73b5(bstod tshogs): ji ltar rin chen bai DUr+ya// dus rnams kun tu 'od gsal yang // rdo yi nang na gnas gyur na// de yi 'od ni gsal ma yin// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pa'i// chos dbyings shin tu dri med pa'ang //
73b6(bstod tshogs): 'khor bar 'od ni gsal ma yin// mya ngan 'das na 'od gsal 'gyur// khams yod na ni las byas pas// sa le sbram dag mthong bar 'gyur// khams med par ni las byas na'ang // nyon mongs 'ba' zhig
73b7(bstod tshogs): skyed par zad// ji ltar spun pas g.yogs gyur pas// so ba 'bras bu mi 'dod ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pas// de nas sangs rgyas zhes mi brtag/ ji ltar sbun pa las grol na//
73b8(bstod tshogs): 'bram nyid snang bar 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs las grol na// chos kyi sku nyid rab tu gsal// chu shing snying po med do zhes// 'jig rten na ni dbar byed kyang // de yi 'bras bu snying po nyid//
74a1(bstod tshogs): mngar po za bar byed pa ltar// snying po med pa'i 'khor ba las// nyon mongs gzib dang bral gyur na// de yi 'bras bu snying po nyid// lus can kun gyi bdud rtsir gyur// de bzhin sa bon
74a2(bstod tshogs): thams cad las// rgya dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung // sa bon med par 'bras yod par// shes ldan gang gis bsgrub par nus// sa bon gyur pa khams de nyid// chos rnams kun gyi rten du 'dod// rim
74a3(bstod tshogs): gyis sbyangs par gyur pa las// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par 'gyur// dri med nyi ma zla ba yang // sprin dang du ba khug rna dang // sgra gcan gdong dang rdul la sogs// sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par 'gyur
74a4(bstod tshogs): de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems// 'dod dang gnod sems le lo dang // rgod pa dang ni the tshom ste// sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par 'gyur// ji ltar me yis dag pa'i gos// sna tshogs dri mas dri ma can//
74a5(bstod tshogs): ji ltar me yi nang bcug na// dri ma tshig 'gyur gos min ltar// de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems// 'dod chags la sogs dri ma can// ye shes me yis dri ma sreg/ de nyid 'od gsal ma yin no// stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo//
74a6(bstod tshogs): rgyal bas ji snyed gsungs pa gang // de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog/ khams de nyams par byed ma yin// sa yi nang na gnas pa'i chu// dri ma med par gnas pa ltar// nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang // /
74a7(bstod tshogs): daMbanan rjepa me gnas/ sa dang+yas gang myeng bdag pa yi/ 'a bye pa yin skyes pa ma// gzung btsun pastan mal pa// ba dag ces brtag par bya// sa pa med pa 'tshas
74a8(bstod tshogs): bud med skyes pa dmigs ma yin// 'dod chags kyis gdungs gdul bya'i phyir// bud med skyes pa shes rab bstan// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa zhes// bya ba gsum pos sems sbyong byed// mchog tu sems
74b1(bstod tshogs): ni spyong byed pa'i// chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin// ji ltar sum ma'i ljon bu// yod kyang mthong ba ma yin pa// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong ma yin// bdag dang
74b2(bstod tshogs): bdog gi rnam rtog dang // ming gi 'du shes rgyu mtshan gyis// rnam rtog bzhi po 'byung ba yang // 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pas so// sangs rgyas rnams kyi smon lam yang // snang ba med cing mtshan
74b3(bstod tshogs): nyid med// so sor rang rig sbyor ldan nyid// sangs rgyas rtag pa'i chos nyid can// ji ltar ri bong mgo bo'i rwa// btags pa nyid de med pa ltar// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang // btags
74b4(bstod tshogs): pa nyid de yod ma yin// phra rab rdul gyi ngo bo yis// glang gi rwa yang yod ma yin// ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis de bzhin// de la ci zhig brtag par bya// brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang // brten nas 'gag
74b5(bstod tshogs): par 'gyur bas na// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// byis pas ji ltar rtogs par byed// ri bong ba lang rwa yi dpes// ji ltar bde gshegs chos rnams nyid// dbu ma nyid du sgrub par byed// ji ltar
74b6(bstod tshogs): nyi zla skar ma'i gzugs// dang ba'i snod kyi chu nang du// gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ba ltar// mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'ang de dang 'dra// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// bslu ba med cing brtan
74b7(bstod tshogs): pa yi// gang zhig de ltar bdag med la// ji ltar bdag dang bdag gir brtag/ ji ltar sos ka'i dus su chu// dro bos nyes ni brjod par byed// de nyid grang ba'i dus su ni// grang ngo zhes ni brjod pa yin//
74b8(bstod tshogs): nyon mongs dra bas g.yogs pa na// sems can zhes ni brjod par bya// de nyid nyon mongs bral gyur na// sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod par bya// mig dang gzugs la brten nas ni// dri ma med pa'i spang ba 'thung //
75a1(bstod tshogs): skye med 'gag pa med nyid las// chos kyi dbyings ni rab tu shes// sgra dang rna ba la brten nas// rnam par dag pa'i shes pa gsum// mtshan nyid med pa chos kyi dbyings// rtog dang
75a2(bstod tshogs): bcas pas thos par 'gyur// sna dang dril brten nas snom// de ni gzugs su med pa'i dpe// de bzhin sku yi rnam shes kyis// chos kyi dbyings la rtog par byed// lce yi rang bzhin stong pa nyid// ro yi khams
75a3(bstod tshogs): kyang dben pa ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo yis// rnam par shes pa gnas med pa// dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo dang // reg bya'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dag/ rkyen dag las ni grol gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings zhes
75a4(bstod tshogs): brjod par bya// yid gtsor gyur pa'i chos rnams la// rtog dang brtag pa rnam spangs nas// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid// chos kyi dbyings su bsgom par bya// mthong dang thos dang bsnams pa dang /
75a5(bstod tshogs): myangs dang reg par gyur pa dang // chos rnams de ltar rnal 'byor pas// shes nas mtshan nyid rdzogs pa yin// mig dang rna ba sna dag dang // lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// skye mched drug po rnam dag
75a6(bstod tshogs): pa// 'di nyid de nyid mtshad nyid do// sems nyid rnam pa gnyis su mtho// ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das// bdag tu 'dzin las 'khor ba ste// so sor rig na de nyid do// 'dod chags zad pas mya ngan
75a7(bstod tshogs): 'das// zhe sdang gti mug zad pa dang // de dag 'gags pas sangs rgyas nyid// lus can kun gyi skyabs nyid do// shes dang mi shes pa dag las// lus 'di nyid las thams cad de// rang gi rnam par
75a8(bstod tshogs): rtog pas bcings// bdag nyid shes nas grol bar 'gyur// byang chub ring min nye ba'ang min// 'gro min 'ong ba'ang ma yin zhing // nyon mongs gzeb gyur 'di nyid la// mthong ba dang ni ma mthong yin/
75b1(bstod tshogs): shes rab mar me la gnas nas// mchog tu zhi bar gyur pa yis// bdag la rtag par gnas bya zhes// mdo sde'i tshogs las gsungs pa lags// stobs bcu'i stobs kyis byas pa rnams//
75b2(bstod tshogs): byin brlabs zla ba tshes pa bzhin// nyon mongs can gyi sems can gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo // ji ltar yi dwags rnams kyis ni// rgya mtsho bskams par mthong ba ltar// de bzhin//
75b3(bstod tshogs): mi shes pas bsgribs pas// sangs rgyas rnams ni med par btags// dman pa bsod nams dman pa la// bcom ldan 'das kyis ci bgyir mchis// ji ltar dmus long lag pa ru/
75b4(bstod tshogs): rin chen mchog ni bzhag pa 'dra// sems can bsod nams byas rnams la// 'od kyis gsal zhing dpal ldan pa'i// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'bar ba// sangs rgyas de yi mdun na gnas// mgon
75b5(bstod tshogs): po de yi gzugs kyi sku// bskal pa mang por bzhugs nas ni// gdul bya rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// dbyings nyid tha dad gyur pa lags// sems kyi yul ni nges rtogs nas// der ni shes pa 'jug/
75b6(bstod tshogs): par 'gyur// so so rang rig rnams dag na// sa rnams de yi bdag nyid gnas// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas mchog dang // 'og min nyid de rnam mdzes pa// shes pa gsum po gcig nyid du// /
75b7(bstod tshogs): 'dres par gyur la bdag smra'o// byis pa'i nang na kun mkhyen dang // 'phags pa'i nang na sna tshogs nyid// dbang phyug chen po tshe dpag med// bskal pa tshe yi rgyu gang yin// phyi rol sems can
75b8(bstod tshogs): mkhas kyi yang // dpag tu med pa'i bskal par ni// tshe yang gang gis bsrungs gyur cing // srog chags kun gyi srog gnas pa'i// rku yang mi zad pa de nyid// gang gis 'bras bu mi zad gang //
76a1(bstod tshogs): snang ba med pa'i bye brag gis// shes rab don du rab tu 'jug/ byang chub ring bar mi bsam zhing // nye bar yang ni bsam mi bya// yul drug snang ba med par ni// yang dag ji bzhin
76a2(bstod tshogs): rig gyur pa'o// ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres chu// snod gcig la ni gnas pa las// ngang pas 'o ma 'thung byed cing // chu ni ma yin de bzhin gnas// de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs nas// ye shes
76a3(bstod tshogs): lus 'dir gcig gnas kyang // rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes len// mi shes pa ni 'dor bar byed// bdag dang bdag gi zhes 'dzin pas// ji srid phyi rol rnam btags pa// bdag med rnam pa gnyis
76a4(bstod tshogs): mthong nas// srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par 'gyur// gang phyir sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das// gtsang ba rtag pa dge ba'i gzhi// dag phyir gnyis ni byis pas btags// de yi gnyis med rnal
76a5(bstod tshogs): 'byor gnas// dka' spyod sna tshogs sbyin pa dang // tshul khrims sems can don sdud dang // sems can phan byed bzod pa ste// gsum po 'di yis khams rgyas 'gyur// chos rnams
76a6(bstod tshogs): kun la brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan la sems 'jug pa dang // rtag tu shes rab brtan pa ste// de yang byang chub rgyas byed yin// thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab dang // smon lam
76a7(bstod tshogs): rnam par sbyangs pa dang // stobs la nges gnas ye shes te// khams rgyas byed pa'i chos bzhi po// byang chub sems phyag mi bya zhes// smra ba ngan pa smra ba ste// byang chub sems dpa' ma byung bar// /
76a8(bstod tshogs): chos kyi sku ni 'byung ma yin// bur shing sa bon la sdang gang // kha ra spyad par 'dod pa de// bur shing sa bon med par ni// khar 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin// bur shing sa bon gang bsrungs nas//
76b1(bstod tshogs): nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las// b+har mkhar thags rnams ni// de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ltar// byang chub sems ni rab bsrungs nas// nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las// dgra bcom rkyen
76b2(bstod tshogs): rtogs sangs rgyas rnams// de las skye ning 'byung bar 'gyur// dzaM wAr sA l+la'i sa bon stsogs// zhing pas bsrung bar byed pa ltar// de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams le// badren pa rnams kyis bsrung ba
76b3(bstod tshogs): mdzad// ji ltar bar ro bcu bzhil// zlabacung zhig mthong ba ltar// de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams la 'a // sangs rgyas sma ni cung zad snang // ji ltar chos pa'i zla ba la// skad cig sad cig/
76b4(bstod tshogs): rgyas par mthong // de bzhin ma la zhugs rnams kyang // rim gyis rim gyis rgyas par mthong // ji ltar yar ro'i bco lnga la// zla ba rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin sa yi mthar thug na// chos kyis
76b5(bstod tshogs): yang rdzogs shing gsal// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bos pa brtan po yis// sems de yang dag bskyed byas nas// phyir mi ldog pa yang yang 'byung // nag po'i gzhini yongs
76b6(bstod tshogs): spangs nas// dkar po'i gzhi ni rab bzung bas// de tshe de ni nges rtogs pa// dga' ba zhes ni mngon par brjod// 'dod chags la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// dri mas rtag tu dri ma can// dri ma med pas
76b7(bstod tshogs): ga drug pa/ rjem med ces brjod pa yin// nyon ljongs dra ba rab gags nas// dri med shes rab byugs labs// s+yAd me d+hApa y-i sra pa dag/ sel bar byed papa 'di byu pa'o// rtag tudrug
76b8(bstod tshogs): pa'i 'od kyis gsal// 'du 'jo rnam par spangs pa yi// ye shes 'od kyis rab bskor pas// sa de 'od 'phro can du 'dod// rig dang sku rtsal bzog nas kun// bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs
77a1(bstod tshogs): nyid// nyon mongs shin tu sbyang dka' las// rnam par rgyal bas sbyang dkar 'dod// byang chub rnam pa gsum po dang // phun sum tshogs kun bsdu ba dang // skye dang 'jig pa
77a2(bstod tshogs): zab pa la// sa de mngon du gyur par 'dod// 'khor lo'i bkod pas rnam kun tu// 'od kyi dra bas rtse ba dang // 'khor ba'i mtsho yi 'dam brgal bas// de la ring du song zhes bya// sangs rgyas kyis
77a3(bstod tshogs): nges 'di bzung zhing // ye shes rgya mtshor zhugs pa dang // 'bad med lhun gyis grub gyur pas// bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi g.yo ba'o// so so yang dag rig kun la// chos ston pa yi 'bel ba'i gtam/
77a4(bstod tshogs): rnal 'byor pa de mthar son pas// sA de legs pa'i blo gros 'dod// ye shes rang bzhin 'di yi sku// dri med nam mkha' dang mnyam pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzin pa las// chos kyi sman na
77a5(bstod tshogs): kun du 'byung // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi gnas// spyod pa'i 'bras bu yongs 'dzin pas// gnas ni yongs su gyur pa de// chos kyi sku nas brjod pa yin// bag chags las grol bas/
77a6(bstod tshogs): mi khyab// 'khor ba'i bag chags bsam du yod// khyod ni kun tu bsam mi khyab// gang gis khyod ni shes par nus// ngag gi spyod yul kun las 'das// dbang po kun gyi spyod yul min//
77a7(bstod tshogs): yid kyi shes pas rtogs bya ba// gang yang rlung la phyag 'tsha la bstod// rim gyis 'jug pa'i lugs nyid kyis// sangs rgyas sras po grags chen rnams// chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes kyis// chos nyid stong
77a8(bstod tshogs): pa mthong gyur nas// pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis// gang tshe sems ni rab bkrus pas// 'khor ba'i gzeb las 'das gyur nas// pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyi// spyan la de ni rab gnas 'gyur/
77b1(bstod tshogs): 'dab ma rin chen du ma'i 'od// 'dod par bya ba'i ze'u 'bru can// pad+ma bye ba du ma yis// rnam pa kun tu yongs su bskor// stobs bcu po yis yongs su gang // mi 'jigs pa yis yang dag ngoms/
77b2(bstod tshogs): bsam mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas chos// spros med rnams las nyams mi mnga'// legs par spyod pa'i las kun gyis// bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i// zla ba zha la skar ma yis//
77b3(bstod tshogs): 'khor du rnam pa kun gyis bskor// sangs rgyas phyag gi nyi ma der// dri med rin chen 'bar gyur des// sras kyi thu bo dbang bskur bas// dbang bskur ba ni kun tu stsol// rnal 'byor chen po der gnas
77b4(bstod tshogs): nas// rmongs pas dman pa'i 'jig rten rnams// sdug bsngal gyis g.yengs 'jigs pa la// lha yi spyan gyis gzigs gyur nas// de yi skul 'od zer rnams// 'bad pa med par 'byung 'gyur te//
77b5(bstod tshogs): rnaMs pa'i na par drugs de // rnams byed pa med pa lku/ ga panas m+b+ha na 'das pa rnams// b+hag pa na 'das par / 'd-i mdun 'das pa'i// rjem ming bya
77b6(bstod tshogs): gyur pa'o// sems can kun gyi dngos med pa'i// ngo bo de yang de'i spyod yul// de mthong byang chub sems dpa'o// shin tu dri med chos kyi sku// dri ma med pa'i chos sprul// ye shes rgya mtsho gnas
77b7(bstod tshogs): gyur nas// sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du// de bas sems can don rnams mdzad// chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sbubs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
77b8(bstod tshogs): rgyagar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paSh+Thi ta dang / lo tshwa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// / @#// dpe med par bston pa/ rgya gar skad du/ ni rU pa masta pa/ bod skad du/ dpe med
78a1(bstod tshogs): par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig lta bas phongs pa yi// 'jig rten 'di la phan brtson khyod// dngos po med pa'i don rig pas//
78a2(bstod tshogs): dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// gang zhig khyod kyi cung zhig kyang // sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs pa// khyod kyi gzigs pa bla med de// de nyid don ni rig pa lags// don dam pa yi yod pa
78a3(bstod tshogs): nyid// rtogs dang rtogs bya mi mnga' zhing // e ma ho mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i// chos nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs// khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing // chos rnams bkag pa'
78a4(bstod tshogs): ma lags la// mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba yis// bla na med pa'i go 'phang brnyes// 'khor ba spangs par gyur pa yis// mya ngan 'das khyod mi bzhed kyis// 'khor ba ma dmigs pa nyid kyi/
78a5(bstod tshogs): ni de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs// khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam byung ro gcig gyur rig pas// chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med pa// kun tu rnam par dag par gyur// gtso bo khyod
78a6(bstod tshogs): kyi gang zhig tu// yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs pa// gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus pa// chos kyi char gyis tshim pa'ang mdzad// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' khyod// phung po khams dang skye mched la
78a7(bstod tshogs): chags par gyur pa mi mnga' bas// chos rnams kun la brten ma lags// mgon khyod sems can 'du shes kyis// 'jug pa kun tu mi mnga' yang // sdug bsngal grur pa'i sems can la// snying rje
78a8(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid gyur pa'ang khyod// bde dang sdug bsngal de gyur pa// rtag mi rtag sogs las gtso khyod// de lta'i rnam rtog sna tshogs kyis// thugs ni chags par gyur ma lags// chos rnams/
78b1(bstod tshogs): gang du'ang 'gro 'ong med// de bzhin khyod kyi gshegs pa'ang lags// 'ga' ru spangs pa'ang ma lags la// de bzhin don dam rig pa'ang lags// kun gyi rjes su zhugs gyur kyang // 'ga' ru
78b2(bstod tshogs): 'byung yang ma lags la// skye dang chos dang skra rnams kyang // thub chen khyod kyi bsam mi khyab// gcig dang gzhan pa rnams spangs pa// brag cha lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams// 'pho dang 'jig pa
78b3(bstod tshogs): rnams spangs par// smad pa med par khyod kyis rtogs// rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing // mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam spangs par// gtso bos rmi lam sku sogs bzhin// 'khor ba nges par rtogs pa
78b4(bstod tshogs): lags// bag rtags ga byung mthar thug pa'i// byed kyis nyon mongs sdig pa spangs// nyon mongs nyid kyi rang bzhin yang // khyod kyi bdun kyi nyid du bsgrubs// dpa' ba kyang kyag nas
78b5(bstod tshogs): rnams kyi// mtshan ma med mthong gzugs med bzhin// mtshan gyis 'bar ba'i sku nyid kyang // gzugs su spyod yul nyid du mthong // gzugs su mthong bas mthong min kyang // mthong ngo zhes ni rjod
78b6(bstod tshogs): par byed// chos mthong bas ni shin tu mthong // chos nyid mthong ba ma yin no// khong stong khyod kyi skul med// sha dang rus pa khrag kyang med// nam mkha'i dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du// khyod kyi sku ni ston par
78b7(bstod tshogs): mdzad// sku la snyun med rus pa'ang med// bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang // khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir// 'jig rten spyod pa'ang bsten par mdzad// las kyi sgrib pa'i skyon rnams kyang /
78b8(bstod tshogs): sdig med khyod kyi kun spangs kyang // khyod kyi sems can rjes 'jug phyir// las spangs pa yang rab tu bstan// chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir// gtso bo theg dbye ma mchis kyang // khyod kyis theg pa/
79a1(bstod tshogs): / gsum bstan pa// sems can gzhug pa'i ched du lags// rtag cing brtan la zhi ba yi// chos kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku// rgyal bas gdul bya dgrol ba'i phyir// khyod kyis mya
79a2(bstod tshogs): ngan 'das par bstan// grangs med 'jig rten khams rnams su// 'das dang bltams dang mngon byang chub// 'khor ba zar par mos rnams kyi// khyod la gus rnams kyis kyang mthong //
79a3(bstod tshogs): mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing // rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga' yang // khyod kyis ngang gis 'jig rten la// sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur// de ltar bde bar gshegs pa bsam mi
79a4(bstod tshogs): khyab me tog/ gis brgyan pa las bdag gi bsod nams gang thob par// gyur pa 'dis ni sems can ma lus pa 'di dag/ mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig/ dpe med par
79a5(bstod tshogs): bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// // mad+hA laM/ @#// 'ang nyin pa das par ya /
79a6(bstod tshogs): rgyagar skad du/ lo kA dz+dza ti swa pa/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dben pa'i ye shes rig gyur pa// 'jig rten 'das
79a7(bstod tshogs): khyod phyag 'tshal 'dud// gang khyod 'gro la phan pa'i phyir// yul ring thugs rjes ral bar gyur// phung po tsam las grol ba yi// sems can med par khyod bzhed la// sems can don la'ang mchog
79a8(bstod tshogs): gzhol bar// thub pa chen po khyod nyid bzhugs// blo ldan khyod kyi phung de'ang // snum smig chu dri za yi// grong khyer rmi lam ji bzhin du// blo ldan rnams la rab tu bstan// gang dag tshu las byung ba rnams
79b1(bstod tshogs): de med par ni yod min pas// gzugs brnyan nyid dang mtshungs pa ru// gsal bar ci yi phyir mi 'dod// 'byung ba mig gi gzugs min pas// de dngos mig gi ji ltar yin// gzugs/
79b2(bstod tshogs): nyid gzung bar rab bkag pa// gzugs nyid khyod kyis de ltar gsungs// tshor bya med par de med pas// tshor ba nyid ni bdag med pas// tshor ba de yang rang bzhin gyis// yod pa med par khyod/
79b3(bstod tshogs): nyid bzhed// ming dang don dag tha dad min// me yis kha nyid 'tshig par 'gyur// gzhan na'ang rtogs pa mid 'gyur zhes// bden pa gsung ba khyod kyis bstan// byed po rang dbang las nyid
79b4(bstod tshogs): kyang // tha snyad du ni khyod kyis bstan// phan tshun bltos pa can nyid du// grub par khyod ni bzhed pa lags// byed po yod min spyod pa'ang med// bsod nams de min rten 'brel skyes//
79b5(bstod tshogs): brten nas skyes kyang ma skyes zhes// tshig gi bdag po khyod kyis gsungs// shes pa med par shes pa min// de med rnam par shes pa'ang med// de phyir shes dang shes bya dag/ rang dngos med// /
79b6(bstod tshogs): ces khyod kyis gsungs// mtshan nyid mtshon bya gzhan nyid ni// mtshon bya mtshan nyid med par 'gyur// tha dad min na'ang de med par// khyod kyis gsal po nyid du bstan// mtshan nyid
79b7(bstod tshogs): mtshon bya rnam bral zhing // tshig gis brjod pa rnam spangs par// khyod kyis ye shes spyan nyid kyis// 'gro ba 'di dag zhi bar mdzad// dngos po yod pa nyid mi skye// med pa'ang ma yin yod/
79b8(bstod tshogs): med min// bdag las ma yin gzhan las min// gnyis min skye ba ji lta bu// yod pa gnas par rigs 'gyur gyi// 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no// med pa mi gnas par rig pas/
80a1(bstod tshogs): 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no// re zhig zhig pa'i rgyu las kyang // 'bras bu 'byung bar mi rigs la// ma zhig las min rmi lam dang // 'dra ba'i skye ba khyod nyid bzhed// zhig dang
80a2(bstod tshogs): ma zhig pa dag gis// rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba dag/ sgyu ma 'byung ba bzhin du 'byung // kun kyang de bzhin khyod kyis bsrungs// de phyir khyod kyis 'gro 'di dag/ yongs su brtags pa las byung bar//
80a3(bstod tshogs): kun tu shes bya 'byung ba na'ang // skye ba med cing 'gag med gsungs// rtag la 'khor ba yod ma yin// mi rtag pa la'ang 'khor ba med// de nyid rig pa'i mchog khyod kyis// 'khor ba rmi lam 'dra bar
80a4(bstod tshogs): gsungs// sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang // gzhan gyis byas dang gnyis kas byas// rgyu med par ni rtog ge 'dod// khyod kyi rten nas 'byung bar gsungs// rten cing 'brel par gang byung ba//
80a5(bstod tshogs): de nyid khyod ni spong par bzhed// dngos po rang dbang yod min zhes// mnyam med khyod kyi seng ge'i snga// kun rtog thams cad spangs pa'i phyir// stong nyid bdud rtsi ston mdzad na// gang zhig de la zhen
80a6(bstod tshogs): gyur pa// de nyid khyod kyis shin tu smad// bems po gzhan dbang stong pa nyid// sgyu ma bzhin du rkyen 'byung bar// mgon po khyod kyis chos kun gyi// dngos med goms par mdzad pa lags// /
80a7(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing // 'ga' yang bkag pa ma mchis la// sngon gyi ji ltar phyis de bzhin// de bzhin nyid ni thugs su chud// 'phags pa rnams kyi brten pa yi// bsgoms ma
80a8(bstod tshogs): zhugs par mtshan med 'di// rnam par shes par 'gar 'gyur ram// mtshan ma med la ma zhugs par// thar pa med ces gsungs pa'i phyir// de phyir khyod kyis theg chen rnams// ma lus par ni
80b1(bstod tshogs): de nyid bstan// bstod pa'i snod khyod bstod pa las// bdag gi bsod nams gang thob pa// des ni 'gro ba ma lus rnams// mtshan ma'i 'ching las grol gyur cig/ 'jig rten las 'das par
80b2(bstod tshogs): bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrisas rgyal bas bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
80b3(bstod tshogs): sems kyi rje'i bsod pa/ rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta badz+ra sta ba/ bod skad du/ sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis sems byung dra ba ni// sems
80b4(bstod tshogs): nyid kyi ni bsal mdzad de// sems kyi rmongs pa sel ba yi// rang sems de la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can mos pa sna tshogs rnams// tha dad lha yi dmigs pa la// rin chen sems ni rnam grol las/
80b5(bstod tshogs): lha gzhan bsgrub tu yod ma yin// rim thob pa ni byang chub ste// sems ni 'gro ba lnga po yin// bde dang sdug bsngal mtshan nyid dag/ sems las ma gtogs cung zad med// 'gro ba kun gyis mthong ba rnams//
80b6(bstod tshogs): cung zad bsgom pa'i rnam pa yang // de kun sems kyi dra ba ru// de nyid gsung bas bstan pa yin// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i sems// rnam par rtog pas sgo byas pa'i// 'khor ba rnam rtog tsam nyid de// rnam rtog
80b7(bstod tshogs): med pa thar pa yin// de bas kun gyis 'bad pa yis// byang chub sems la phyag bya'o// sems kyi rdo rje'i bsgom pa'i phyir// de ni byang chub mchog ces bya// khams bskyed sems ni lus kyis bcings// sems med
80b8(bstod tshogs): khams ni khed par 'jug/ de phyir sems ni kun tu bsrung // bde legs sems la sangs rgyas 'byung / sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // mang+ga laM/
81a1(bstod tshogs): don dam par bstod pa/ rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma bAr+tha sta ba/ bod skad du/ don dam par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// skye ba med cing gnas med la// 'jig rten
81a2(bstod tshogs): dpe las shin tu 'das// ngag gis brjod pa'i spyod yul min// mgon khyod ji ltar brjod par bgyi// de ltar na yang gang 'dra bas// de bzhin nyid don spyod yul gyi// 'jig rten btags pa la gnas nas
81a3(bstod tshogs): gus pa chen pos bdag gis bstod// skye ba med pa'i ngo bo yis// khyod la skye ba yongs mi mnga'// mgon khyod gshegs dang byon mi mnga'// dngos mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med ma
81a4(bstod tshogs): lags dngos ma lags// chad pa ma lags rtag ma lags// mi rtag ma lags rtag ma lags// gnyis mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dmar dang ljang dang bcod mdog min// ser dang nag dang dkar ma lags//
81a5(bstod tshogs): khyod la kha dog yongs mi dmigs// mdog mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chen po ma lags chung ma lags// ring dang zlum pas ma lags la// tshad med pa yi dngos brnyes pa// tshad mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal
81a6(bstod tshogs): 'dud// ring min nye ba ma lags shing // nam mkha' ma lags sam lags// 'khor min mya ngan 'das ma lags// gnas mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas// chos kyi dbyings
81a7(bstod tshogs): kyi dngos gyur cing // mchog tu zab pa nyid brnyes pas// zab mo khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// de lta'i bstod pas bstod bgyi 'am// yang na 'di ni ci zhig bstod// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// gang la
81a8(bstod tshogs): bstod cing gang gis bstod// skye dang 'jig pa rnams spangs shing // gang la mtha' dang dbus med la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ma mchis pas// 'dir ni khyod bstod nus pa gang // gshegs dang byon pa mi mda'
81b1(bstod tshogs): zhing // 'gro spangs bde bar gshegs bstod pas// bsod nams des ni 'jig rten rnams// pade gshegs gnas su 'gro bar shog/ don dam par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
81b2(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtar la phab pa'o// / @#// su gsum la bstod pa zhes kyab/ rgya gar skad du/ kA ya tri ya sto tra nA pa/
81b3(bstod tshogs): bod skad du/ sku gsum la bstod pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa/
81b4(bstod tshogs): dngos min dngos po med pa ma yin mkha' ltar ro gcig rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can// gos pa med cing mi 'gyur zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa can te spros med pa// so so rang rig rgyal ba
81b5(bstod tshogs): rnams kyi chos sku dpe med gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal// rang gi 'byor pa 'jig rten las 'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu ni// blo can rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed phyir
81b6(bstod tshogs): 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs rgyas par ston mdzad cing // rtag tu dam pa chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu 'phro bar mdzad pa po// sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal srid gnas pa gang yin de
81b7(bstod tshogs): la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing // la la ru ni rdzogs par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi bar gang snang la// sna tshogs thabs
81b8(bstod tshogs): tshul rnams kyi rnam pa du mar 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba// phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can don gcig
82a1(bstod tshogs): rgyun tu mdzad cing bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsum yid dang tshig gi lam las rab tu 'das pa la// bdag gi dang
82a2(bstod tshogs): pas phyag byas dge ba byang chub sa bon bsags par gyur pa gang yin des// swA / sum thob nas 'gro ba 'di dag ma lus byang chub lam la nges par 'jug par shog/ sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba
82a3(bstod tshogs): slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
82a4(bstod tshogs): sugasusapa rgyad pa zhes kya 'i dam par 'tsha pa/ rgya gar skad du/ kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma s+ya bi ba ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal
82a5(bstod tshogs): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid chen po'i sku gsum gyi// bstod pa klu sgrub gyis mdzad pa// gzhan gyis gsol bas bskul bas na// ji ltar bkod pa rnam par dbye// de la gcig min du ma
82a6(bstod tshogs): ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyi brjod par bya ba dang / dgos pa dang / 'brel pa dang / dgos pa'i yang dgos pa brjod par bya ste/ gang gi phyir brjod pa dang / dgos pa dang /
82a7(bstod tshogs): 'brel pa med pa dag la ni so sor rtog pa sngon du gtong ba dag len par mi 'gyur ro// de'i phyir 'dir ci zhig 'chad par 'gyur zhes 'di la yang dag par rmongs pa dag dran pa 'jug par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya ba bshad do// /
82a8(bstod tshogs): bshad pa don med par rtog pa dag nges par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dgos pa bstan to// thabs med par dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir 'brel pa bshad de/ gzhan du na thabs med pa dag la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur//
82b1(bstod tshogs): de la 'dir sku gsum ni brjod par bya ba'o// de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad pa ni dgos pa ste/ de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di byas so// de bas na dgos pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dag
82b2(bstod tshogs): brjod pa dang brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa'am/ tshig dang tshig can 'brel pa'am/ thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa'am/ sgrub pa dang sgrub par bya ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa
82b3(bstod tshogs): 'am// bya ba dang byed pa'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa ni 'brel pa'o// de nas 'bad pa dang rtsol ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par rang nyid kyis sku gsum gyi don dang bya ba mthar phyin pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa yin/
82b4(bstod tshogs): par shes par bya ste 'di ni re zhig don gyi spyi yin no// da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/ gcig min du ma ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la// gcig dang du ma ni gcig dang du ma ste/ gcig ni gnyis pa med
82b5(bstod tshogs): pa nyid do// du ma ni mang po nyid de/ gcig dring du mar ma gyur pa'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/ ci'i phyir gcig kyang ma yin la du ma yang ma yin zhe na/ de'i phyir bzod ma nas
82b6(bstod tshogs): ma skyes pa'o zhes 'byung bas na gang thog ma nyid nas ma skyes pa de la gcig dang du ma'i gnas skabs su bya bar mi nus te// nam mkha' ltar yongs su chad pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las byung
82b7(bstod tshogs): bas na/ de'i phyir gang zhig gang las byung bar gyur pa ste/ gang gis sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su gyur pa de ma mthong ste/ sa lu la sogs pa'i sa bon las nis lu'i 'bras bu'o// de bzhin du stong pa nyid las gang zhig 'byung bar
82b8(bstod tshogs): 'gyur ba ni rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir kun tu rtog pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang stong zhing sgyu ma dang 'dra bar gzigs so// gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bdag
83a1(bstod tshogs): dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba smos te/ bdag dang gzhan ni bdag dang gzhan te/ de dag la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa ni mngon
83a2(bstod tshogs): par mtho ba dang / nges par leg pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to// gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i ngo bo thog ma dang tha ma med pa
83a3(bstod tshogs): stong pa nyid du bshad na/ ji ltar na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin zhe na/ nyes pa med de/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyi snod dang bcud kyi tshul du gnas
83a4(bstod tshogs): pa ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin te/ rmi lam la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no// gal te ma rig pa'i bag chags dang chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tham
83a5(bstod tshogs): med pa'i ngo bo de yang ma rig pa'i bag chags su gyur pa ni gla rtsi la sogs pas bsgos pa bzhin te/ dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid ni de lta bu'o// de bas na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i
83a6(bstod tshogs): gzhir gyur pa yin no// gzhan yang dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang phrad cing lam bzang po rnyed pas ma rig pa'i bag chags glo bur ba ring du byas shing yongs su dag par gyur pa ni gser dang zangs kyi dri ma dang
83a7(bstod tshogs): bral ba bzhin te// 'di la yon tan dang nyes pa len cing spong ba yod pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa'i don rtogs pa kho na tsam du zad de/ de'i phyir 'di la bsal bya ci yang med/ bzhag par bya/
83a8(bstod tshogs): ba gang yang med// yang dag nyid la yang dag blta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol zhes gsungs pa gang 'di ltar rkyen dang ldan pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par thal bar 'gyur gyi ma skyes pa skye bar ni ma mthong ngo //
83b1(bstod tshogs): skyes pa 'gag pa dag las kyang cung zad skye ba med de/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni mar me dang mtshungs so// gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir/ dngos min dngos po med pa ma yin zhes bya ba smos te/
83b2(bstod tshogs): dngos po ni gzugs su yod pa'o// de med par gyur pa ni dngos po med pa ste/ gnyi ga las ldog par 'gyur bas na dngos min dngos po yod pa ma yin zhes bya ste/ yod pa dang med pa dang dbus las
83b3(bstod tshogs): 'das par gyur pa'o// de nyid kyis nam mkha' ltar ro gcig pa ste/ nam mkha' ltar zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ro gcig cing mnyam pa'i rang bzhin du gang gyur pa de ni nam mkha' ltar ro gcig ces bya'o//
83b4(bstod tshogs): de nyid kyis na rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyig dang gzhan las btsal ba dang bral ba nyid do// de bas na gos pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa'i dri ma dang bral ba
83b5(bstod tshogs): nyid do// de nyid kyis na mi 'gyur ba ste rang gi ngo bo nyid la mi 'pho ba'o// zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pa'o// mi mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa med pa'o// mnyam pa ni chos thams cad kyi gzhir
83b6(bstod tshogs): mtshungs par gyur pa'o// khyab pa can ni thams cad du song bar gyur pa'o// spros pa med pa ni spros pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'o// khyad par du bya ba gzhan yang so so rang rig ces bya ba ste//
83b7(bstod tshogs): sems can rnams kyi so so rang gis rig par gyur pa gzhon nu ma'i bde ba dris pa bzhin no// dpe med pa ni dpe las 'das par gyur pa ste/ de skad du yang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod min te// tshig lam
83b8(bstod tshogs): pa'ang gang zhig yod// cung zad nye ba'am ring ba ni// 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no// 'dren pa mnyam pa med gyur pa// de la dper bya gang zhig gzhal// skabs 'byed gzhi dang bral ba yi// mnyam med/
84a1(bstod tshogs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bshad pas so// de lta bu'i chos kyi sku ste chos kyi lus de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo// ji lta bu su la zhe na/ rgyal ba rnams te shes bya ma lus pa thugs
84a2(bstod tshogs): su chud pas thugs byin gyis brlabs pa la lus dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to// rang gi 'byor pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan nyid do// khyad par
84a3(bstod tshogs): ji lta bu zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ste 'jig rten las rgal ba'o// bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sems kyi yul las ring du gyur pa'o// legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa la
84a4(bstod tshogs): sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yun ring por nye bar bsags pa las skyes pa'o// gang gi zhe na/ blo can rnams kyi ste/ byams pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang /
84a5(bstod tshogs): mya ngan thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros la sogs pa'o// ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir te rab tu mgu ba'i rgyur ro// 'khor ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs te de rnams kyi nang du'o//
84a6(bstod tshogs): sna tshogs pa ni rnam pa du ma'o// rgyas par ston par mdzad pa zhes bya'o// sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par gyi dbang du mdzad nas bye brag du mar 'chad par mdzad pa'o// /
84a7(bstod tshogs): rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu 'phro bar mdzad pa po zhes bya ba ni shin tu rgya che ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gsung ngo // thams cad du 'jug pas na rgya che ba'o// de nyid kyis na de rgyun mi
84a8(bstod tshogs): 'chad par spro bas na shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos ston cing gsung bar 'gyur ba de la de skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du brnyes shing
84b1(bstod tshogs): thugs su chud pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs sku zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pa la sogs pas
84b2(bstod tshogs): longs spyod par mdzad pa'o// de'i phyir khyad par gzhan yang chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la bzhugs pa gang yin zhes bya ba smos te/ chos kyi srid kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos kyi rgyal srid chen
84b3(bstod tshogs): po ste khamos gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po'o// de la gnas pa'i sku gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o// de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sku rnam pa gnyis po'i rang gi ngo bo nye bar bstan nas/
84b4(bstod tshogs): sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams ni sbyin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sems can rnams ni srog chags rnams so//
84b5(bstod tshogs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ smin par mdzad pa'i phyir te yongs su smin pa'i don du'o// gang gis dus la la dag tu me dang 'dra zhing byin za bzhin du kun nas 'bar bar snang zhing 'od dang ldan pas rab tu 'bar bar snang ba'o//
84b6(bstod tshogs): gnas gang du snang zhe na/ smras pa/ rdzogs par byang chub ces pa ste/ byang chub pa nyid du'o// chos kyi 'khor lo ni ba ra NA sir drang srong smra ba ri dwags kyi gnas su'o// rab tu zhi bar gang snang la zhes
84b7(bstod tshogs): pa ni gyad kyi nye 'khor shing sa la zung gi tshal du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'o// khyad par ci zhig ce na/ sna tshogs thabs tshul rnams kyis zhes bya ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs
84b8(bstod tshogs): rgyas dang / nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid du ston pa'o// bye brag ji lta bu zhe na/ rnam pa du mar
85a1(bstod tshogs): 'jug cing zhes pa ste/ gdul bya sna tshogs pa rnam pa du ma'i rjes su 'jug par mdzad pa'o// ldad par ci zhig ce na/ srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa dang gzugs
85a2(bstod tshogs): dang gzugs med pa ste srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi skye ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa ring du mdzad pa ni 'jigs pa sel ba'o// gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi
85a3(bstod tshogs): sprul sku don chen zhes bya ste/ phyogs bcur chub par mdzad pa ni phyogs bcu po rnams su rjes su khyab pa'o// thub pa ni sku dang gsung thub pa dang ldan pas na thub pa ste sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so//
85a4(bstod tshogs): don chen ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu stsol pa 'am thob par mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes slob dpon klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa
85a5(bstod tshogs): yin no// de ni 'di skad du ston par 'gyur te/ gang gis bdag nyid kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas// gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan gyi gzhal yas khang na
85a6(bstod tshogs): bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' dam pa tog dkar pos thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / bsam gtan bzhi bsgoms pa'i rim gyis
85a7(bstod tshogs): rnal 'byor chen po'i gnas 'og min du mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim pas yang dag par sangs rgyas so// de nas sprul pa'i skus de bzhin gshegs thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus
85a8(bstod tshogs): bzhugs pa dang / ri rab chen po'i steng du rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gi rtse mor gshegs te/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhir mngon par sprul par mdzad nas/ slar yang dga' ldan gyis
85b1(bstod tshogs): gnas mchog tu bzhugs pa'i dam pa tog dkar po dang gcig tu gyur nas lhums su 'jug pa dang / bltams pa dang / btsun mo'i nang na rol pa mdzad par bstan pa dang / mtshan mo mngon par byung
85b2(bstod tshogs): ba dang / dka' ba mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa
85b3(bstod tshogs): chen po'i bar gyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad par rab tu ston pa'i sprul pa'i skul ba dag lus dang ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to// de nyid kyi phyir na/ 'og min gnas ni nyams
85b4(bstod tshogs): dga' bar// gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs te// yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas// sprul pa dag ni 'dir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba gsungs pas so// de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gsum
85b5(bstod tshogs): gyis sku gsum bstan nas/ gzhan yang smon lam byed par 'dod pa'i phyir sems can don gcig rgyun du mdzad cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sems can gyi don ni srog chags rnams kyi 'dod
85b6(bstod tshogs): pa'i don rab tu sgrub ces bya ba'i don yin pas na/ 'gro ba'i don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems can gyi don mdzad pa de la phyag byas
85b7(bstod tshogs): pas zhes bya bar sbyar ro// yon tan ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na/ bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i zhes bya ba smos te/ bsod nams dang ye shes chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o//
85b8(bstod tshogs): deyongs su chad po med par bsags pa ni dpag tu med pa ste/ bsod nams dang ye shes chen po dpag tu med pa las byung ba ni de las skyes pa'o// de su zhig ce na/ bde bar gshegs pa ste mdzes par
86a1(bstod tshogs): gshegs pa'am slar mi ldog par gshegs pa'i chos can nyid yin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o// yang na nyid kyi don mthar phyin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o// rnams kyi
86a2(bstod tshogs): sku gsum ni chos kyi sku dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i sku gsum pa'o// de bas na de'i yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta zhe na// yid dang tshig gi lam las rab tu 'das pa zhes bya
86a3(bstod tshogs): ba ste/ dmigs su yod pa'i yid kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa'i don to// de lta bur gyur pa la mos pa'i dad pas 'dud cing phyag byas pa las so// bdag gis dge ba byang chub sa bon zhes bya ba ni byang chub pa'i
86a4(bstod tshogs): sa bon ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to// de bsgrubs shing bsags pa'o// des na de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs gang yin pa des chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi
86a5(bstod tshogs): ga sa kun 'tho ma sa pa sa myed pa / b+h+ya ba shA yA nApa// b+h+ya na pa sa na d+ha chul ste/ 'gas sa yin ga pa ma d+d+ha na pa
86a6(bstod tshogs): 'dzud cing 'god par shog cig ces bya ba'i don to// bstod pa'i rgyal po mkhas shing yon tan phul byung spyod yul ba/ shin tu nyams med rgya chen snying po don gyi tshogs sbas pa// bdag gis 'dir ni lo 'dab rtse
86a7(bstod tshogs): tsam blangs nas rnam bshad kyis// mchog tu mkhas shing don gyi rjes 'brang 'dir ni tshad ma yin// slob dpon klu sbubs kyis mdzad pa'i skugasu ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa rdzogs so//
86a8(bstod tshogs): rgyagar gyi mkhan po brad+d+ha ka ra warma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de rin chen bzang pos gsar du bskur cing zhus pa lags so// @#// sems pa grubang rgya'i btsud pa/ rgya gar skad du/ sat+kA ra dA na sta ga bongs
86b1(bstod tshogs): sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// nga la gus pa sems can don te gus pa gzhan dag min// gang gis snying rje ma btang de yis nga la gus pa ste//
86b2(bstod tshogs): snying rje btang nas gnas par gyur pa lhung ba gang yin pa// de ni de las snying rjes bslang bar nus kyi gzhan gyis min// gang gi snying rje sems can la ni rjes su zhugs gyur pa// des ni de yang mnyes byas des ni
86b3(bstod tshogs): bstan pa'i khur yang bzung // tshul khrims thos pa snying rje dag dang blo dang gsal ba dag/ gang la yod pa des ni rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa mchod// de nyid sems can phan 'dogs byung bas grub 'di brnyes pa
86b4(bstod tshogs): ste// sems can kho na'i don du nga yis spu 'di yang dag bzung // sems can rnams la yid kyis gnod par sems de gang gi phyir// nga la mi bltos pas na de yi don ston par mi 'gyur// sems can
86b5(bstod tshogs): pan pa chung yang des ni mchod pa 'byung 'gyur te// gang gis yid ni mgu bar byed pa mchod pa yin pas so// gnod pa'i bdag nyid can nam gzhan la rnam par 'tshe 'ang rung // legs par sbyar nas
86b6(bstod tshogs): mchod par gyur kyang des ni mchod mi 'gyur// chung ma dag dang bu dang 'byor dang rgyal srid chen po dang // sha rnams dang ni khrag dang tshil dang mig dang lus rnams kyang // gang la brtse ba'i dbang du byas nas nga yi
86b7(bstod tshogs): yongs btang ba// des na de la gnod pa byas na ngal gnod byas 'gyur// des na sems can phan pa byas nA nga la mchod pa'i mchog/ sems can gnod pa byas pa ngal shin tu gnod pa'i mchog/ bde dang /
86b8(bstod tshogs): sdug bsngal nga dang sems can mtshungs par myong bas na// sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed deng yi slob ma ji ltar yin// sems can rnams la brten nas sangs rgyas mnyes dang dge ba byas/ sems can
87a1(bstod tshogs): mang po'i don la rab gnas pha rol phyin pa thob// sems can don la brtson pa'i yid kyis bdud kyi stobs kyang bcom// sems can rnams la de lta de ltar spyad pa des na nga sangs
87a2(bstod tshogs): rgyas// skye ba skye bar gces par gyur pa'i gnyen 'dra srog chags med gyur na// dngos po gang la 'dir ni snying rje byams las dmigs pa nges par 'grub// btang snyoms dga' ba la sogs dngos po'i
87a3(bstod tshogs): yul dang rnam par thar la sogs gang la// gang gi don du snying rje de la 'bad pa'i yid kyis bzod pa yun rings bsgoms// glang po la sogs 'gro ba sems can rnams nyid du ma nga yis sbyin pa byas// /
87a4(bstod tshogs): sems can rnams nyid snod nyid du yang nye bar gyur pas nga yis sbyin pas bsdus// sems can rnams nyid sna tshogs dngos por gyur pas ra yis snying rje 'phel bar gyur// gal te sems can
87a5(bstod tshogs): rnams nyid bsrung ma byas ni gang gi don du don 'di bsgrubs// gral te sems can med na 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad rab tu mang po las// skye ba brgyad par gnod pa mtshungs pa med las gang la
87a6(bstod tshogs): brten nas phan 'di bsgrubs// bde bar gshegs kyi bdag nyid chen po ngo mtshar che ba 'khor ba'i rgyan gyur 'di// gal te ngal sems can rnams la brtse med gyur na gang gi don du nye bar bsgrubs//
87a7(bstod tshogs): ji srid nga yi bstan pa 'gro ba rnams la phan pa 'dir ni 'bar gyur pa// de srid gzhan la mchog tu phan par 'dod pa khyed kyis gnas par gyis// zos pas nga yi legs par spyad pa sems can don la mi skyo
87a8(bstod tshogs): thos bgyid la// skyob med par lus 'di las ni snying po dag ni blang bar gyis// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pa tshwa'i chu klung zhes bya ba'i lung las bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po bcu drug la bka' stsal pa/
87b1(bstod tshogs): sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM kA ra shrI dz+nyA na dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims
87b2(bstod tshogs): rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // @#// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsod pa pa zugs so/ rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta sto te/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
87b3(bstod tshogs): byiphyin pa'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang khyod sku kun nyes med la// nyes med rnams kyis gzigs mdzad pa// dpag med shes rab pha rol
87b4(bstod tshogs): na// rnam par me rtog phyag 'tshal 'dud// nam mkha' bzhin du gos med cing // spros pa med cing yi ge med// bsam yas khyod mthong gang yin pa// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong //
87b5(bstod tshogs): 'phags ma yon tan phyug khyod dang // sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams// khyad par yod par ma 'khums te// zla ba dang ni zla 'od bzhin// gus la byams ma sangs rgyas kyi// chos kyi sngon 'gro khyong
87b6(bstod tshogs): brtan nas// thugs rje'i bdag nyid mnyam med pa'i// bdag nyid chen por bde blag 'gro/ lan cig tsam yang bsam dag pas// khyod la tshul bzhin blta ba gang // des kyang mthong ba don yod kyi//
87b7(bstod tshogs): dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur// gzhan don mngon dga'i bdag nyid can// dpa' bo dag ni thams cad kyi// gso mdzad bskyed par mdzad pa ste// khyod ni byams ma'i yum lags so// gang skad sangs
87b8(bstod tshogs): rgyas 'jig rten gtse// thugs rje can rnams khyod kyi sras// de yi slad du dge ma khyod// sems can kun gyi phyi mo lags// pha rol phyin pa dri med pa// kun gyis ma smad pa khyod kyi// dus kun rjes su 'brang
88a1(bstod tshogs): lags pa// rgyu skar rnams kyis zla ris bzhin// gdul bya'i 'gro ba la brten nas// de dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// khyod nyid gcig pu tshul mang du// sna tshogs
88a2(bstod tshogs): mtshan gyis bsngags pa mdzad// zil pa'i chu yis thigs pa rnams// nyi ma'i 'od dang 'jal ba bzhin// rgol ba rnams kyi rtsod dang skyon// khyod dang 'jal na 'jig par 'gyur/ khyod nyid byis pa rnams lan/
88a3(bstod tshogs): smag byed mthong na 'jigs pa dang // mkhas pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa// skyed pas mthong na zhi ba lags// khyod mgon grang la khyod la yang // mngon par chags pa mnga' min na// de la yum cig/
88a4(bstod tshogs): ji ltar na// gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung // khyod ni gang nas ma byon zhing // gang du yang ni mi gshegs pas// gnas ni thams cad dag du yang // mkhas pa rnams kyis dmigs ma lags/
88a5(bstod tshogs): gang khyod de ltar ma 'khums nas// bsam pa yis ni bsgrubs pa dang // bsgrubs pa las ni rnam grol ba// de 'dir rmad byung chen po lags// khyod nyid mthong na 'ching 'gyur zhing // ma mthong na yang
88a6(bstod tshogs): 'ching bar 'gyur// khyed nyid mthong na grol 'gyur zhing // ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur// e ma la mtshan cher 'ong ma// grags ldan mkhyod bzang mo lags// shin tu rdzogs dka' snyam bzhin/
88a7(bstod tshogs): snang zhing mi snang ba yang lags// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos rnams kyis nges bsten ma// khyod nyid gcig pu thar pa'i lam// de ltar gzhan dag med par nges// lus can rnams la
88a8(bstod tshogs): pan don du// tha snyad mdun du mdzad nas ni// brtse bas 'jig rten mgon rnams kyis// khyod bstan ma bstan par yang gda'// 'dir khyod bstod par sus rdo thog/ mtshan ma med cing gos pa med// ngag gi yul kun
88b1(bstod tshogs): las 'das ma// gang khyod 'gar yang rten mi mnga'// de ltar gda' yang kun rdzob tu// bdag cag dag lam 'di 'dra bas// khyod ni bstod byar mi gda' na'ang // bstod pas shin du mya ngan 'das// shes rab
88b2(bstod tshogs): pha rol phyin bstod las// bdag gi dge ba gang bsags pa// de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa// shes rab pha rol phyin gnol shig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis
88b3(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa rdzogs so// / kha che'i paN+Di ta thig le bum pa dang / lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bskung ba'o// @#// ma ba pa yod pa/ rgya gar skad du/ oM tsan+da swA ba/
88b4(bstod tshogs): bod sa da du/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bsnyad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur byu pi la phyag 'tshal la/ gang zhig dngas pa rten 'byung rnams// ngo bo med pa nyid dra gsungs// ye shes mnyam med
88b5(bstod tshogs): bsam mi khyab// dpe med de la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod kyis thig tshon la// nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs// de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la// thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad//
88b6(bstod tshogs): rkyen rnams las ni 'brel 'byung ba// ma skyes lags par khyod kyis gsungs// ngo bo nyid kyis de ma skyes// de phyir stong par rab tu bstan// ji ltar 'di na sba brten nas// brag cha kun du 'byung ba ltar// snu ma
88b7(bstod tshogs): sngog rgyu bzhin du yang // de bzhin srid pa kun tu 'byung // sbrum dang ni smig d+ha dang // dri za'i gro khyer gzugs brnyan dang // rmi la ma gal te ma skyes ni// mthong ba la sogs dpe mod 'gyur// ji ltar
88b8(bstod tshogs): rgyu rkyen las byung ba// de dag byas pa can du bzhed// de bzhin rkyen las byung ba kun// mgon po khyod kyis de ltar gzungs// byis pa gang dag ci brjod pa// bgyis pa zhes bgyid de mchis te// chang ba stong pa 'dra ba
89a1(bstod tshogs): lags// don bzhin ma lags rab tu bstan// gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes// de tshe da ltar byung ba yi// gang zhig pas na 'das par 'gyur// ma 'ongs pa yang ji ltar bltos//
89a2(bstod tshogs): rang las dngos po skye ba med// gzhan dang gnyis ka las ma yin// yod min med min yod mod min// de tshe gang las gzhan zhig 'byung // ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med// de phyir gang las kun tu
89a3(bstod tshogs): 'byung // rang bzhini dngos po med grub pas// gzhan las kyang ni 'byung ba med// rang nyid yod na gzhan yod 'gyur// gzhan nyid yod na rang nyid yod// de dag bltos pa can du grub// pha rol tshu la
89a4(bstod tshogs): bzhin du gsungs// gang tshe ci la'ang mi bltos pa// de tshe gang la gang zhig 'byung // gang tshe ring la mi bltos pa// de tshe zung sogs gal mchis// ji ltar gcig sogs ma mchis pa// 'das dang
89a5(bstod tshogs): ma 'ongs la sogs pa// nyon mongs rnams kyang de bzhin te// yang dag log pa'adi rang las ni// dngos gang rang las ma mchis na// de tshe thams cad ni zhig mchis// gzhan zhes brjod pa gang lags
89a6(bstod tshogs): te// rang gi rang bzhin med na min// gang tshe gzhan gyi dngos med pa// de tshe dngos rnams rang bzhin med// de tshe gzhan dngos dngos 'dzin pa// don gyi theg pa ci zhig mchis// gdong ma nyid nas mnyam gyur
89a7(bstod tshogs): pa// rang bzhin gyis kyang mya ngan 'das// yang dag par ni ma skyes lags// de skad chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs// blo ldan khyod kyis gzugs la sogs// ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa// dbu bcu
89a8(bstod tshogs): bur sgyu la sogs// smig rgyu chu shing 'dra ba lags// dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs de// gal te yang dag mchis gyur na// byis pas yang dag rig par 'gyur// gang tshe yang dag shes pas ci//
89b1(bstod tshogs): dbang po rnams ni bems po dang // tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin dang // lung ma bstan pa nyid dang ni// log par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs// gang gis ci zhig ma rtogs pa// yang dag ji bzhin thugs chud nas//
89b2(bstod tshogs): des na 'jig rten mi shes pas// bsgribs pa zhes kyang khyod kyis gsungs// yod ces pa ni lhag par lta// med ces pa ni chad par lta// des na mtha' gnyis bral ba yi// chos de khyod kyis bstan pa
89b3(bstod tshogs): mdzad// des na chos rnams mu bzhi dang // bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags// rnam shes bya ba 'am ma lags la// rmi lam mig 'phrul las byung dang // zla ba gnyis la sogs mthong bzhin//
89b4(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba 'byung ba de dngos su// ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// ji ltar rgyu las rmi lam na// 'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du// dngos po thams cad 'byung ba bzhin// 'jig pa'ang de bzhin bzhed pa
89b5(bstod tshogs): lags// de bzhin chags sogs sdug bsngal dang // 'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs// tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa yang // rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs// de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang /
89b6(bstod tshogs): 'ongs pa dang ni song ba yang // de bzhin bcings grol ye shes la// gnyis 'dod yang dag rig ma lags// gang las skyes pa yod ma lags// de la mya ngan 'das gang yod// sgyu ma'i gla ngo po 'dra bas na// /
89b7(bstod tshogs): don du bzod nas zhi ba nyid// skyes pa nyid na'angam skyes pa// sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin bzhed// de bzhin thams cad skyes pa'am// yang dag par ni ma skyes lags// 'jig rten mgon po dpag med kyis// /
89b8(bstod tshogs): sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa// so sor mya ngan 'das mdzad kyang // de dag gis kyang gdam bkrol// thub chen gang phyir sems can rnams// rang las mo skyes de yi phyir// gang yang gang gis ma bkrol zhes//
90a1(bstod tshogs): de skad khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs// ji ltar sbyar ma mkhan gyis byas// dngos po stong pa de bzhin du// byas pa thams cad dngos stong gzhan// khyod gsung de bzhin byed pa po// byed pa
90a2(bstod tshogs): po yang gzhan gyis bgyis// byas pa can du 'gyur ba legs// yang ni de yi bya ba byed// byed pa por ni thal bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad ming tsam zhes// khyod kyis gsung ni bstod de gsungs// brjod pa
90a3(bstod tshogs): las ni gzhan gyur pa// brjod par bgyi ba yod ma mchis// de phyir chos rnams thams cad ni// rtog pa tsam zhes khyod kyis gsungs// gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i// rtog pa yang ni med ces
90a4(bstod tshogs): gsungs// dngos dang dngos med gnyis 'das pa// la lar ma 'das pa yang lags// shes pa med cing shes bya'ang med// med min yod min gang lags dang // gang yang gcig min du ma'ang min//
90a5(bstod tshogs): gnyis ka ma yin gcig kyang med// bzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang // bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang // gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dang // chad pa med cing rtag med pa// de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba lags// yi ge
90a6(bstod tshogs): ye shes spyod yul min// de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung // de ni stong par khyod bzhed lags// dam pa'i chos kyang de lta bu// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang mtshungs// de ni de nyid don dang ni// de bzhin
90a7(bstod tshogs): nyid dang rdzas su bzhed// de ni yang dag mi bslub// de rdzogs pas na sangs rgyas brjod// sangs rgyas rnams dang chos dbyings dang // des na don du tha ma dad// bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams dang // des na
90a8(bstod tshogs): mnyam par khyod bzhed lags// dngos po rnams las stong gzhan min// de med par yang dngos po med// de phyir rten cing 'byung ba'i dngos// stong pa lags par khyod kyis bstan// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ang lags// /
90b1(bstod tshogs): gzhan gyis dbang las kun rdzob ste// gzhan gyi dbang zhes rab tu gsungs// dam pa'i don ni bcos ma yin// ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin dang // yang dag rdzas dngos yod pa'ang lags// brtags pa'i dngos po
90b2(bstod tshogs): med pa nyid// gzhan gyi dbang ni yod ma lags// btags pa'i dngos po yod ces pa// sgro 'dogs lags par khyod kyis gsungs// byas pa chad nas med ces pa// chad pa lags par khyod kyis gsungs//
90b3(bstod tshogs): yang dag shes pas chad pa med// rtag pa nyid kyang med par bshad// 'gro ba dngos pos stong pa lags// de slad smig rgyu 'dra bar bzhed// ji ltar ri dgas skom chu ni// tshad med rtag pa yod ma yin// de bzhin
90b4(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba thams cad kyang // tshad med rtag pa med par gsungs// gang la rdzas shig ste 'gyur ba// de la chang sogs 'jigs pa 'byung // de la 'jig rten mtha' yod dang // mtha' med par yang 'gyur ba lags
90b5(bstod tshogs): sa pa sa/ nA sa pa/ nga// gas pa nga gas dang// smras sngags / /
90b6(bstod tshogs): lta ba thams cad 'gog byed pa'i// dam pa'i chos ni bstan pa lags// ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa// de ni yang dag dam pa lags// dngos po'i gdon gyis zin rnams kyi// gso ba de ni bla na med// des na chos
90b7(bstod tshogs): kyi mchod sbyin pa// mchod sbyin rim pas rtag rgyun du// 'jig rten gsum po sbyin sreg mdzad// dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bskyed cing // mu stegs ri dwags 'jigs bgyid pa// bdag med seng ge'i
90b8(bstod tshogs): nga ro'i sgra// rmad byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs// stong pa nyid dang ches zab pa'i// chos kyi rnga chen brdung ba lags// ngo bo nyid med dgra bo che'i// chos kyi dung ni bus pa lags// sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yi//
91a1(bstod tshogs): chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags// chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid// nges pa'i don do zhes kyang bstan// gang yang skye dang 'gag 'jogapa// sems can srog la sogs bstan pa// de ni bkri don
91a2(bstod tshogs): na rdzob tu// mgon pa khyod kyis btsun pa lags// shes rab pa rab byin ma tha ye// pha rol gang gis rang byin te// bsod nams yon tan rin chen phyag/ mgon khyod yon tan pa la phyin// de lal
91a3(bstod tshogs): dpe med bsam mi khyab// 'gro ba'i mgon po bstod pa yis// bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des// 'gro ba khyod dang mtshungs par shog/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub
91a4(bstod tshogs): nas ma hU~M bags/ / na/ smadapas dus dugam
91a5(bstod tshogs): gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bla med lam las gshegs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa bstod 'das kyang // gus shing spro ba'i sems kyis ni// bdag gis bsod 'das bstod par bgyid// bdag dang
91a6(bstod tshogs): gzhan dang gnyis ka las// rnam par dben pa'i dngos gzigs kyang // khyod kyi thugs rje sems can las// ma log pa ni ngo mtshar lags// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing // tshig las 'das pa'i
91a7(bstod tshogs): spyod yul gyi// chos rnams khyod kyis gang bstan pa// de ni khyod kying mtshar lags// phreng po khams dang skye mched rnams// khyod kyis bsgrags par mdzad lags kyang // de dag yongs su 'dzin pa
91a8(bstod tshogs): no// skad kyis kyang ni bzlog par mdzad// gang zhig rkyen las de ma mchis// dngos rnams byin las ji ltang ste// de skad mkhas pa khyod gsungs pas// spros pa rnams ni bcang pa lags// gang
91b1(bstod tshogs): tshogs las rab grub na// tshogs pa rgyu las 'byung mthong ba// de dag mtha' gnyis brten par ni// khyod kyis shin tu gzigs pa lags// dngos po rkyen la brten grub par// khyod ni shin tu
91b2(bstod tshogs): bzhed pa lags// de ltar byas pa'i skyon lags par// 'di ltar ston pa khyod kyis gzigs// gang nas kyang ni mchi ma lags// gang du yang ni mchis ma lags// dngos po thams cad gzugs
91b3(bstod tshogs): brnyan dang // mtshungs par khyod ni bzhed pa lags// lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis stong pa gsungs// de yang yongs su btags pa ste// dngos su mgon po khyod mi bzhed//
91b4(bstod tshogs): snong dang mi stong bzhed ma lags// gnyis kar khyod dgyes ma lags te// de la brtsod pa ma mchis par// khyod kyi gsung chen spyod pa lags// gzhan min dngos po yod min zhing // gzhan min gnyis
91b5(bstod tshogs): min zhes kyang gsungs// gcig dang gzhan nyid spangs pas na// ji lta bur yang dngos ma mchis// gal te skye sogs gsum mchis na// 'dus byas mtshan nyid mchis par 'gyur// de dag gi yang skye la
91b6(bstod tshogs): sogs// gsum pa tha dad 'gyur ba lags// skye sogs gsum po so so ni// 'dus byas las la nus ma lags// gcig la gcig tu 'dus pa rnams// phrad par yang ni mchis ma lags// de ltar mtshan
91b7(bstod tshogs): gzhi mtshan ma mchis// de ltar grub pa ma lags pas// 'dus byas grub pa ma lags na// 'dus ma byas lta ga la grub// smra ba'i seng ges de skad du// khyod nyid gsungs na seng ge yis// 'bigs byed glang chen
91b8(bstod tshogs): smra rnams kyi// rgyags pa bsal bar gyur pa bzhin// lam zhugs gnod pa sna tshogs dang // lta ba'i lam ngan mi bsten ltar// khyod la brten nas yod pa dang // med pa nyid la'ang brten ma lags// khyod kyis
92a1(bstod tshogs): dgongs nas gsungs pa dang // gang dag gis ni de ltar rtogs// de dag khyod kyis dgongs gsungs pa// phyir zhing rtogs par bgyi mi 'tshal// dngos kun mya ngan 'das mtshungs par//
92a2(bstod tshogs): deltar gang gis rnam shes pa// de tshe de la ji lta bur// ngar 'dzin kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar yang dag rig pa'i mchog/ de nyid rig pa khyod bstod pa'o// bdag gi bsod nams gang yin des/
