92a3(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten yang dag rig mchog shog/ bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// #// blan med pa' bad pa
92a4(bstod tshogs): rgyu gar smad du/ nir+yaHswA pa/ bad skad du/ thun med pa'i bsad pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur b+hu nga la phyug 'tshal lo// ga rna pa pa maSh+Tas/ mtshag senas phrul stos kyis gas/
92a5(bstod tshogs): ga / gang byed ma na shA / / // nga nag gcig bras sngags/
92a6(bstod tshogs): maud de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gas srin pa gangs kyis na// gang nag zung pa bstar// gang gisang bas spyan pas pa ba// d+h+rU ra de la phrug 'tshal la// kau ga DUd+hA 'phrul rnaMs/
92a7(bstod tshogs): gar mkhan nang pa bskyod pa la// gang gi lam gzigs lam mkhyen pa// bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig gis ni cha shas dang // don stong min te gnyis ka spangs// thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyugs /
92b1(bstod tshogs): bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu zhes pa rnam spangs shing // dri ma'i bdag nyid las ring ba// dngos dang dngos po med spangs pa// bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo// bla na med pa'i bstod pa slob dpon
92b2(bstod tshogs): chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi rnal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// / ya sa pa khyo dam na pas byab/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+haT+TA ka man+t+ra shrI par mAr+tha su ti nA ma/ bod skad du/
92b3(bstod tshogs): 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byon pa ma lags bzhud mi mnga'// bzhengs pa ma lags bzhugs mi mnga'
92b4(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten pa las shin tu 'das// tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul lags// mgon po khyod la ji ltar bstod// 'on kyang 'jig rten btags brten gyis// khyod ni ci 'dra de bzhin du// bdag gis klas
92b5(bstod tshogs): pas bla ma bstod// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes te// khyod la skye ba yod mi mnga'// mgon po gshegs dang byon ma mnga'// dngos med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod la dngos dang dngos med min// chad pa
92b6(bstod tshogs): ma lags ther zug min// khyod rtag ma lags mi rtag min// gnyis med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// dmar dang ljang dang le brgan dang // ser dang dkar dang gnag ma lags// khyod la kha dog yong mi mnga'// /
92b7(bstod tshogs): mdog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod ni tshe dang chung ba dang // sbom dang phrab khyod min te// ring dang thung pa'i khams ma lags// tshad med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// shes pas srid la mi gnas shing
92b8(bstod tshogs): snying rjes zhil mi gnas te// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor mi gnas// mi gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud// mchog tu zab pa nyid bsten pa/
93a1(bstod tshogs): zab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// de ltar bstod na bstod bgrang gi/ gzhan du khyod la ji ltar bstod// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// sul bstod cing su yis bstod// mtha' ma
93a2(bstod tshogs): mchis shing dbus ma mchis// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i// rtog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// bla ma mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi// don dam yang dag mtshan brjod pa'i// bsod nams
93a3(bstod tshogs): 'di yis 'jig rten 'di// bde bar gshegs pa 'dra bar shog/ 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam par bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
93a4(bstod tshogs): 'phags pa 'angs dpam kyig rdal bgod pa paldags/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+han+d+ha ra ka kA ru Na sto tra/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon
93a5(bstod tshogs): nur gyur pal phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa ma lus pa rnams rab bsal zhing // thub pa'i grags pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab// dpal ldan rab tu brtan pa'i sku mnga' ba// dpal ldan khyed la rtag tu phyag
93a6(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// bos shing bos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa// phongs pa 'di dag kun las khyed skyob mdzad// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces// ci yo phyir na nges par sel mi mdzad// bcom ldan khyod
93a7(bstod tshogs): ni rtag par thams cad la// rnam pa kun tu thams cad gsol grag na// bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas// de phyir bdag ni shin tu skal dman lags// yon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad//
93a8(bstod tshogs): pa// blo bzang 'gro kun skyob par brtson gyur na// bdag blo khyed la mngon du zhen na yang // phongs pas gdungs pa nyid du ci phyir 'gyur// thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyed kyi ni// pad+ma lta bu dag pa'i
93b1(bstod tshogs): spyan gnyis kyis// 'gro ba phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par// ma gzigs pa ni kye ma sdug bsngal lo// khyed kyis yid 'jigs dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yi// phyag gi pad+ma ring du rtag tu sbyong //
93b2(bstod tshogs): skal zhes pa yi tsha bas de yang ni// zag ring du ni mi snang nyid du 'gyur// khyed kyi snyan na ma nyams gtsang ba dag/ gnyis kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis// gzar te spyan sngar 'odod 'bod gyur
93b3(bstod tshogs): kyang // bdag gi dman pa ci phyir gas na ma gyur// rnam pa kun tu thugs rjes drangs khyed kyis// dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro rigs bde mdzad na// sdig can padag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// thugs rje
93b4(bstod tshogs): de yang brtse ba mi mnga' 'gyur// 'jig rten dman la phan par mdzad pa yi// khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na// gang 'dir bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang // sgrub par mi mdzad sdig can bsam
93b5(bstod tshogs): pas nyes// 'di na sdug bsngal can ni gang yin zhes// glen gang gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces// de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang // bdag phongs ma gzigs kyi mngo mtshar che// gang zhig la ni
93b6(bstod tshogs): tshig sbyin gang zhig la// 'phel du phun tshegs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes// de ltar brtson pa khyed kyi mkhyen rab kyis// ci yi phyir na bdag la skyob mi mdzad// khyed la dad par gyur pa su mi bde// khyed dang
93b7(bstod tshogs): bsod nams dman pa zhig ma mchis// bdag ni khyod la dad kyang sdug bsngal bar// ci phyir gyur ces ngo mtshar rnam par 'khrungs// sdug bsngal gcod mdzad sman pa chen po ni// gang tshe khyed kyang
93b8(bstod tshogs): bdag la spong mdzad na// bsod nams bcom pa bdag gis gzhan sul// skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba khyed kyis gsungs// 'grol rtag tu bu gcig 'dra ba yi// brtse ba'i thugs ni mnga' zhing sgrol
94a1(bstod tshogs): spyod pa// khyed kyang gal te bdag gnod mi sel na// de tshe bdag ni mgon med bcom pa lags// bcom ldan khyed ni dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'grol 'bras bu mnyam med kun
94a2(bstod tshogs): stsol na// bdag ni bsnyen bkur bgyid kyang bdag gi phyogs// rnam pa kun tu phyi bshol ci phyir mdzad// de ltar smre gsol ba yis khyed yon tan// cha tsam brjod las bdag gis dge bsags pa//
94a3(bstod tshogs): gang yin des ni 'grol bsod nams dag/ rgya cher rang bzhin grub pa'i bum po bzang // yid bzhin nor bu lta bu gzugs su yi// zhabs gnyis rgyu ba'i dpag bsam 'dra ba yi// khyod kyi gzhon
94a4(bstod tshogs): nu'i lus su bdag gyur cing // skye ba kun tu bdag po nyid gyur cig/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
94a5(bstod tshogs): gnas chen po brgyan gyi tshod rten la bsnyad pa/ rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta ma hA s+than tsi ta s+pho tra/ bod skad du/ gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag
94a6(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu lum pir bltams// ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi ru gnas par mdzad// yon tan rin tshon bye bas brgyan pa yi// bde gshegs mchod rten rnams la phyag 'tshal
94a7(bstod tshogs): lo// ma ga d+hA yi byang chub shing drung du// chu bo ni rany+dzan zhes bya ba'i// 'gram bzhugs mchod rten yon tan rgya che ba// byang chub rten du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// ka shi ka yi ba raNA se r+ya// chos kyi
94a8(bstod tshogs): 'khor lo rnam grol rmad byung na// nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam par gcod mdzad pa// ye shes mchod rten gzhi la phyag 'tshal lo// mnyan du yod par gzhan stobs tshar bcad nas// dze ta'i tshal du chu
94b1(bstod tshogs): 'phrul chen po bstan// sa gsum dgongs pa mchog tu bsgrub mdzad pa// mu stegs pham mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer dam pa mchog ni gsal ldan du// lha rnams gnas
94b2(bstod tshogs): gshegs bla na med par babs// zhabs la tshangs dbang cod pan gyis mchod pa// sum cu'i lhas mchod mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun dbyen du sngar gyur las// ston pa'i nyan thos rab mthun
94b3(bstod tshogs): pa// rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal// byams ngos mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// skya tshe 'du byed btang ba las// slar yang sku tshe byin brlabs pa// rnam grol yangs pa can gyi ni// byin brlabs
94b4(bstod tshogs): mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// ku sha'i grong du 'gro ba rnams// dge ba la ni sbyor mdzad cing // 'gron med gyad gnas zung gi tshal// mchod rten mya ngan 'das phyag 'tshal// shAka thub mchod rten brgyad po dang /
94b5(bstod tshogs): phyogs bcu gzhan dang gzhan rnams na// bzhugs pa'i chos sku kun la 'dud// zhal rtag tu skyes phyag 'tshal la// 'di ltar spros pa kun bral dpe med dag cing dag pa'i ngo bo nyid// sangs rgyas chos sku
94b6(bstod tshogs): mkha' lngar 'gro ba la khyab yang dag phyag 'tshal bas// bsod nams gongs ro'i kha dog ltar dkar bdag gi rgyud la gang bsags pa// des na sems can ma lus rigs 'dzin pade rtogs byang chub thob par shog/
94b7(bstod tshogs): gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // mad+hA laM/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta ma hA s+tha na ts+yai ta sto tra/ bod skad du/
94b8(bstod tshogs): gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed nas// bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags te//
95a1(bstod tshogs): byang chub snying por sangs rgyas bdud ni btul// byang chub chen po'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi gzhir gyur ser skya'i grong khyer du// sgyu ma'i yum las zas gtsang shAkya rigs
95a2(bstod tshogs): 'khrungs// sku bzhengs sta zur g.yas pa tshangs pas bzhis// bkra shis 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// wa ra NA si la sogs bsod snyoms gshegs// gzugs can snying po'i glang
95a3(bstod tshogs): chen smyon pa rnams// phyag gi ser mo'i stobs kyis btul nas kyang // grong khyer 'dul mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// ne sing dag tu bsnyel so mdzad pa'i tshe// ha lu many+dzus sprang rtsi phul
95a4(bstod tshogs): nanus kyang // khron par dus byas sum cu rtswa gsum skyes// thugs rje 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pas 'khor lo phul nus 'khor lo bskor// mu stegs ston pa drug ni stobs
95a5(bstod tshogs): kyis btul// sprul pa'i grangs kyis lha mi tshim mdzad pa'i// cho 'phrul bstan pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// dga' bo la sogs klu yi tshogs rnams kyis// bsnyen bkur phul zhing bu mos 'o
95a6(bstod tshogs): ma drangs// dkar dang 'jig rten ma lus tshar gcod pa// nyer zhi rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang // nyan thos dgra bcom tshogs kyis yongs
95a7(bstod tshogs): bskor te// sdom dang tshul khrims la ni rab bkod pa'i// rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// sems can mi rtag 'dul ba'i dgongs pa dang // lU las babs nas mdzad pa kun gyi mthar//
95a8(bstod tshogs): tsun das gsol btab zla gsum nas mthar phyin// mya ngan 'das mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo// gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad
95b1(bstod tshogs): pa rdzogs so// / @#// mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes byab/ rgya gar skad du/ dId sha kA ra nA man ya sto traM/ bod skad du/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba
95b2(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis dang por byang chub thugs bskyed nas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad cing // dus 'dir mdzad pa rgya chen 'gro ba yi//
95b3(bstod tshogs): mgon gyur khyod la bdag gis bstod par bgyi// lha rnams 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas// lha las babs nas glang chen ltar gshegs te// rigs la gzigs nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi//
95b4(bstod tshogs): ldum su zhugs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba bcu rdzogs shAkya'i sras po ni// bkra shis lum+b+hi'i tshal du bltams pa'i tshe// tshangs dang brgya byin gyis btud mtshan mchog ni// byang chub
95b5(bstod tshogs): rigs su nges mdzad phyag 'tshal lo// gzhon nu stobs ldan mi yis seng ge des// aM ga ma ga d+ha ra ni sgyu rtsal bstan// skye bo dregs pa can rnams tshar bcad nas// 'gran zla med par mdzad la phyag
95b6(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// 'jig rten chos dang mthun par bya ba dang // kha nas mtho spang phyir btsun mo yi// 'khor dang ldan mdzad thabs la mkhas pa yis// rgyal srid skyong bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i
95b7(bstod tshogs): bya ba snying po med gzigs nas// khyim nas byung ste mkha' la gshegs nas kyang // mchod rten rnam dag drung du nyid la nyid// rab tu byung bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// brtson pas byang chub
95b8(bstod tshogs): 'grub par dgongs nas ni// nai rany+dza na'i 'gram du lo drug tu// dka' ba spyad mdzad brtson 'grus mthar phyin nas// bsam gtan mchog brnyes mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma med nas 'bad
96a1(bstod tshogs): pa don yod phyir// ma ga d+ha yi byang chub shing drung du// skyil krung mi g.yo mngon par sangs rgyas nas// byang chub rdzogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rjes 'gro la
96a2(bstod tshogs): myung drag zigs nas ni// ba ra d+d+hi si la sogs gnas mtshugaH// chos kyi 'khor lo bsor nas gdul bya rnams// theg pa gsum la 'god mdzad byug 'tshal lo// gzhan gyi rgol ba ngan pa
96a3(bstod tshogs): tshe rabacad nas// mu stegs ston pa drug dang lngas byin sogs// khor mo 'jig gi yul du bdud rnams bdud// thub pa g.yul las rgyal mdzad phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa gsum na dpe med
96a4(bstod tshogs): yon tan gyis// mnyan du yod par cho 'phrul chen po bstan// lha mi 'gro ba kun gyis rab mchod pa// bstan pa rgyas par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// le lo can rnams myur du bskal bya'i phyir//
96a5(bstod tshogs): chu mchog grong gis gzhi gtsang ma ru// 'chi med rdo rje lta bu'i sbubashags nas/ mya ngan 'da' bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag nyid du 'jig pa med phyir dang // ma 'ongs sems can bsod
96a6(bstod tshogs): nams thob bya'i phyir// de nyid du ni ring bsrel mang sprul nas// cha brgyad sku gdung mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar bstan pa'i bdag po bcom ldan gyi// mdzad pa'i tshul la mdo tsam bstod pa yi//
96a7(bstod tshogs): dge bas 'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa yang // bde gshegs nyid kyi spyod dang mtshungs par shog/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so//
96a8(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal brta do pa zhes bya ba/ rgya gar skad du/ ban da na sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod byed
96b1(bstod tshogs): 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // srid 'khor rmongs byed 'dra ba spangs// mchog sbyin mdzad pa rgyal ba mchog/ mchog byung sangs rgyas bdag phyag 'tshal// yang dag thugs chud rdzogs sangs rgyas//
96b2(bstod tshogs): lha dang lha min mchod byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma la// mi pham mnyam pa med gyur cing // bdud stobs pa ma mdzad bdag phyag 'tshal// shAkya'i rgyal po'i sras su 'khrungs// gdung ni
96b3(bstod tshogs): nyi ma'i rigs su grags// dpa' bo rmad byung sangs rgyas ni// yon tan tshogs ni bsdus pa la// lha mi rlung lhas mchod phyag 'tshal// gser gyi ri bo'i rtse 'dra'i sku// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i spyan mnga' ba//
96b4(bstod tshogs): gser gyi mdog dang ldan gyur cing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// shis ldan mtshan bzang phyag 'tshal lo// me dang glog dang me stag dang // nyi zer stong ldan dkyil 'khor can// gang gis
96b5(bstod tshogs): stobs ni brgyan gyur pa// mnyam med stobs ldan phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan mchog ni 'bar ba yi// bsod dang dul bar yang dag ldan// thub pa'i dbang po mchog gyur pa// yang dag byang
96b6(bstod tshogs): chub brnyes pa la// ches dregs phyag byas phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sems can phan mdzad cing // bde ba'i don phyir snying rjes 'jug/ yang dag don la zhugs gyur pas// mya ngan 'das grongs
96b7(bstod tshogs): gshegs phyag 'tshal// 'dis ni lto 'phye mi 'am ci// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// bdag gis rgyal ba bstod pa las// bsod nams bdag gis gang bsags pa// des ni sems can
96b8(bstod tshogs): thams cad kyang // byang chub khong du chud par shog/ phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
97a1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ na ra go d+d+hi ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni// dbul ba'i
97a2(bstod tshogs): 'dam du bying ba la// yongs su mkhyen pa bskyed nas ni// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// bdag ni rab rib khang par zhugs// mgon med sdug bsngal nyams su myong // bdag ni gnyen
97a3(bstod tshogs): gyi tshogs kyis spangs// de bzhin gshegs kyi bo dag la skyobs// pha dang ma dang sring mo dang // bu dang chung ma mdza' bshes mo// mig 'phrul lta bur bdag gis 'khums// de bzhin gshegs kyi
97a4(bstod tshogs): bdag la skyobs// bdag 'dir 'khor 'dab rnams kyi phyir// las gang legs dang nyes byas pa// de yis bdag ni gcig pur gyur// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// 'khon rnying
97a5(bstod tshogs): mi bzad chen po dang // gting med rgya mtsho dag rnams su// mgon po bdag cag long gyur na// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// rgya mtsho chen po rgal ba yi// gru ni gog por zhugs
97a6(bstod tshogs): pa ltar// bdag gis kyang ni rgal dkar 'khums// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// chos dang chos min ma 'tshal shing // bgrod dka' bgrod min mi rigs pas// 'di ni sems
97a7(bstod tshogs): med shing dang 'dra// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// pha bsad pa dang ma bsad pa// kho bos mtshams med lnga bgyis pa// mi bzad rab rib mun par 'khums// de bzhin gshegs
97a8(bstod tshogs): kye bdag la skyobs// bdag gis mchod rten 'jig par bgyis// dge 'dun dkor ni rnam par blangs// bdag gis sems can 'tshe bar bgyis// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/
97b1(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten 'di na bde ba mchis// 'jig rten pha rol 'tshal ma gyur// las kyi srad bus dkris pas na// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// de yi gson pa 'di 'dra bas// mkha' la ka shi'i
97b2(bstod tshogs): me tog ni// rlung gis btab nas 'phyan pa bzhin// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// 'brog dgon dang ni tsher ma yi// ljon shing mang po rten med pa// de na bdag gi lam ma mthong /
97b3(bstod tshogs): de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs// nyes pa med par phyugs rnams dang // ri dwags mang po mdas bsad pas// de tshe bdag ni rgyal por rlom// de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs//
97b4(bstod tshogs): sems can rgyal ba med // pa 'phru yang yid mam sa// ga sa d+hAbs ba ga/ da gas dru pa ts+tsha sa d+d+ha// sman pa rnam sas na /
97b5(bstod tshogs): thams cad gso mdzad pa// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// skyob byed 'jig rten mgon po la// dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o// // 'dis kyang 'gro ba
97b6(bstod tshogs): du ma la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig// dpal ra sar mo che'i gtsug lag khang du grong khyer dpe med kyi pa Na Di ta til ka dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus
97b7(bstod tshogs): te gtan la phab pa'o// / @#// bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags 'od bsngags bad zhes bya ba brin sde dbyangs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ baN+Da ra ha ba Ne b+ha ga ba to/ bud d+ha sto tra ya shAkya
97b8(bstod tshogs): sta ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
98a1(bstod tshogs): zhing dang zhing min ma 'tshal te// sgra tsam gyi ni rjes 'brangs nas// bdag gis nongs te sngon chad ni// bsngags min bsngags pa brjod pa gang // ngag gi 'dam gyis gos pa
98a2(bstod tshogs): de// thub pa bsod nams 'bab kyi stegs// bzhud pa khyod la brten bcas nas// rab tu bkru ba 'di brtsam mo// 'di ni bdag gis mchog tshogs la// gti mug ldongs pas nongs bgyis
98a3(bstod tshogs): gang // sdig pa de yi nongs pa dag/ sel bar bgyid pa'i bsad byed lags// bdag ni mya ngan 'das bar du// khyod kyi gsung dang khyod kyi ni// yon tan brjod pa gang lags pa'i// tshig lam
98a4(bstod tshogs): gnyis las nyams ma gyur// gtam 'di tsam zhig snying por rabs// de las gzhan don ma mchis pas// smra na 'di nyid smra bar shog/ yang na bdag ni mi smang shog/ khyod kyi chos ni kho na/
98a5(bstod tshogs): dang // khyod mnyam khyod ni nyid la mnga'// de slad chos gzhan thams cad ni// khyod las khyad du khor ma lags// gang te sangs rgyas chos rnams ni// bsam pa bgyis na thams cad kyi//
98a6(bstod tshogs): phul du phyin gyur dngos po gzhan// mi gtsang nyid dang 'dra bar gyur// khyod 'dra 'ga' yang ma mchis na// lhag pa lta zhig smos ci 'tshal// khyod pas khyad par cung zad kyis// dman pa tsam yang
98a7(bstod tshogs): dga' ma mchis// 'dren pa khyod la gang zhig gis// dper brjod dpe ni ma mchis pas// dpe yi glags ni spangs pa po// dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas chos ni gzhal
98a8(bstod tshogs): yas phyir// de las gzhan pa'i gang zag ni// rnam grol 'dra ba thob rnams kyang // khyod dang khyad par shin tu che// stong pa tsam du 'dra slad du// su zhig khyad par ma 'tshal nas// ba spu'i bu ga/
98b1(bstod tshogs): stong pa ni// chung du nam mkha' dag dang skran// grangs med pa la su zhig 'grang // tshad med pa la su zhig 'jal// khyod kyi yon tan grangs dang ni// mthu la dpogs pa ma mchis so// ji ltar dpag
98b2(bstod tshogs): bsam shing gi tshal// 'byam klas nang du 'khyams pa ltar// bdag ni khyod la legs spyad kyis// ngoms ma 'tshal te mtha' mi rtogs// yon tan rnams kyi yon tan mtsho// khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs
98b3(bstod tshogs): chos rnams// gal te bstan du mchis grung na// nam mkhar yang ni shong mi 'gyur// khyod kyi mngon sum bsnyen bkur ba// sangs rgyas chos kyi sde dpon po// nyan thos kun gyi rtog gyur pa//
98b4(bstod tshogs): zab mo rjes su sgrogs pa la// kun mkhyen nyid phyir bcom ldan gyis// rmas na ma mtshal zhes gsol pas// sangs rgyas chos kyi zab mo nyid// bsam 'tshal bar bshad pa lags// gal te/
98b5(bstod tshogs): gtso bo de dag kyang // khyod la nus pa rdugs lags na// bdag 'dra srid pa mi gtsang ba'i// srin bus bsam skabs ga la mchis// sA la'i shing chen khyod nyid kyi// yon tan yal ga thugs brtse
98b6(bstod tshogs): bas// btud pa rnams la skye bo 'di// cung zad 'ju ba tsam du bas// char sprin tshogs ni chen po yis// char gyi rgyun rnams phab pa las// so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi// khungs rtas
98b7(bstod tshogs): 'tshal na'ang ci zhig 'tshal// ma dros pa yi mtsho las ni// chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab kyang // de zad bgyid par mi nus ni// gzhan dag 'bab pas smos ci 'tshal// rin chen 'byung khungs rnams
98b8(bstod tshogs): kyis ni// 'jig rten rgyas bgyis bas ma 'tshal// mgon khyod yon tan brjod pa'ang // bdag ni de 'dra kho nar sems// bsgribs nas khyod kyi bstan nyid las// yon tan me tog rnams btus
99a1(bstod tshogs): te// rang gi me tog dag gis ni// shing bzhin khyod la me tog gsol// rang gi dbyigs gis 'byung khungs bzhin// rang gi tshon rtsis ri lta bur// rang gi dri yis tsan dan bzhin// rang gi chu yis
99a2(bstod tshogs): mtsho lta bur// rang las byung ba'i gser nyid kyis// gser 'byung ba yi rin chen bzhin// khyod bsnyen nyid las bkrus pa yi// yon tan rnams kyis khyod mchod do// nam mkha'i dkyil
99a3(bstod tshogs): nas zla 'od thams cad du// 'bros pa ril gyi 'bab 'gyur ma yin la// zla 'das steng bab pas kha phye na// me tog ku mu da tshal mi rgyas min// de bzhin yon tan dpag med chu ldan pa/
99a4(bstod tshogs): rgyal ba'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho mtha' med la// de yi phyogs gcig brjod pas dang ldan pa'i// skye bo'ang 'dod pa'i 'bras bur mi ldan min// sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod tshig 'bras bu yod//
99a5(bstod tshogs): skye ba'i blod zin pa da 'bru dgegs pa lam// tshangs pa'i thag 'byur da sogs yin tan // rgyu ba'i ser rmed la sogs pa yod// dbang po rab tu dade par gsol gyur cing // s+yAng sa rgyas
99a6(bstod tshogs): bstod pa'i gzhung la brtson pa rnams// skud cig re rer chos rkun 'bring ba gang // kun mkhyen min pas cung zad gzung mi nus// mthu bdog mi drug par yang zhugs gyur la// dal 'byor 'di ya
99a7(bstod tshogs): bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba skye le'u dang po'o// // bcom ldan khyod ni zhal bzhugs tshe// bdag ni dang dbang gzhol gyur pa// gang spyad thugs rjes brlan pa yi// sangs rgyas
99b1(bstod tshogs): spyan gyis gzigs mdzad pa// khyod kyi thugs rje de nyid ni// yid la mchis pa mngon bgyis nas// phyag bgyir 'os pa khyod la bdag/ mngon sum bzhin du phyag 'tshal lo// kun mkhyen ma
99b2(bstod tshogs): logs gang gis kyang // kun mkhyen khyod ko ji ltar rtogs// bdag nyid che rgyas bdag nyid kyis// mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lags 'di 'dra'o zhes bgyir khyod// bdag 'dra ba'i
99b3(bstod tshogs): yul ma lags// gang lags gang 'dra 'ang mi sngo ste// khyod 'dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po khyod ni nyid dang 'dra// rgyal rnams ci 'dra khyod dang 'dra// gang 'dra gzhan 'ga'ang ma mchis pa//
99b4(bstod tshogs): de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod ni nyid kyis mkhyen// ji ltar khyod ni khyod 'dras mkhyen// ji ltar khyod gzhan ma 'tshal ba// de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid kyis//
99b5(bstod tshogs): thugs rje stobs bcul stsogs te// yon tan rnams kyis bsgrags mdzad pa// de 'dra rjod la phyug 'tshalalo// deng nas bzung nas rgyud byin// yon tan 'byung gnas med po ga/ de sbyid las sa
99b6(bstod tshogs): btus nas// ci nus khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// mchod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// khyod la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo//
99b7(bstod tshogs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen te// rin chen chos kyi rang bzhin lags// dge 'dun rin chen 'byung gnas te// rin chen gsum tshogs khyod la 'dud// mchod 'os khyod ni rin chen to// thugs kyi
99b8(bstod tshogs): dgongs pa'ang rin chen lags// dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas te// kun nas rin chen khyod la 'dud// rin chen kun gyi mchog gyur pas// rin chen thams cad zil gyis gnon// rin chen
100a1(bstod tshogs): kun gyi 'byung gnas pa// yang dag rin chen khyod la 'dud// phyag 'tshal rin chen thugs khyod la// phyag 'tshal rin chen chos khyod la// phyag 'tshal thams cad rin chen la/
100a2(bstod tshogs): srid med bsgom pa goms mdzad pas// thub pa kun gyi mchog gyur pa// phyag bgyir bos pa'i dgra bcom pa// khyod la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gal bar bgyis par gang lags pa// yang /
100a3(bstod tshogs): dag mtha' la gnas pa po// dge sbyong gi ni mthar phyin pa// khyu med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam pa thams cad phran tshogs pas// mdzes pa gzhan kun zil gnon cing // dus rnams kun
100a4(bstod tshogs): dga' mdzad pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma khyod la 'dud// kha dog bzang la dro'im zhing // blta na sdug la mi ring ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dkar// khe bye khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba'i nyid
100a5(bstod tshogs): rab sbyangs pa// bzhed dgung dag pa pa des pa b+he// sbyid par bskrun pa'i dge sbyong ni// rab gi non byud la phrug 'tshal lo// 'o brtul 'bras bramachis gyur pos// mang byinam pa dag brnye nas //
100a6(bstod tshogs): dam pa gsung bar dam bcas pa'i// dge sbyong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chongs spyod brten cing rig byed dang // rig byed kun gyi yan lag mkhyen// rig dang zhabs kyis bsangs pa yi// tshangs
100a7(bstod tshogs): pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i chos ni ma 'phrogs shing // 'phags pa'i 'phrin las yul du byung // 'jig rten slob dpon bya ba mdzad// 'phags pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs ni
100a8(bstod tshogs): dka' thub brtul zhugs dag/ yang dag blangs pas gtsang mar mdzad// sdig pa thams cad bgrus gyur pa// khrus mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mnga' bdag mchog ni brnyes gyur cing //
100b1(bstod tshogs): Sh+ma m+mA t+yA sh+tsa/ d+hA
100b2(bstod tshogs): sems can thams cung rtsil gyis gnon// sang ge zeng sngags badzad pa// steng ge byu la phyug 'tshal lo// rtogs pa brgyad pa rten gal ne// dam chos sprul ban pa ma /
100b3(bstod tshogs): gzhan thams cad 'jig pa po// glang chen khyod la phyag 'tshal la// chos nyid shin tu dga' ba'i lam// khyod min gzhan gyis mi bzod pa// gsal mdzad gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi// la mthu
100b4(bstod tshogs): rgyud la phyag 'tshal la// des la shin tu dul gyur bzang // thugs dang mdagu bzang stobs dang ldan// yan lag rdugs pa'i sgra mang 'a bru// cang mthun kya la phyag 'tshal la// phyogs
100b5(bstod tshogs): le lo mi mnga' bo// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyang // mchog rab khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang slad khyod bsan mi mchis na// skal ba can yang don ma mchis// de smad kun gyi tshangs spyod du/
100b6(bstod tshogs): gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan phun su mi ldan pa kun// yang dag shin tu yongs rdzogs pas// dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa stan// rgyun bcad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nyid kyi don no yongs rdzogs
100b7(bstod tshogs): shi// gzhan gyi don la mngon btsun pa// dam tshes bdud rtsi stsol ba po// tshim par mdzad pa khyod la 'dud// 'jigs pa du mes 'jigs bying ba// pha rol min pa'i ma sbyangs nas// chub chen po lags
100b8(bstod tshogs): na dang // pi la gshegs pa rtsod la 'dud// nyon pangs na ni kun sel cing // drug rnguthams cad 'byed badzan pa// rig zugs 'thang ba grub pa po// sman pa ga ca pa kyad la 'dug// mchog da ma
101a1(bstod tshogs): lam mkhyen cing // zhi ba'i phyogs ni ston par mdzad// grub dang bde ba bskyed pa yi// ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu mun pa sel mdzad cing // rtag tu spyan ni 'byed par mdzad//
101a2(bstod tshogs): rAg tu mi bsgyel chos mnga' ba// shin tu bzhings pa stod la 'drad// dri ma'i 'dam ni nges bkrus pas// dam chos dri ma med pa'i chu// mchog tu rnam par byang bab// shin tun ma dag khyong la 'dug/
101a3(bstod tshogs): sdig dang bsod nams spangs gyur cing // stong pa nyid kyi bsgos pa'i bdag/ pan dang gnod pa bgyid snyom pa// shin tu chags bral khyod la 'dud// kun nus nyon mongs bag chags kun//
101a4(bstod tshogs): nges par bsal bas dri med thugs// rnam thar sgribs pa mi mnga' ba// shin tu rnam grol khyod la 'drad// bltabs ma ngoms gzugs mnga' zhing // sku ni 'od kyis lha ger mdzes// blta bya kun
101a5(bstod tshogs): gyinang na ni// bltan sdug mchog khyod la 'dud// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni// dpe byad bzang po'i tshogs bcas pa// sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas// blta bar 'os pa khyod la 'dud//
101a6(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas chos ni tha med pa// mi 'jigs pa dang stobs sogs kyis// 'gro ba'i nang du sgra bsgrags pa// dga' bar 'os pa khyod la 'dud// 'phags chos dkar po bla med pa// goms par bya ba/
101a7(bstod tshogs): rnams kyis ni// su gnyis po dag bskos gyur pa// bsgom par bya ba khyod la 'dud// sku gsung thugs kyi 'phrin las rnams// shin tu rnam par byang gyur pas// tshul khrims bsrung ba las
101a8(bstod tshogs): 'das pa// gtsang sbra dag pa khyod la 'dud// nyon mongs pa yi brjod pa spangs// zhi bo'i las kyi mtha' la dgongs// mi gsung dang du bzhes mdzad pa// thub pazhi pa khyod la 'dud//
101b1(bstod tshogs): bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gyis// thugs mi 'phrogs la brtan pa'i thugs// thams cad zil gnon sems can gyi// snying po mchog gyur khyod la 'dud// kun la rnam pa thams cad dang //
101b2(bstod tshogs): rten gyi blo dang dgongs pa dang // legs par gnas phyir mi bsnyel ba'i// chos can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'das kyi yon tan phyug/ 'jig rten zang zing rnam par 'jig/ 'jig rten
101b3(bstod tshogs): sbyang bar mdzad pa po// 'jig rten mgon po khyod la 'dud// bshes dang dgra dang bar mar snyoms// sems can kun la phan dgongs pa// rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa po// thugs rje chen po
101b4(bstod tshogs): khyod la 'dud// chos kyi 'du shes kun rdzogs pa// skyob pa mngon shes chen po mnga'// byas mkhyen ma byas mkhyen pa po// thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la 'dud// glags kyi skabs ni kun spangs shing //
101b5(bstod tshogs): kun nas 'ching ba bcad gyur pa// shes rab gsal bar mdzad pa po// sred pa bsal ba khyod la 'dud// mnyes par bgyi 'os phyag bgyir 'os// brgal bar 'os min nongs mi mnga'// 'bad de
101b6(bstod tshogs): mchod par bgyis 'os pa// rigs pa gsum ldan khyod la 'dud// phan pa ma lags sel mkhas shing // phan pa bskyed par mngon brtson pa// gcig tu brtse bar gzhol ba yi// bshes gnyen
101b7(bstod tshogs): dam pa khyod la 'dud// skye dgu lam log zhugs pa rnams// rtag tu dam pa'i lam la ni// mngon phyogs mdzad par mngon brtson pa// rtsa lag dam pa khyod la 'dud// go 'phangs mkhyen pa rnams kyi
101b8(bstod tshogs): phul// khyod kyis go 'phong mchog brnyes nas// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// de las go 'phang 'phags ma mchis// go 'phang bla na med brnyes nas// sdug bsngal thams cad sel
102a1(bstod tshogs): mdzad cing // ma chags nyer len mi mnga' ba'i// rkang gnyis mchog gyur khyod la 'dud// khyod kyi bstan la ma brten par// 'gas kyang de nyid mi mthong bas// 'jig rten long ba lta
102a2(bstod tshogs): bu yi// mig du gyur pa khyod la 'dud// sa steng gdugs ni ma mchis na// zhugs mchis mer me'ang mchis gyur la// chu sar nor bu zla ba dag/ mchis kyang gsal ba rdzogs mi 'gyur// snang ba de dang /
102a3(bstod tshogs): gzhan dang ni// de bas khyad par chos 'phags pa// mchis kyang khyod ni mi bzhugs na// 'gro ba snang ba mchis ma lags// de ltar 'jig rten ma rig pa'i// mun nag thibs pa'i ling rtog gis//
102a4(bstod tshogs): bsgribs pa'i sems ldan smag gyur pa'i// sgron mar gyur pa khyod la 'dud// tshes la blo gros ma byang bas// phan pa'ang phan par ma 'tshal zhing // gnod pa'ang gnod par ma 'tshal la//
102a5(bstod tshogs): byung ba'ang khyod la brten nas 'gyur// byis pa phal cher gnod pa dag/ dor bar 'tshal la phan pa spong // phan pa gnyer yang ma 'tshal bas// gnod pa so sor bsnyen par bgyid// de dag
102a6(bstod tshogs): thabs ni sngon mdzad phyir// khyod la brten nas gnyis ka yang // yang dag ji bzhin rtogs 'gyur bas// sman par gyur pa khyod la 'dud// gtso khyod gang gi blar gyur pa// de yang 'jig rten bla ma
102a7(bstod tshogs): lags// de slad bla ma rnams kyi yang // blar gyur bla ma khyod la 'dud// 'jig rten mkhas pas mchod pa yang // yid ches ngo bo khyod la mchod// mchod 'os rnams kyis mchod bya ba//
102a8(bstod tshogs): mchod 'os dam pa khyod la 'dud// bsngags 'os bsngags pa gang lags pa'i// skye bo des kyang khyod bsngags te// bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyis kyang // bsngags par gyur pa khyod la 'dud// /
102b1(bstod tshogs): lha rnams kyang ni khyod la 'dud// khyod la drang srong rnams kyang 'dud// phyag bgyir 'os pa rnams kyis kyang // 'dud par bgyi ba khyod la 'dud// sems dang bcas pa su zhig ni// bsod nams zhing ni dpag med pa//
102b2(bstod tshogs): 'dud 'os khyod la phyag bgyid pas// nam zhig na ni ngoms par 'gyur// de lngas khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'dud par 'od pa khyod la 'dud// phyag gi rgyun ni mi 'chad par// rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag
102b3(bstod tshogs): dam pa'i spyod pa lam dang ldan// byas dang ma byam thob pa yang dag rig pa mkhyen// mchod pa che mang 'phyag bgyi bos pa mtshungs med pa// 'dud par 'os pa'i dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpe med yid
102b4(bstod tshogs): 'od sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog tu gsung snyan mngon sgrogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dri med rnam dag thugs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan tshogs bsgoms bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal
102b5(bstod tshogs): lo// zhing zhes bsam pas sangs rgyas la 'dud pa// dri ma med la bkra shis thams cad kyis// char yang mi phod mchod sbyin kun gyis min// dka' thub brtul zhugs min te khrus kun min// thub pa'i dbang
102b6(bstod tshogs): po la 'dud pa// snyan par grags shing dpal du byed// sdig pa thams cad drungs nas 'byin// gzi brjid dag kyang rnam par 'phel// dgra rnams thams cad sel bar byed// 'jig rten dag na mi rnams
102b7(bstod tshogs): kyi// rgyud ni bde 'gror nges byed cing // nges mthar zhi ba'i 'bras bur smin// de ltar yon tan mang bsams shing // lus kyang 'jigs pa'i dang bsams na// mkhas gang sangs rgyas phyag
102b8(bstod tshogs): 'tshal las// lus kyi las gzhan spyad par byed// 'chi bdag sel bar byed pa yi// bstan pa 'di ni nub gyur cing // kun nas mun pas khebs gyur na// gang zhig la ni bkur sti bya//
103a1(bstod tshogs): de lta bas na mtshungs med pa'i// mchod pa bya ba sbyar te gyis// ma 'ongs pa yi 'jigs pa dag/ da lta nyid nas phyung zin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa
103a2(bstod tshogs): bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // nyi ma'i gnyen gyur nyi ma yi// 'od pas shin tu 'od gsal ba// phyag bya kun gyi rab dang mchog/ phyag
103a3(bstod tshogs): 'os phyag bgyis khyod la 'dud// stobs chen dpa' bo chen po pa// mngon shes che la mthu yang che// g.yul ngor mda' chen 'phen mdzad pa// dga' ston chen po khyod la mchod// 'jig rten mchod
103a4(bstod tshogs): 'os mchod 'os mchog/ 'jig rten mchod pas mchod pa po// mchod pa'i snod ni bla med pa// mchod par 'os pa khyod la mchod// mchod dang mkhyen pas rtogs pa brnyes// dgongs pa rgyal
103a5(bstod tshogs): bag mi mnga'// brjed 'os khyod la nga rgyal gyi// sems bor nas ni brjed par bgyi// gus bgyid ma gus pa la snyoms// 'jig rten gus pas mchod bgyis pa// khyod la bkur sting gnol ba yi//
103a6(bstod tshogs): dbang pos gus par bkur sti bgyid// khyod dang 'dra ba 'ga' ma mchis// lhag pa ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de slad sems can kun la khyod// dgra zin snyoms pa'i mnyam med lags// ma 'dres
103a7(bstod tshogs): 'phags pa'i gdung las byung // sangs rgyas kun dang skal ba mnyam// mdog dang shes rab snang ba yis// phyogs rnams snang bar mdzad de 'khrungs// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// mdom
103a8(bstod tshogs): gang 'od kyi 'od zer spro// mtshan dang mthun pa'i dpe byas bzang // brgyad cus 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// rgyal chen dpal dang ldan pa'i sku// kun gyi mdzes pa zil gnon pa// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad
103b1(bstod tshogs): nas ni// nyi ma gzhan zhig lta bur bzhugs// bcom ldan dus kun rtogs pa'i chos// rnam kun 'byung gnas thams cad ni// phyag mthil sku ru ra lta bur// khyod kyi thugs ni spyod yul gyur// chos
103b2(bstod tshogs): rnams g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas// gcig dang sna tshogs so so la// mkha' la rlung dag chub bzhin// khyod kyi thugs ni thogs mi mnga'// bya ba mdzad pa khyod kyis ni// ji ltar thugs bskyed tsam gyis su//
103b3(bstod tshogs): khyod la bzhed dgur kun 'grub pa// de ltar chos dbyings legs thugs chud// dge mthar byin pa khyod la ni// sbyor byung dge ba 'ga' mi mnga'// khyod ni gang zhig bzhed na yang // bzhed pa tsam la
103b4(bstod tshogs): dag las so// chos rnams kyi ni chos yod dang // chos nyid dang ni chos kyi mthu// so sor d+hU dang bcas gnas shing // rkyen dang 'bras bur bcas pa dang // khams dang dbye ba tha dad bcas/
103b5(bstod tshogs): skyedang 'jig bcas rgyas pa de// thams cad so sor rnam kun tu// kun mkhyen khyod kyis mkhyen gzhan min// khyod la shin tu bsgribs pa'ang mngon// shin tu ring ba'ang nye ba ste// shin tu 'dzings pa'ang sa la
103b6(bstod tshogs): gyis dag/ shin tu mthon po'ang dma'ab lags// shin tu gnag pa'ang snang bar bcas// shin tu the tshom gnas kyang nges// shes bya shin tu zab mo yang // khyod las ler gda' ba lags// dbang po
103b7(bstod tshogs): chen po'i glang chen gyis// rked bcings gser las bgyis paltar// chos nyid shin tu zab mos kyang // khyod ni 'o brgyal 'gyur ma lags// chos kyi nang na chags bral ltar// nges 'byin nang na drang po
103b8(bstod tshogs): ltar// phun tshogs nang na sangs rgyas ltar// khyod ni sems can kun gyi mchog/ rnam grol nang na mi g.yo ltar// rigs pa'i nang na chos nyid ltar// shes rab nang na kun mkhyen ltar// khyod ni lus can
104a1(bstod tshogs): kun gyi mchog/ dag pa'i nang na rnam grol ltar// de nyid nang na stong pa ltar// dka' thub nang na bzod pa ltar// khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog/ gzugs kyi nang na khyod sku ltar//
104a2(bstod tshogs): sems kyi nang na khyod thugs ltar// chos kyi nang na khyod chos ltar// khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/
104a3(bstod tshogs): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grub pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// // bde bar gshegs pa khyod gcig pu// chos gcig chos kun snang mdzad pa// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis// de dang ldan
104a4(bstod tshogs): gyi gzhan ma lags// khyod 'ba' zhig gi ye shes kyis// shes bya mtha' dag khyab lags kyi// khyod las gzhan pa thams cad kyi// shes bya kho na lhag pa lags// rgyu rkyen 'di las 'bras bu 'di// 'di las
104a5(bstod tshogs): 'di ni ma yin zhes// gnas dang gnas min nges pa kun// khyod kyis mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis min// las chos yang dag blangs pa yi// rnam smin dus ni thams cad pa// sa kun rtogs pa thams cad ni// rnam kun
104a6(bstod tshogs): khyod mkhyen gzhan gyis min// rnal 'byor sa ni ma lus pa// kun nas nyon mongs rnam gzhag dang // rnam par byang bcas zab mor bcas// khyod gcig kho nas thugs su chud// dbang po mchog dang mchog
104a7(bstod tshogs): min pa// chung dang 'bring dang chen po dang // cha shas dbye ba mtha' yas pa// khyod las gzhan gyis rtogs ma mchis// mthun par 'gyur ba gang lags dang // mi mthun 'gyur ba gang lags pa// mi yi nus
104a8(bstod tshogs): pa sna tshogs kun// khyod gcig kho nas thugs su chud// 'jig rten 'di khams sna tshogs te// sna tshogs khams nyid mtha' dag ni// sna tshogs khams dbye khyod gcig pus// mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis ma
104b1(bstod tshogs): lags so// rgyu dang rkyen ni sna tshogs las// sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam stobs kyis// thams cad khyod kyis thugs su chud// thog med srid par byung ba dang // tha ma med par 'byung
104b2(bstod tshogs): gyur gang // de la khyod kyi ye shes ni// mngon sum bzhin du gzigs pa 'jug/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mthar// 'jig rten yang dag 'grub pa dang // de bzhin nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni// mtha'i la
104b3(bstod tshogs): bar bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// nye 'am yang na ring yang rung // ji ltar khyod la mngon sum pa// de ltar sgrib pa bag chags dang // bcas te khyod kyis spangs pa lags// dngos 'di yongs su ma mkhyen
104b4(bstod tshogs): cing // nyon mongs 'di yi bag chags ni// lhag ma lus shes mi bsnyad pa'i// go 'phang de ni khyod kyis brnyes// khyod kyis bar du gcod gsungs gang // nges par de dag bar du gcod// khyod kyis
104b5(bstod tshogs): lam bstan gang lags pa// de gcig kho na nges par 'byin// de yis par gcod mi nus she'am// de yis nges 'byin mi 'gyur zhes// gzhan gyi klan ka cha shas kyang // de la srid pa ma mchis so// khyod kyis
104b6(bstod tshogs): rgyal bgyi ma rgyal min// shes bya mi snang bgyis ma mchis// dbang phyug khyod nyid kun mkhyen cing // kun rgyal lags kyi gzhan ma lags// stobs ldan 'jigs mi 'gyur bas khyod// mi bsnyengs gang lags/
104b7(bstod tshogs): rigs lags na// mthu mnga' bzhin du 'ga' la yang // khyad du mi gsod gang de rmad// log pa'i nga rgyal can 'ga' zhig/ dregs dang 'bral ba mdzad pa gang // gdul ba yi ni thabs tsam ste// des ni
104b8(bstod tshogs): stobs snyems yod ma lags// 'jig rten dag na stobs ldan pas// kun las rgyal zhes gang brjod pa// de ni gzhan la bstod par bas// go 'phang de ni khyod la rdzogs// 'dren pa khyod la chos 'thun
105a1(bstod tshogs): par// 'gas kyang brgal bar nus ma lags// klan ka btsal 'os ma lags te// nongs mi mnga' ba'i bde ba brnyes// nongs mi mnga' bas gang las byung // bzhi ni bsrung bar bgyi mi mtshal//
105a2(bstod tshogs): po yongs su rdzogs slad du// khyod las sus kyang glags mthod// kun la mi thogs blo gros can// dgongs pa kun tu nye bar gnas// kun la thugs rje snyoms pa po// thugs ni kun la chags mi mnga'// shas
105a3(bstod tshogs): bya'i rgya mtsho kun rgal ba// bag chags thams cad gtan nas spangs// bar chad kun gyi khyad par mkhyen// nges par 'byin pa kun la mkhas// kun gyi bsam pa mkhyen pa po// gdul ba thabs kyi pha rol
105a4(bstod tshogs): gshegs// nyon mongs sna tshogs thams cad kyi// gnyen po la yang bsnyengs mi mnga'// khyod la brten nas smra ba po// byis pa shed bye mgyur gang // de ni ma rig mun pa yi// tshang tshong mi bzad ma thalags
105a5(bstod tshogs): so// khyod kyi bka' la brten nas kyang // bral bar mgyur gang lags pa// de dang de sgrib ces bgyi ste// de dang de sgrib mi zad lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags
105a6(bstod tshogs): pralas stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la bstod pa zhes bya bas de bzhi pa'o// / ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi ba tang // nyes dmigs brjod ldan thos pa ltar// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal me bzad pa'i/
105a7(bstod tshogs): me yis kun tu spar kyang ni// 'gro ba mi shes go bgos pa// de ltar skyo bar 'gyur ma lags// de ltar mgon po khyod kyi bka'// mngon sum pas kyang don gsal rab// chos nyid zab mo gting yangs
105a8(bstod tshogs): pa// bshad pas sa ler gyur lags pas// khyod kyi bka' ni snrel zhi yi// cho 'phrul dag kyang mdzad pa lags// tshig gi mtha' ni ma mthong zhing // don gyi ting yang mi dpogs la// phan tshun
105b1(bstod tshogs): rjes su zhugs pa ni// de las ya mtshan che ci mchis// smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyi bka'// rnam grangs du ma nyid mchis shing // zlos bu yang ni ma mchis la// sbyor ba'i lugs kyang rigs pa lags//
105b2(bstod tshogs): smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyi bka'// gnas pa bzhi yi yon tan ldan// lung bstan bzhi yi rten gyur kyang // don du gnyis su 'gyur ma mchis// gnang ba dang ni dgag pa la// khyod bka' la lar gcig tu nges//
105b3(bstod tshogs): la lar nges pa ma lags la// phan tshun 'gal ba'ang ma mchis so// chos kyi de nyid don slad du// rtsod pa med pa'i go 'phang gzhi// rigs 'thad yon tan bzang po yis// ngan smra thams cad
105b4(bstod tshogs): sun 'byin pa// gcig tu don dmal gzhol la// kun rdzob la yang skyon ma mchis// bden pa gnyis dang mi 'gal bas// khyod kyi bka' ni rigs pa 'byung // nyon mongs med la gcig
105b5(bstod tshogs): tu 'jam// nyon mongs can la nges bslang yang // khyod kyi bka' ni bsnyen pa dang // srid pa'i skyon dang ldan ma lags// rnam par byang ba'i rjes 'thun la// de yi phyogs su lhung mi mnga'//
105b6(bstod tshogs): kun nas nyon mongs dgrar gyur la// mi bzod mi mnga' khyod kyi bka'// smod pa'i tshig ni brgyas gang yang // phyar ka btong ba'i skyon ldan min// rab tu bsngags pa'i tshig phyur kyang // 'ga' la
105b7(bstod tshogs): 'ang rten pa mnga' ma lags// bsnyun dang dor ba mi mnga' la// bsdus dang rgyas pa dang yang ldan// brtags shing 'thad par 'gyur lags la// dang po nas kyang mi bzad min// shin tu snyan gsung
105b8(bstod tshogs): chags mi 'gyur// mngal snying po mchis min// sna tshogs pa la don ma 'khrugs// bka' ni ngo mtshar mang po lags// gsung gi bdag po khyod kyi bka'// yid 'phrog mdzad la zhen mi mnga'//
106a1(bstod tshogs): gzi byin can la gnod mi 'gyur// khyab la ngan pas rtogs ma lags// ba spu dag kyang ldad bgyid cing // rdul yang kun tu 'thon par bgyid// lus rnams dag ni ston bgyid
106a2(bstod tshogs): cing // 'dar ba dag kyang skyed par bgyid// lha yi 'jig rten skyo bgyid cing // sgra yang kun tu sgrogs par bgyid// sa ni rnal mar gnas pa yang // rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid// thog med dus
106a3(bstod tshogs): nas goms pa yi// lus can rang bzhin bzlog mdzad cing // rang bzhin 'dris pa ma lags pa// gzhan ni snying la 'jog par mdzad// rang gi nyes pas mi 'gal la// yid ni gdung bar
106a4(bstod tshogs): bgyid dang 'dra// rigs par zhugs pa mkhas rnams la// bdud rtsi'i char pa bab pa bzhin// khyod kyi bka' ni thog ma dang // bar dang tha mar dge ba dag/ thos dang sems dang sgom pa na//
106a5(bstod tshogs): la ba m+sa gas/ sa du sa/ ba'i pa / gsu ga na ma las/ ba sa
106a6(bstod tshogs): kho na po snyam du go ba gang // de las ya mtshan che ci mchis// de las ngo mtshar che tsa mchis// chos nyid 'dor bar mi mdzad la// 'jig rten kun rdzob dang yang mthun// rjes su sgrogs par mdzad bzhin
106a7(bstod tshogs): du// cig shos rnam par bsgom pa'ang mdzad// kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang mchis// las dang las kyi 'bras bu'ang mchis// de ldan byed du 'jug pa dang // byed pa ma mchis khyod kyi bka'
106a8(bstod tshogs): de ni lha dang mir bcas pa'i// 'jig rten dag gis sngon thos nas// chu yi zla ba g.yo ba bzhin// so sor rab tu g.yos par gyur// bzang dang ngan pa nyid du ni// 'byung bar 'gyur ba tha dad pa//
106b1(bstod tshogs): thams cad rkyen la rag las na// byed po cig mchis 'gyur ram// 'ga' la rang dbang nyid mchis na// byed por 'gyur na de mi rigs// de lha lags pas chos kun la// byed po med par khyod
106b2(bstod tshogs): kyis gsungs// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la// chos 'di stong pa nyid kyi ni// seng ge sgra yis rnga brdungs nas// mtshams bcad bgyis te gnas pa lags// de yis nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du/
106b3(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten snang bar bgyis pas na// de las gzhan pa'i tshig kun ni// shin tu cir yang ma rung gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las gsung
106b4(bstod tshogs): rnam par dag pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// // chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa// 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma// mya ngan 'das zhi zhes bgyi ba// mtshan nyid
106b5(bstod tshogs): 'di gsum chos kyi rgya// smra ba kun gyi yul min pa// mi phyed khyod kyis bzhag pa mdzad// ji skad brjod kyang 'jig rten na// rang bzhin las ni gang zhig 'da'// gal 'dzin pa yis shags la ni//
106b6(bstod tshogs): goms par bgyis kyang su zhig gis// me nyid grang ba lta bur ni// de nyid gzhan du bgyi bar nus// nam mkha' thogs pa med pa la// 'ga' yis rma phyin 'gyur srid kyi// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di la ni// /
106b7(bstod tshogs): chos dang 'thun par 'gal ma lags// chos nyid de nyid mkhyen khyod kyi// dka' la nag po chen po dag/ bstan pas 'di ni mchis grags kyi// smra ba gzhan la mchis ma lags// tha dad lta la
106b8(bstod tshogs): brten pa yis// 'jig rten rnams ni rtsod par lhung // khyod ni gcig pus rtsod med pa'i// gnas kyi go 'phang thugs su chud// long pa rnams ni myo dgyur kyang // mig gcan gzugs rnams mthong
107a1(bstod tshogs): ba ni// ji ltar rtsod par mi 'gyur ba// de nyid khyod dang byis pa'i dpe// chos bzhin gsung ba khyod la ni// 'ga' dang lhan cig rtsod mi mnga'// legs par smra phyir mkhas dang min//
107a2(bstod tshogs): khyad du gsod phyir mi mkhas min// 'dod pa rnams ni mi snang gyur// lta ba'i dra ba rab tu bcom// gzhi ma mchis na ci slad khyod// gzhi ma mchis pa'i rtsod par 'gyur// rgyal thabs brnyes pa
107a3(bstod tshogs): khyod lta bu'i// brtan pa ci zhig rtsod pa mdzad// 'od zer stong ldan ro lta bu'i// mun dang lhan cig ci zhig 'gyed// mkha' la lkug gis 'ju ba bzhin// brtsad pas khyod la rdzi mi 'gyur// rlung gis
107a4(bstod tshogs): bzlog phyogs gtor ba'i rdul// 'thor ba nyid la 'bab cing 'gro/ 'jig rten rnams ni brtags par ltung // yang dag ji bzhin spyod yul khyod// de slad phyin ci log gyur pa// mang po rnams dang
107a5(bstod tshogs): khyod mi mtshung// / dper na lugs dang gser bzhin du// log par mngon par zhen rnams dang // mngon zhe na mi mnga' khyod du ni// lhan cig spun dug la mchis// byis pa rnams ni ma 'tshal te//
107a6(bstod tshogs): du ba bad ga/ men kyad pas paskyed pa// bdagags bdag nyid bdug par ngas// bdagags padag da gas pa ma bac+doMm/
107a7(bstod tshogs): pa yi// gzi byin can la bsngor mi rung // khyod la 'dir brgal dus btab nas// khyod kyis slar gzhan dus btab pa// brtod pa dam pos btags pa bzhin// stan las ldang bar nus ma mchis//
107a8(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis tshogs par bden spu'i bu'i// rgol ba'i mche ba bcag pas na// pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyi// rwa yang bcag pa nyid du 'gyur// pha rol rgol ba kha cig ni// khyod dang phrad nas 'dud par bgyid//
107b1(bstod tshogs): kha cig thag ring slar ldog ste// gzhan dag spyan sngar zhum nas mchis// kha cig khyod kyis dam pa'i chos// bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phab pas// yang dag sgrub pa phun sum gyis// dam pa'i chos la
107b2(bstod tshogs): brten par bgyid// kye ma mgon po thugs rje'i bdag/ kyi hu gti mug nyon mongs ngan// kye hud sred pa rnam par 'phro// kyi hu dang rgyal phung bar byed// de mchos ma yin 'di gsum gyis// skye bo
107b3(bstod tshogs): 'di ni kun dkrugs te// mi bzang rgyun gyis 'das pa bzhin// khyod kyi gzhung dang bral bar bgyid// 'di yi gzhi yis lta ba dang // the tshom la sogs nye nyon mongs// so sor lam gyi bar gcod pa//
107b4(bstod tshogs): kun nas nyon mongs thams cad 'phel// ka la bing ka'i skad thos nas// khwa yi sbrul chags med ltar// khyod kyi chos kyi ro myong na// gzhan gyi tshig la chags mi 'gyur// gang dag chos la rgyu
107b5(bstod tshogs): bshams nas// khyod kyi bka' la zhugs gyur pa// ngan ngon thos pa de la'ang ngo // rnga mo sbrang rtsi bzhin du 'gyur// bden zhing go sla don dang ldan// bsam pa dang ni chu 'phrul bcas// zad mi
107b6(bstod tshogs): shes la 'dor 'dus pa// gcig tu mthu ni chen por ldan// snying po mchog ldan ngo mchog ldan// rnam grangs ldan zhing thabs dang ldan// yongs su rdzogs la ma 'dres pa// gzi brjid dang ldan
107b7(bstod tshogs): grags dang ldan// de 'dra'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i// khyod gsung thos pa su zhig ni// de las bzlog pa gzhan gyi tshig/ rul pa lta bu sdom par bgyid// sdug bsngal yang rung ba de yang rung // don dang mi
107b8(bstod tshogs): ldan gang yin pa// de ni yongs su spang bya zhing // bzlog pa bsten par bya bar gsungs// 'dod dang mi 'dod bsten pa la// de ltar phyed par gsungs khyod kyi// lam mal thang chad smra ba rnams// ji lta bur
108a1(bstod tshogs): na rjes 'brang 'gyur// spyad pa rnams la khyod kyis ni// 'di yi ched du bstan pa gang // de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig gi mtshams rdzogs pa// khyod kyi bka' dang
108a2(bstod tshogs): gzhan gyi tshig/ ji ltar khyad par chi zhugs pa// dug dang bdud rtsi de lta min// mun dang snang ba'ang ma lags so// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ ji ltar khyad par rgyang chad pa// mtho ris ngan
108a3(bstod tshogs): song de lta min// zil dngar smras te bor ba'ang min// de ni tshig tsam snying po ste// 'di ni tshig dang tshig don ldan// de yis khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par bshad// bde bar
108a4(bstod tshogs): gshegs pa khyod dang ni// smra de rnams kyi khyad par gang // de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan gyi tshig gi mtho dman lags// ji ltar srid dang thar pa'i khyad// de ni dpyad du med pa ltar// dpa'
108a5(bstod tshogs): bo khyod kyi bka' dang ni// gzhan tshig khyad kyang de dang 'dra// 'jug dang ldog pa gang lags dang // kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang gang // de nyid dpa' bo khyod bka' dang // gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par
108a6(bstod tshogs): lags// 'di ni gcig pu de bzhin nyid// de ni bslu chos 'ba' zhig na// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ de las khyad zhugs gzhan ci 'tshal// 'di ni gcig pu dge la de// gcig tu bar
108a7(bstod tshogs): chad bgyid lags na// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ de las mi 'dra ci zhig mchis// de yis bsgos shing nyer bsgos pa// 'di yis dag par bgyid 'gyur ba// de nyid mgon po khyod
108a8(bstod tshogs): bka' dang // gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par lags// de kun dam pa ma yin brdol// 'di gcig legs gsungs de yi slad// khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ brtson dang mi brtsan nges pa
108b1(bstod tshogs): lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las rtsod pa mi mnga' bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// // 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la// 'gro 'di'i rang
108b2(bstod tshogs): bzhin gang lags dang // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// so sor gang las mi 'da' ba'i// lugs mthun lugs dang mi mthun pa// tshig bcu gnyis kyi yi ge gnyis// de ni dam chos nyi ma yi// /
108b3(bstod tshogs): nyi ma mchod pa'i 'os su bstan// de nyid rdzus te skye ba yi// srid gcig yan lag ma tshang bas// ji bzhin yan lag so so la// bzhi ru bsgres pas gsum mchod lags// de nyid yan lag tshang ba
108b4(bstod tshogs): las// yi ge bcu gnyis tshig dag gis// bden pa'i lugs su snga ma bzhin// bsgres na rab tu 'gro ba lags// tshangs pa 'di ni khyod bstan la// gang dag ji bzhin bsten bgyid pa// bram ze de
108b5(bstod tshogs): dgra rgyangs 'byur po'o// gas gas ma 'thun paSh+Ti nangs pa lags// mangs pa rnam deng na ngas pa dang // rlungs tshul 'bras burnangs dan// tshangs ma rnag khyod kyi bstan pa las// gzhan
108b6(bstod tshogs): mchis pa ma lags so// tshangs pa'i tshul ni ma mchis par// 'ga' yang bram zer 'gyur ma lags// drang po yi ni lam 'di yang // gzhan ni 'ga' la'ang ma mchis so// rig dang zhabs su ldan pa ni//
108b7(bstod tshogs): tshangs pa lags par bram zes bshad// rig pa de dang zhabs de yang // khyod kyi bstan las gzhan la min// slob dang mi slob rig pa de// zhabs ni de thob bgyid pa lags// gzhan la chos kyi lam de ni// /
108b8(bstod tshogs): ming yang mchis pa ma lags so// gang zhig goms par bgyis pa yis// rigs kun bram zer 'gyur bgyid pa// bdud rtsi'i sgo ni ring zhig nas// bcad pa khyod kyis dbye ba mdzad// lta ba ngan dang
109a1(bstod tshogs): yid gnyis kyis// zin pa bram zer ci zhig 'gyur// khyod kyi gzhung lugs ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis mdud pa 'di mchod// bram ze tshangs pa'i bu yin te// snying dang kha las skyes
109a2(bstod tshogs): zhes pa// 'jig rten gyi ni grags pa de// khyod la 'bras bu bcas par gyur// tshangs khyod tshangs la mkhyod la mnga'// khyod ni bram ze'i khyu mchog ste// nye bar 'dren dang stong pa'ang khyod// khyod ni dus
109a3(bstod tshogs): mchod mdun na 'don// khyod kyis legs par bstan pa yi// bram ze mi gtsang 'gyur ma lags// nye bar drangs pa'i bram ze yang // tshangs pa'i tshul las lhung mi 'gyur// khyod bstan las gzhan
109a4(bstod tshogs): 'ga' la yang // bram zer 'gyur ba'i chos ma mchis// tshangs pa yi ni mchod pa dang // tshangs pa'i lam yang mchis ma lags// tshangs pa'i bden pa gsum dang ni// tshangs pa'i mtshan nyid
109a5(bstod tshogs): rnam gsum dang // tshangs pa'i mchog rab gsum dang ni// tshangs pa'i rigs kyang mchis ma lags// 'jig rten legs bshad ji snyed pa// thams cad khyod kyi bstan las 'byung // skyon med
109a6(bstod tshogs): mngon par brjod pa 'dri// bde gshegs kho na'i ma 'dres pa// khyod las gzhan pa gang dag cig/ ngag las skyon med gda' ba de// thams cad chos kun mkhyen khyod kyi// legs par gsungs pa'i
109a7(bstod tshogs): bram ze lags// srin bus zos pa'i yi ge ltar// 'di las gzhan pa'i legs bshad gang // de ni lcags la gser bzhin du// de la 'tsham pa ma lags so// e raN Da yi shing khrod du// tsan dan
109a8(bstod tshogs): sa mchog bzhag pa ltar// ltag 'og 'gal ba de la de// mchis par su zhig yid ches 'gyur// gang zhig ni ma pa'i shing la ni// a mra'i 'bras bu smin btags pa// de las skyes shes yid ches
109b1(bstod tshogs): te// gzhan la legs bshad yod sems grang // ma la ya las tsan dan bzhin// khyod las gzhan la lhar bcas pa'i// 'jig rten 'di na legs bshad pa'i// rin chen 'byung ba ma mchis so// /
109b2(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las tshangs pa dang mthun par gsung bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// // brgya la res 'ga' gang zhig gis//
109b3(bstod tshogs): mi gsung thugs las chung dgyes pa// rang byung bse ru lta bu rnams// rnam par 'gying zhing bzhud gyur pa// nyams par 'gyur ba'i lam mang bas// rtogs par yang ni rab dka' ba// mya ngan
109b4(bstod tshogs): 'das pa'i lan de n+ti// khyod kyis la mchen stsol du ba tid// de ni glang po che rnams kar// dga' mgur gzhon nu dag dang ni// stobs dang blon sor gnyis pa'i// bud med kyis byung goms par
109b5(bstod tshogs): bgyis// de ni gzi byin ldan pa'i mchog/ khyod la bsten pa'i cho 'phrul te// sangs rgyas kyi ni ma 'dres pa// mthu dpag med pa'i gzi byin lags// kun nas nyon mongs sprul dag gis// rnam pa
109b6(bstod tshogs): du mar zin rnams la// khyod ni spyi yi gnyen po yi// skyon med 'byung gnas ma 'dres pa// 'dod chags la sogs 'bags rnams la// skyon ni skyon med mdzad khyod kyis// mi sdug sgom pa la sogs pa'i//
109b7(bstod tshogs): chos kyang rab tu bstan pa mdzad// khyod kyis lam gyi tshogs kyi chos// dge ba zag bcas bstan mdzad pas// dngos po rnams kyi nang gi ni// phan tshun khyad par dag kyang bstan// de yang nye
109b8(bstod tshogs): ba'i nyon mongs dang // 'bags phyir spyi yi rnam par bcom// dur khrod mgal ba'i yog pa ltar// de dag ye shes me la bsregs// byang chub pa yi snga rol du// 'jug pa bde ba'i rgyu chos bstan// /
110a1(bstod tshogs): de nas byang chub brnyes nas ni// ldog pa bde ba'i chos kyang bstan// sangs rgyas nas kyang dge ba'i chos// zag bcas de dag ma bshad min// phal cher mya ngan 'das pa yi//
110a2(bstod tshogs): rgyu mthun nyid du yongs su bsngos// khyod kyis gang las 'gro ba dag/ ma drangs rgud pa de gang mchis// gang dang 'jig rten ma spyad pa'i// phun tshogs de yang gang zhig mchis// khyod kyis yid
110a3(bstod tshogs): gnyis mdud pa bcad// lte ba ngan pa'i tsher ma dkrugs// srid pa'i dug gi lcug ma bsregs// khro ba'i dug kyang thams cad bcom// ma rig pa yi ling tog bsal// nga rgyal gyi ni rgyal mtshan
110a4(bstod tshogs): bsgyel// sems kyi zab rnams kyang bcom// rnam par 'ching ba rnam par gtubs// mdud pa thams cad rnam par bgrol// chu bo la ni gzings kyang bcas// khyod kyis chu bo rnams kyi gzhi//
110a5(bstod tshogs): mtsho chen gang lags de yang bskums// skyon dang snyigs ma yon po dag/ sems la mi mngon 'grus bgyid pa// kun nas nyon mongs dug shing gi/ rtsa ba khyod kyis drungs nas phyung //
110a6(bstod tshogs): phyin cig log gis 'tshal ba yi// ngan pa'i lam ni thams cad bcad// 'chi med bgrod pa gcig pa yi// dpal ldan lam ni drang po phye// gzhan dag gdul bar bgyi ba yi// skyon brgyad las ni nges
110a7(bstod tshogs): drangs nas// 'dod pa'i yan lag brgyad ldan pa// cang shes bzang po'i gnas su bkod// kun nas nyon mongs srin 'khrug pa'i// mi gtsang rgyan nas drangs nas kyang // nyon mongs min pa'i yan
110a8(bstod tshogs): lag can// dri med chu la 'phyo ru stsal// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims skyon bsal nas// tshul khrims kyi ni byug pas byugs// ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa'i// dri med gos kyis dgab pa
110b1(bstod tshogs): mdzad// dam pa'i chos rgyan dkar po ni// sba ba dag gis brgyan mdzad nas// de dag bsam gtan seng ge'i khri// chen po'i rkyen du 'bab la bzhag/ byang chub yan lag me tog ni// zag
110b2(bstod tshogs): med dri zhim rnams kyis gtor// chos kyi dga' ba 'phags pa'i ros// zang zing med pas tshim par mdzad// srid pa'i bran ni 'tshe mang ba// thog ma med pa las bton nas// nyid kyi sras po
110b3(bstod tshogs): gtan du ni// nyams pa med pa kho nar mdzad// gzhan dag ma 'ongs dus na ni// rang rgyal ba yi snod du mdzad// gzhan dag theg pa chen po yi// rgyal tshab mchog tu dbang yang bskur//
110b4(bstod tshogs): chos kun gyi ni tshig mkhyen cing // don rnams kun gyi gzhi la mkhas// skad kyi dbye ba kun mkhyen cing // phyogs rnams kun tu spobs dang ldan// nga ni mgon med khyed rnams kyi//
110b5(bstod tshogs): grogs su gyur pa zhes sgrogs shing // thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba ni// mtha' dag 'khyud pa bzhin du bzhugs// ston pa thugs rje che mnga' ba// brtse bar ldan zhing thugs brtser mdzad// der brtson
110b6(bstod tshogs): le lo mi mnga' ba// khyod dang 'dra ba gzhan su mchis// khyod ni sems can kun gyi mgon// spyi yi rtsa lag bzang po lags// mgon du khyed bzhugs ma 'tshal bas// de slad skye bo bying bar 'gyur//
110b7(bstod tshogs): gang zhig yang dag blangs nas ni// za shal bas kyang grogs nus pa// grogs byed pa yi chos dag ni// khyod las gzhan pa 'gas mi rtogs// phyi yi yan lag stobs kun ni// khyod kyis yid
110b8(bstod tshogs): dag bsgrubs lags te// nang gi stobs dag ma tshang bas// byis pa rnams ni sdug bsngal bsten// 'jig rten spyod pa med dang sbyar// chos nyid zab pa dang yang sbyar// dman la mos pa nyid dang spyar// lam ni ngan pa
111a1(bstod tshogs): mang dang sbyar// thog med dus nas goms pa yi// brel ba dang gis 'byung dang sbyar// bgom pa 'bad pa chen pos kyang // thob par dka' ba dang sbyar na// 'jig rten
111a2(bstod tshogs): du ni khyod lta bu// chos dkor yang dag blang ba yi// dngos po gsal bar ston pa'i rtsa// bzang po gol te ma byung na// 'gro kun mun par 'gyur lags te// mi 'dod tshor ba byung ba yis// /
111a3(bstod tshogs): nyam thag 'o dod cher 'bod pa'i// ngan song rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur// khyod la gang gis 'gro rnam gsum// de ni gzhan gyis sgrub par bas// khyod ni dgra bshes par ma la// bshes mchog
111a4(bstod tshogs): nyid du brtse bar mdzad// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las phan par mdzad par bskyod pa zhes b+ha ba s+ye le'u brgyad pa'o// // bgo bshal
111a5(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa'i chos nyid ni// khyod gcig pu la rdzogs mnga' yi// gzhan la phan gdags bgyi ba la// skye bo gzhan ni tshogs shing mchis// khyod kyi slob ma bsdu ba yi// dngos la mkhas par
111a6(bstod tshogs): gda' ba gang // de yang rdzogs par mi mkhas pas// khyod kyi cha shas rjes su 'brang // bcom ldan khyod kyi zang zing gi/ bgo bsha' srog gi bar lags te// dam pa'i chos kyi bgo bsha'
111a7(bstod tshogs): ni// slob dpon dpe mkhyud bral ba lags// khyod ni bgo bsha' bgyi ba'i las// bla na med pa'i mdzad pa'o// phun sum thams cad rdzogs mnga' ba// khyod ni btang bar bgyi ma lags//
111a8(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba phal cher mi bzad pa// gzhan la gnod pa bgyid par dga'// khyod ni 'jig rten rang bzhin te// rgyun las bzlog pa'i phyogs su 'jug/ byas pa gzo gang de dag nyung // phan 'dogs bgyi/
111b1(bstod tshogs): ba 'ga' tsam ste// de yang phal cher re ba can// khyod gcig dag pa'i chos can lags// phan btags pa yis khyod mi 'jug/ gnod pa bgyis pas lkog ma lags// skul pa mchis shes//
111b2(bstod tshogs): thams cad la// khyod ni mnyam pa nyid du 'jug/ mtshan mo me tog ku mu da// kha 'bye 'gyur zhing pad+ma zlum// nyin par pad+ma kha 'bye zhing // cig shos zum par 'gyur mod kyi// 'on kyang /
111b3(bstod tshogs): nyi ma zla ba yi// 'od la phyogs su lhung ma mchis// de nyid khyod kyis byis pa dang // mkhas pa dag la bsten pa'i dpe// gang tshe mgon khyod mdzad pa ni// thams cad gzhan don kho nar bas//
111b4(bstod tshogs): dpag med phan pa mdzad pa po// khyod la lan cis lon par 'gyur// sems can dar bar mi 'gyur ba'i// sgrub pa khyod la 'ga' mi mnga'// khyod kyi dbugs phyung tsam yang ni// 'gro la phan dang /
111b5(bstod tshogs): bde ba bskyed// sangs rgyas dbugs ni phyung ba'i ngad// dri kun zil gyis gnon mdzad pa// tshor na zhe 'grus gyur pa yang // khyod la dang ba bskyed par bgyid// sangs rgyas dbugs kyi dad bab na/
111b6(bstod tshogs): bag med pa yi lha rnams kyang // lha yi yul yang spangs nas ni// 'dul ba dag la mngon phyogs 'gyur// khyod las dam pa'i chos mnyan pas// thams cad tshim par 'gyur ma 'tshal// de skad
111b7(bstod tshogs): dam pa'i don du na// khyod nyid ngoms 'gyur tshim mdzad lags// skye dgu rnams la char bzhin du// khyod ni mkhas pa kun gyi gsos// 'di ltar khyod kyi gsos 'gyur gang // de dang de ni mchis ma
111b8(bstod tshogs): lags// dgrongs par mtshal ba rnams la yang // khyod kyi phan dgongs ci 'dra ba// de blo ma sbyangs byis pa yis// yid ches bgyi bar nus ma lags// khyod ni spang ba rnams la yang // legs
112a1(bstod tshogs): pa ci 'dra sgrub mdzad pa// sa de yid la smon pa'i yang // yul las 'das par gyur pa lags// la la phan 'dogs mdzad pa yi// ro mchog rtogs pa de dag kyang // khyod kyi
112a2(bstod tshogs): chos kyi bgo skal la// spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnyen lags so// gal te sems can 'di dag gis// khyod mnga' thugs rje'i dgongs pa 'tshal// khyod kyi bstan pas 'tsho bzhin du// kun tu
112a3(bstod tshogs): 'bar ba'i mer yang 'jug/ gang slad bdud kyi dgras thebs pas// rtogs par mi 'gyur de slad du// khyod kyi bstan las 'gal bgyid pa'i// byis pa rnams ni bdag nyid 'gums// khyod kyi bstan
112a4(bstod tshogs): las gzhan phyogs pa// g.yang sa chen po'i mun pa dang // yongs su gdung ba myong ba rnams// kye ma yun ring 'khyam par 'gyur// khyod kyi chos la mi phyogs pa'i// skye bo gti mug gis
112a5(bstod tshogs): ldongs pa// srid rtse'i bar du son nas kyang // sdug bsngal yang 'byung srid pa sgrub// khyod kyi bstan pa'i rjes 'gro ba// bsam gtan dngos gzhi ma thob kyang // bdud kyi mig ras btsa' bzhin
112a6(bstod tshogs): du// srid pa dag ni zlog par bgyid// khyod kyis dang por lta bu yi// bdud kyi me tog rgyal mtshan bsnyal// de nas nyon mongs bdud kyi ni// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan mthon po brtib// khyod kyis byang chub
112a7(bstod tshogs): ma brnyes par// 'dod khams dbang phyug las rgyal te// byang chub bar chad med lam la// khams gsum dbang phyug las rgyal lo// dbang phyug khyod nyid 'jig rten 'dir// dpa' bo rnams kyi
112a8(bstod tshogs): dpa' rab ste// nyod mongs dbang gyur skye bo la// dpa' ba'i rab tu gang zhig rtsi// khyod kyis rang gzhan gnyis ka yi// rgyun la nyon mongs sde bcom pas// khyod las dpa' mchog gzhan dang ni//
112b1(bstod tshogs): mi bzad g.yul rgyal gzhan ma mchis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las lan mi lon par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dgu pa'o// // spyan gyi
112b2(bstod tshogs): yon tan mthon mthing dang // dkar gnag gsum po gang lags pa// de la gtsor bcas 'jig rten gyi// yon tan rnams kyis khyad mi khor// sgros gong dpal gyis bla na med// 'og ma dpal mnga'/
112b3(bstod tshogs): gnyis ka yang // 'byung dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa bla na med// de dag 'ga' zhig ma mchis na// zla mthun 'ga' yang ma mchis pas// gong ma gang gis lhag gnas
112b4(bstod tshogs): gyur// 'og ma'ang gang gi gzhi bor 'gyur// khyod kyi sgos ni dpal gyi gnas// phan tshun 'tsham par gyur pa 'di// e ma'o legs par zung du 'brel// e ma'o 'phrod pa bla na med// ston pa'i
112b5(bstod tshogs): dus na g.yo 'gyur zhing // gsal ba nyid la g.yo mi mnga'// tshems kyi zla ba shar ba'i dpal// nang nas bag tsam gda' 'gyur ba// nyid kyi gnas nas 'byung ba'i sgra// me tog bzhin du 'grems
112b6(bstod tshogs): mdzad cing // gzhan gyis nye bar bskyed rnams kyi// 'gro ba'i lam la phan 'dogs pa// zangs zhun 'od 'dra 'di dag gi/ dpal 'bar 'di yi zad na ni// bin pa'i 'bras bu mtshams sprin dang //
112b7(bstod tshogs): ut+pal dmar mdzes ro dang 'dra// khyod kyi sgros ni mdzes bskyod pa// gang gis mthong ba de dag gis// legs par mig rnyed de dag gis// mthong ba'ang 'bras bu mchis pa lags// mgon po mu tig phreng
112b8(bstod tshogs): bas min// kun ta ku mu ta phreng min// gang can rtse mo sbrengs pa'i lus// zla ba'i 'od kyis bab pas min// ston ka'i chu bo sun 'byin pa// mkha' 'gro dkar po'i phreng bas min// sprin med mkha' la
113a1(bstod tshogs): lhag ge ba// ston ka'i zla ba tshes pas min// dul ba khyod kyis tshems rnams kyi// phreng ba 'od gsal dkar 'di la// mar me'i 'od kyis nye 'od bzhin// cha shas su yang phod ma
113a2(bstod tshogs): lags// rdo rje myu gu'i phreng ba la// 'phags pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ros// brlan pas bsgos pa 'di dang ni// 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i dngos ci mchis// ku mud zla kun da sogs// dkar po'i dper
113a3(bstod tshogs): brjod bzhi po dag/ khyod kyi tshems phreng byang gyur nas// thabs ni shor ba lta bur gda'// 'jig rten du ni 'di byung bas// dkar po dang ni mdzes pa yi// rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus pa// dri ma
113a4(bstod tshogs): can dang 'dra bar gyur// khyod kyi ljags dang spros par na// 'di dag thags bzang gnas pa ni// rtogs dang zhi ba'i bar dag na// rnam par grol ba bzhin du mdzes// khyod kyi dpal gyis 'gro ba 'di//
113a5(bstod tshogs): tshems kyi phreng bas zil mnan par// gzigs nas rgyal bar gyur to zhes// ru mtshon lta bur mche ba sbreng // khyod kyi mche ba mnyam pa zlum// mdzes shing rtse mo rnod dkar ba// dpe kun thabs kyis mnan nas ni
113a6(bstod tshogs): 'bar ba bzhin du gnas pa lags// zla ba tshes pa 'jig rten na// yon por gsal gyur gang lags te// khyod kyi mche ba mi yo zhing // mdzes pa'i lus can rnams kyis bgyis// tshes pa'i gnas skabs
113a7(bstod tshogs): mche ba yis// nya ba zhal ras bzang po yis// kham pa 'phral bas 'khyil pas ni// 'dom gang 'od kyis zil mnan te// thub pa zla ba khyod kyi ni// gzugs kyi yon tan phun tshogs pas// zla ba'i
113a8(bstod tshogs): yon tan phun sum kun// gnas skabs kun du nyams par bgyi// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi sku// gser gyi pad+ma'i snying po ltar// ba spu g.yas 'khyil nyag re ba// 'jam la dri med gyen du
113b1(bstod tshogs): 'khrungs// snum la ma 'dzings ma 'khrugs pa// in+d+ra nI la'i rngams lta bur// sngon pos rin chen bskyil ba ni// phra mo lta bur spras par gda'// skyes bu glang chen khyod kyi ni// glang po che mtshan ma
113b2(bstod tshogs): 'dres gang // nang dang phyi yi dri ma yis// shin tu nye bar me gos gang // khyod kyi yan lag rgyan 'dra gang // yan lag mdzes pa de legs te// lhad med gser las blugs pa yi// khor yug lta bur
113b3(bstod tshogs): gnas pa lags// rang gi dbyibs ni mdzes pa yi// cang shes gtso bo thams cad kyi// skyes kyi mtshan ma mdzes pa dag/ zil gyis mnan te gnas pa gang // mgon po tshangs spyod gnas
113b4(bstod tshogs): s+yA dang // dbubs kya shin d+hamangs spyad d+ha// rgyud kyis sgrub da lags shing // s+yAbang b+hab ldan pa 'ang lags// thugs rdzas tshum rgyun rnamastsal// ts+tshed kris mtshan mag sa
113b5(bstod tshogs): sprin mthongs zla ba'i gzugs lta bur// shin tu lam mang bstan pa gang // ngo tsha shes dang khril yod ri// mi g.yo bstod pa ltar mdzad nas// thugs rje chen po'i mig gis ni// blo yi yul du mdzad pa gang // dal
113b6(bstod tshogs): gyis 'bab pa'i pad+ma ni// cung zad kha bye'i ze ba'i tshogs// mgon po yan lag mdzes khyod kyi// mdzes pa de la des mi bskyod// dpal ldan zla ba nya ba la// 'khyil par gnas pa mchis na yang //
113b7(bstod tshogs): 'on kyang yan lag mchog khyod kyi// dpe yi gzhi bor rdzogs mi 'gyur// bsod nams brgya phrag rgya chen gyi// las kyis sprul pa mdzes lam la// de las gzhan pa'i sems pa yis// 'phangs pas
113b8(bstod tshogs): yong yang rjes slebs sam// nyid kyi sbubs dang na bza' dang // sdom pas shin tu bkab kyang ni// mtshan gzhan phun sum tshogs pa yis// gsal bar gyur pa lta bu lags// yan lag dam
114a1(bstod tshogs): pa ldan khyod kyi// yan lag mchog gyur de la ni// mgos btud yid rab dang ba dang // ngag gis kyang ni mchod par bgyi// dad par bgyi ba rnams kyi mchog/ blta bas
114a2(bstod tshogs): mi ngoms khyod la ni// gal te khong khro bgyid mchis na// mun nag tha shal ngan pa lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las sku'i phyogs gcig
114a3(bstod tshogs): la bstod pa zhes bya ba sde le'u bcu pa'o// // sems can rnams kyi mos pa ni// khams rnams ji bzhin gnas lags pas// re zhig bdag gi bsam pa ni// yangs pa'i ljags la rgya cher
114a4(bstod tshogs): dang // su zhig mgo dang yid dngon// ngag gis ljags yangs mchod mi bgyid// de ni gsung rab 'di kun gyi// yum ste rin chen bskrun pa lags// bdag la gtso bo khyod kyi ni// mdzad pa zla med
114a5(bstod tshogs): thams cad kyi// nang na yangs pa'i ljags 'di ni// bla na med pa'i phul du gda'// 'gro la bstan pa rab sgrogs pa// chos kyi phrin las mdzad slad du// rgyal po bzhin du mtshan kun gyi//
114a6(bstod tshogs): nang na gtso bo lags par gnas// gzhan gyi the tshom bcad skad du// gang zhig zhal nas mngon phyung na// ston gyi mtshams sprin tshogs lta bur// zhal ras zla ba khebs pa lags// de ltar yangs
114a7(bstod tshogs): shing mdzes pa de// tshems kyis gtams pa'i zhal nang du// dogs pa med par gnas pa yang // de las ya mtshan che ce mchis// de ni nges par dpag med pa'i// mthu can bzang po de yi ni// shin tu
114a8(bstod tshogs): 'jam pa nyid dang ni// mnyen pa nyid kyi mthu lags so// khyod zhal 'brug sgra sgrogs pa na// 'dzam bu'i chu gser zhun ma ltar// zangs bzhu ba yi 'od lta bu// glog phreng 'grub lta bur mdzad// bslab
114b1(bstod tshogs): pa bzang po phun sum gyi// rgyal thabs lta bu brnyes nas ni// khyod kyi zhal nas bag yangs su// gnas gzhan dag tu rol zhing spyod// gang gi dri zhim tshor nas 'di// me tog bsrung bya zhes
114b2(bstod tshogs): sgrogs pa// gsung gi me tog skyon med pa// de dag 'dis ni 'groms par mdzad// de nyid slad du rgyal khyod las// mchog tu ston pa'i gsung snyan 'byung // de yi dri rab zhim pas khyod//
114b3(bstod tshogs): na pa gsung shes rnam par grags/ sa T+Tas pa 'dug// bdud tshul bar rabamyigs pa/ dmas ga rnaMs sa sno pani/ dgags so// gdugs ra
114b4(bstod tshogs): bcas 'jig rten du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de// nyid kyi 'o brgyal mi gzigs pa// dge ba 'di yis bgyis pa lags/ gang gis rin chen bkram pa ltar// legs par bshad pa brgyas bkang nas/
114b5(bstod tshogs): 'jidzig rten di ni snang bgyis pa// de ni 'di yi mthu lags so// rigs dang spyod par mngon brjod pa// chos kun gsung ba'i 'phags pa ste// dpag bas ma ljon pa'i lhag ma ltar// rin rgyun
114b6(bstod tshogs): sna tshogs 'bras bu stsol// ljags yang sa med par 'jig rten na// kun mkhyen nyid ldan spobs pa ni// so so yang dag rig pa yi// spobs pa'i khur ni skye yis bkur// khyod kyis dgongs
114b7(bstod tshogs): te de la ni// chos ni gang dag gang bshad pa// 'di ni snyoms las mi mnga' bar// me tog bzhin du phreng bar brgyud// gal te 'di yis ma bstan na// khyod la kun mkhyen mngar sus 'tshal// /
114b8(bstod tshogs): thugs rje chen po mnga' bar sus// yon tan gzhan yang mngar sus mtshal// bstan pa dag ni ma mchis na// khyod 'dra'i mkhas pa mngon mi 'gyur// bstan pa yang ni ljags yangs la//
115a1(bstod tshogs): gzhung la dngos grub bzhin du brten// rnam pa sna tshogs chos gsung zhing // rnam pa sna tshogs ro bstar yang // 'dam rdzab kyis ni nam mkha' bzhin// ro la chags pas gos
115a2(bstod tshogs): mi mnga'// mi gsung bzhugs pa'i rjes su 'thun// gsung ba la yang skyon mi mnga'// mi mthun chos ni gnyis ka la/ gcig tu yang ni 'thun pa lags// mi gsung bzhugs na spro mi mdzad//
115a3(bstod tshogs): ston par mdzad la skyo ma mnga'// cang mkhyen nyid kyis dge ba ste// thams cad la ni snyoms par 'jug/ 'di ltar thams cad gsung spyod pa// chos rnams 'ba' zhig bka' stsol ba// spyod pa la ni 'jug pa
115a4(bstod tshogs): 'tshar// rigs pa la yang gzhol ba mtshar// 'byung ba las gyur bsod nams dang // chos gsung ba yi rang bzhin gyis// sangs rgyas pa yi dri zhim pa// gnyis kyis rtag tu bsgos pa lags// mig gi/
115a5(bstod tshogs): spyod yul dag pa dang // bsod nams snyan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// shin tu rnam par grags pa yi// snyan pa gnyis kyi phyogs su grags// gang gis skyon kun med pa 'di// zhal nas phyung ba mthong gyur
115a6(bstod tshogs): po// skye bo de dag mig dang ldan// mig de dag kyang dpal dang ldan// gang gis de yi gsung snyan pa// mngon sum rna ba'i snyim pa yis// bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang 'dra 'thungs pa// mkhas pa de dag ches dpal
115a7(bstod tshogs): ldan// sgra rnams brgyan par mdzad pa bzhin// sgra yis sa rnams brgyan pa bzhin// bshad pa mdzad na khyod kyi zhal// shin tu sba bar mdzad pa bzhin// 'di ni nyid mdzes yon tan gyis// thub pa khyod kyi zla
115a8(bstod tshogs): zhal ni// 'jig rten rgyan du gyur pa yang // lhag pa'i rgyan du gyur par gda'// 'dog dang dbyibs dang snyan gsung dang // shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang 'thus// ljags yang sa lta bu gzugs can gyi//
115b1(bstod tshogs): rdzas ni 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo // gal te lha mo dbyangs ldan ma// de ni gzugs can 'ga' mchis na// ston kun med pa'i yan lag can// ljags yangs 'di ni de lags grang // yangs pa'i
115b2(bstod tshogs): ljags kyis chos kyi rnga// kun tu rdung bar zhugs pa'i tshe// lha dang mi yi sgra rnams ni// thams cad ro bro med par 'gyur// ston pa khyod dang ljags 'di dang // bla na med pa'i bka' 'di ni// nyon mongs
115b3(bstod tshogs): dug kun 'joms pa yi// yan lag gsum ldan sman gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las ljags la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o//
115b4(bstod tshogs): khyod dang 'dra ba'i zhing dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// khyod ni sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog/ gral gtsang mdzad pa'i gtsang ma lags// nam mkha' mthar thug ma mchis pa'i// chungs
115b5(bstod tshogs): zhing dag ji lta bar// khyod la sman gnod bgyid pa yi// rnam par smin pa thug ma mchis// gang dag khyod la bar mar gnas// de yang re zhig tshad med pa'i// mun pas bsgos pas ma rung na/
115b6(bstod tshogs): skye bo log bgyid spros ci 'tshal// ji ltar bla med yon gyi gnas// khyod la yang dag sgrub bgyid pa// las gang lags pa de yi ni// dang ba'i mthar thug mi mthong la/ yang dag
115b7(bstod tshogs): slob pa'i mthar byon pa// khyod la log par zhugs pa gang // las de rgud pa'i mthar yang ni// de bzhin thug pa ma mchis so// gang gis rnam pa thams
115b8(bstod tshogs): cad du// stobs ldan khyed lam btsas pa// rab tu mtshams ni mi zin pa'i// ma rabs mi rtag nyid reng na// kye ma'o 'khor ba bdag nyid ngan// e ma'o mya ngan 'das pa ni// khyod 'dral
116a1(bstod tshogs): blugs rje'i bdag nyid can// mnga' mdzes pa'ang de ru gshegs// ma'ongs 'jigs pa rnams kyang gsungs// chos kyi tshul yang bshad pa mdzad// 'khor ni rnam pa
116a2(bstod tshogs): bzhi pa yang // mi 'jigs pa dag thob par mdzad// lam bzang 'dren bsrung ska du// blo gros sbyangs pa bgyis gyur po// 'di spangs che dang kun dga' dang // de la sogs pa bsgos med kyi/
116a3(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten gyi ni mig gcig pra// rnam med pa khyod rnguban// snang ba mchis byung 'jig nan 'di// smin pas khabs dang 'dra ba lags// bde bar gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi// bka' 'di la
116a4(bstod tshogs): la khyod kyisas// sras kyi dam pa slob pa dang // mi slob 'di yang brjes med kyi// 'gro ba'i mugon khyod mi bzhugs na// gza' sar gsal bas mtshan pa ste// nam mkha' skabs song pa bzhi//
116a5(bstod tshogs): shin tu bad+mag gis ma mchis so// khyod mi bzhugs nA gsung rab 'di// klu 'phos pa yi mtsha yi dpal// ring ba mi thogs 'jig bltar// mtsham pa'i snying po dang bral bas// yon
116a6(bstod tshogs): gzi yang mi dpa' la// cho ga gzhan dang lugs gzhan gyis// 'phan dang rma yang phyug lags pas// lus kyi brjid kyang yal dun// sangs rgyas mnga' dbang bskur ba rnams// yongs su mya ngan
