116a7(bstod tshogs): 'das bsams na// srid pa ral gri 'bar 'dral// su zhig 'jigs par mi bgyid lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las srid pa las skyo bya
116a8(bstod tshogs): bskyed par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mi hra tsi tsas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
116b1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po sar+b+ba dz+nyA de ba dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / sAn ngag rtso ma la skal chen po// khyod la brten nas bdag gi blo//
116b2(bstod tshogs): dbyar ka yi ni chu bo ltar// chung ngu'ang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur// mi yi rnyed pa rnyed dka'i dang // lce 'di rnyed par gyur nas ni// mgon de'i yon tan sgrogs byed pa'i// rang la phan pa su mi byed//
116b3(bstod tshogs): khyod sku mtshan gyis spras gyur pa// mdzes gyur mig gi bdud rtsi ni// sprin med stong ka'i nam mkha' la// skar ma'i tshogs kyis spras pa 'dra// thub pa gser gyi mdog ldan pa// chos gos kyis
116b4(bstod tshogs): g.yogs mdzes gyur pa// gser gyi ri bo'i rtse mo ni// mtshams kyi sprin gyis dkris pa 'dra// mgon khyod rgyan gyis ma brgyan yang // zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mdangs gang yin// zla ba'i dkyil
116b5(bstod tshogs): 'khor rgyas gyur pa// sprin dang bral la de ma mchis// khyod kyi zhal gyi pad+ma dang // pad+ma nyi mas kha phye ba// bung bas mthong na pad+ma ni// the tshom dpyad thag la 'ju 'gyur// khyod zhal gser gyi mdog ldan
116b6(bstod tshogs): par// tshoms dkar mdzes par gyur pa ni// gser gyi ri gseb ston ka yi// zla zer dri med zhugs pa 'dra// mchod 'os khyod kyi phyag g.yas ni// 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis mdzes gyur pa// 'khor bas
116b7(bstod tshogs): skrag pa'i mi rnams la// phyag gis dbugs 'byin mdzad pa lags// thub khyod gshegs par gyur pa'i tshe// zhabs gnyis dpal gyi pad+ma 'dras// sa gzhi 'di ni bris gyur pa// pad+ma can gyis ji ltar mdzes//
116b8(bstod tshogs): khyod ni gshegs stabs mnyam med de// glang chen mchog ni myos pa dang // rang pa chung mar ldan pa 'am// khyu mchog pas kyang brtan par gshegs// tshul khrims phung pos sku cha zhing // ting 'dzin
117a1(bstod tshogs): shing gis rnam par brgyan// ye shes 'bab chus khyab gyur pa// rgyu ba'i gangs can ri bo lags// yon tan rgya mtsho khyod gang gi/ lus kyi khyod la reg gyur pa// lha dang mi yis
117a2(bstod tshogs): mchod gyur pa'i// 'bab stegs su ni de de mdzad// khyod kyi gnas ni grub pa'i zhing // mthong bas sems dag gyur lags na// dag par 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams// sgra ngan zhing gis ci zhig bya//
117a3(bstod tshogs): khyod ni pha rol phyin drug dang // ldan pas yang dag mdzes gyur pa// zla ba rgyas par gyur pa ni// smin drug gis ni brgyan pa 'dra// gdul bya'i skye bo pad+ma ni// gnyid log khyod kyis sad mdzad pa// nyi ma/
117a4(bstod tshogs): shar bar gyur pa yis// pad+ma kha byer byed pa 'dra// nyon mongs dug gis zin gyur la// khyod ni ye shes sman stsol ba// mche ba'i dugacag gyis zin la// 'gro skyob kyi ni drug bsal mtshungs
117a5(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi ye shes nags me yis// lta ba'i dra ba bsregs gyur la// nags me shin tu 'bar ba yis// shing gi lcug phran bsregs dang mtshungs// ye shes rang bzhin 'bar ba yis// thub khyod
117a6(bstod tshogs): nyi mas nyon mongs pa'i// rang bzhin 'dam ni skems mdzad pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs// khyod kyi gsung gis mi yi sems// bya ba ma yin las zlog pa// kha lo sbyar chen zhags pa
117a7(bstod tshogs): yis// ba lang mi 'khrul zlog dang mtshungs// gal te re ba khyod gcig pu// nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol na// 'on kyang gzhan dag grol mdzad pas// phal cher mchod 'os nyid du 'gyur//
117a8(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi gsung gi 'od zer gyis// nyon mongs kyis gdungs tshim mdzad pa// so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa la// mtshan mo'i zla zer ji bzhin no// gdul bya'i skye bo chos kyis ni// sgom gdungs
117b1(bstod tshogs): khyod zhal rtog pa ni// khug rta skom gyis gdungs pa ni// dbyar gyi char sprin tshogs ltar mtshungs// khyod gsung chos kyi sku yis ni// gdul bya kun la dga' mdzad pa// snyan pa'i glu yi sgra yis ni//
117b2(bstod tshogs): ri dwags 'gro ba'ang sdod dang mtshungs// skyabs 'dod gang dag skyabs 'os pa// khyod la skyabs su mi mchi ste// mu stegs la ni skyabs 'gro ba// skyabs med yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur// brgya byin
117b3(bstod tshogs): mig ni stong gis kyang // de nyid mthong bar ma gyur gang // khyod kyis ye shes spyan gyis de// gzigs shing gzhan la'ang bston par mdzad// bstan bcos ngas shes rlon pa can// rtsod pa smra ba mang pon//
117b4(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi gzigs pas zhum gyur cing // brang ba lta bur rnam par 'khor// khyod kyi gsung ni gcig tsam gyis// pha rol tshar gcod mdzad pa na// gzhan dag mi smra'i tshul gnas pa// dgun gyi
117b5(bstod tshogs): khru byug lta bu lags// khyod kyi slob ma bzang po'i shing // dge ba'i me tog ches rgyas pa// dpyid ka'i shing ni me tog gis// brgyan pa lta bur mdzes pa lags// thub pa khyod kyi blo gros mdas//
117b6(bstod tshogs): shes bya'i 'ben ni phug gyur te// dga' byed grong na gzhu rgyal gyis// sngon chad phug par ma gyur to// mkhas par rlom pa'i dregs pa can// khyod kyis thar lam ma 'tshal bas// srid pa'i dgon par
117b7(bstod tshogs): 'khyams gyur pa// 'brog stong dmus long tshogs dang mtshungs// las 'bras yod dam med 'gyur zhes// 'jig rten pa ni the tshom skye// dge ba'i las kyi dbang por ni// gyur pa khyod sku 'di lags so//
117b8(bstod tshogs): yon tan rgya mtsho khyod yon tan// mthar thug bdag gis mi rtogs te// nam mkha' bai DUr+ya sngo mdog/ byi yis mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur ma tshung // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags
118a1(bstod tshogs): par 'os pa bsngags pa las dpe las bskyod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa zhes bya ba
118a2(bstod tshogs): slob dpon ma tr-i tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma kar dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// @// donas cog gsum la pa bgis kyi yo pa bas/
118a3(bstod tshogs): rgyu gar skad du/ dri rat+na maM ga la sto tra/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa rab tu dag pa'i gser zhun mdog 'dra 'dom gang
118a4(bstod tshogs): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla 'dra dbu skra bung ba'i mdog lta bu// tshangs pa brgya byin ku be ra dang bdud kyi cod pan pad+ma'i zhabs gtugs pa// sangs rgyas nyi ma shin tu dri
118a5(bstod tshogs): med dam chos 'od zer 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo// shin tu che ba'i sangs rgyas nyi ma rigs pa'i 'od zer 'gro ba de nyid las// dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gang dag rnam par 'phros pas phyogs kun gsal
118a6(bstod tshogs): mdzad cing // gang gis 'jig rten rgyun tu gnyid kyis log pa 'di dag yang dag sad mdzad pa// gang zhig rtogs pas thub rnams zhi bar gshegs pa'i dam chos de la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
118a7(bstod tshogs): pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag nyid kyis rgyas mdzad grags pa grang // zos pa'i rdzing bu tshul khrims dri zhim byang chub yan lag rnams kyi stong bu mdzes// bsam gtan gzugs med dag gi chu bsil rnam dag mya ngan
118a8(bstod tshogs): 'das pa'i snying po bzang // sa steng dge 'dun pad+ma'i tshal rgyas dag la gus pas legs par mchod phyag 'tshal// dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa sleb dpon ma ti tse tras mdzad pa rdzog so//
118b1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ha ka ra siM ha pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba par de dpal brtsegs rak+Shi ta sa bsgyur cing zhus te ga tan la phab pa// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/
118b2(bstod tshogs): rgyo gar skad du/ saM mya k+Shi mAd+hA ya ka ta s+t+wa~M traM/ bod skad du/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang lha min rnams kyis rgya cher
118b3(bstod tshogs): mchod gyur cing // bcom ldan mdzes pa yid 'ong mtha' yas dang ldan pa'i// zas gtsang rigs rnams kyi ni rgyar gyi mchog gyur pa// gangs ri lta bur rgya cher mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig khu
118b4(bstod tshogs): b+hag bung ba sngon po lta bur 'jam gnag 'khyil zhing mdzes pa'i dbu// gser gyi ri ngos tsam pA ka dang ldong ros lta bur dpral ba dri ma med// gangs dngul ku mu da dang pad rtsa mu tig zla 'od las lhag mdzod
118b5(bstod tshogs): spr-i dkar// bcom gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'phyang zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i skar// in dra nI la bung ba sprin nag dang 'dra smin madri med 'jam// shangs kyi gzengs mtho rab mdzes sme na ma rgyas pa lta bur
118b6(bstod tshogs): mkhur tshes dmar// mchu ni bim pa gzhon zhing 'gram pa seng ge dang 'dra go ko'i dkyil 'khor mdzes// mnyam zhing thags bzang tshems mnga' ut+pal rgyas pa'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring gnyin pa'i ljags
118b7(bstod tshogs): nga pa khu bu ga ka la bing ka lta bur yid du 'ong ba'i gsung // lha rnga mchog dang 'brug dang tshangs dbyangs lta bur snyan cing dri ma med pa'i dbyangs// zlum rgyas mgur ni dung 'dra yangs shing dkyus ring
118b8(bstod tshogs): rgyas pa'i thal gong mtho// gser sbyangs dang 'dra gser gyi ri ngos mtshungs shing phrag gong dri ma med// sum cu gsum dbang glang po'i snga 'dra bcom gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag/ mdzes par 'khyil zhing
119a1(bstod tshogs): / bkra shis lcags kyo nya dang 'khor lo dag gis phyag mthil mtshan// brang ba'i lus dang khu byug mdog 'dra ba spu re re g.yas su 'khyil// gser gyi ri rtser pad+ma rA ga'i myu gu mthon pas
119a2(bstod tshogs): khyab dang 'dra ba yi// mchog gi rab mchog pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i dbus na lte ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil// 'doms kyi sra ba srubs nub pus mo'i lha nga'i dkyil 'khor 'bar 'bur med cing mnyam// gser gyi
119a3(bstod tshogs): chu shing 'dzam bu na da dang ni gser gyi ta la 'dra ba'i brla// legs skyes rim gyis phra zhing seng ge dang ni ri dgas lta bur rje dar zlum// ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bur mnyam la dra bas 'brel zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i
119a4(bstod tshogs): zhabs// dal zhing brtan la mi g.yo seng ge dang ni glang po'i stabs su mdzes par gshegs// ngos dmar mtshams kyi nyi ma dmar bas khyab pa lta bur 'od zer rnam par 'phro// gser dang nor bu chu
119a5(bstod tshogs): shel lta bur mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i sku// dri med nyi ma dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bcom ldan g.yas phyogs gshegs pa'i sku// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs brtan yang dag brtson 'grus mdzes pa'i
119a6(bstod tshogs): snam logs can// bcom ldan seng ge lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos mchod byas zhabs// bdud kyi bu mo zur mig lta bas gang gi ting 'dzin mi g.yo ri ltar brtan// dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis mi
119a7(bstod tshogs): bsnyil cod pan gyis btud dbang chen rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal// de ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las// bdag gis dge ba gang bsags de yis 'gro kun
119a8(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas myur grub shog/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/ snyan dag mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tsi thas mdzad pa rdzogs so// mang+ga maM
119b1(bstod tshogs): gcig 'bros bstod shes bya ba/ rgya gar skad du/ e kot+ta ri kasto traM/ bod skad du/ gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// chos gcig la ni
119b2(bstod tshogs): mngon dgyes shing // rtag tu gcig tu bzhugs pa dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi mig gcig 'gyur// 'jig rten gnyen gcig phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur cing // bden pa
119b3(bstod tshogs): gnyis ni rnam par bsgom// grogs gnyis pa ni mi mnga' ba// gnyis med gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa dang // dkon mchog gsum dang cha mnyam pa// sdug bsngal
119b4(bstod tshogs): gsum gyi chu las rgal// 'jig rten gsum sogs phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa rnam pa bzhi po dang // bsam gtan bzhi po'i rnam pa can// sbyor ba pa dang rnam bral ba// bden bzhi mkhyen la
119b5(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// phung po lnga yi chags bral zhing // dbang po lnga ni rnam sgom la// yan lag lnga dang rnam bral ba// 'gro lnga gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang drug chu bo las brgal cing // rgyun
119b6(bstod tshogs): drug las ni rnam par gnas// pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs// mngon shes drug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// 'phags pa'i nor bdun gsol ba po// yan lag bdun
119b7(bstod tshogs): dang rnam bral ba// srid bdun gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// yan lag brgyad lam las byung ba'i// gang zag brgyad ni ston mdzad cing // 'jig rten chos brgyad spangs pa'o// mi khom brgyad
119b8(bstod tshogs): 'joms phyag 'tshal lo// gnas dgu'i chags las rnam grol zhing // khong khro dgra ni rnam spangs la// shin tu sbyangs pa dgu brnyes pa// sa dgra mabyon la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa'i
120a1(bstod tshogs): dge 'dun bcu chos can// sgrib pa bcu ni gcod par mdzad// 'phags pa'i gnas bcu la dgyes pa// stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// de ltar 'phags pa stobs bcu ldan
120a2(bstod tshogs): la tshig gis mchod pa'i phyir// bstod pas bdag gis deng ni dge ba gang thob pa// des 'dir dmyal dang yi dwags dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i// 'gro ba srid pa rgya mtsho rnams las
120a3(bstod tshogs): rgal ba'i don gyur cig/ gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgyu gar gyi mkhan po d+harma shrI bad+d+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge sbyong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing
120a4(bstod tshogs): zhus pa// @#// / shegs paca cub mdang / rgya gar skad du// su ga ta pany+tsa d+hi rad+ha nA ma ma la sto traM/ bid skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa sum nu so lnga'i bstod pa/ mtshan rin po
120a5(bstod tshogs): chos spras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo// gsum la rtag tu skyabs
120a6(bstod tshogs): su mchi// sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba// snyigs ma lnga yi rtsod dus 'dir// brtson 'grus brtan pos sangs rgyas pa// shAkya thub la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis//
120a7(bstod tshogs): snying po byang chub mchog bsres pa// bdud dpung rdo rje snying po yis// rab tu 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen sku las 'od 'phros pas// ngan song sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing // bdud rnams
120a8(bstod tshogs): rnam par skrag mdzad pa// rin chen 'od 'gro phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar klu chen dpa' bo yis// gling rnams char gyis tshim byed ltar// stong gsum chos kyi char 'bebs pa// klu dbang rgyal la
120b1(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' bo khyod kyis bstan pa 'dis// bdud dang mu stegs sreg mdzad cing // gdul bya kun mkhyen 'god mdzad pa// dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rjes gzhan
120b2(bstod tshogs): don rab bsgoms pas// nyid kyi sku srog gtong ba la// mgu ba po ltar rab dgyes pa// dpal dgyes la yang phyag 'tshal lo// mkhas pa rnams la don snang mdzad// bar ma'i rgyud rnams
120b3(bstod tshogs): sin mdzad cing // tha ma'i nyon mongs bsreg mdzad pa// rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kun dang skal ba mnyam// mchog tu shes rab snang ba yis// phyogs rnams snang bar mdzad
120b4(bstod tshogs): de 'khrungs// rin chen zla 'od phyag 'tshal lo// sku ni blta bas mi ngoms shing // 'dom gang 'od kyis sa le yang // gang gis khyod mthong skal ldan pas// mthong ba don yod phyag 'tshal lo//
120b5(bstod tshogs): su gsung thugs ni rin chen mchog/ dri med spros bral sangs rgyas pas// 'gro kun nyon mongs gdung bsel// rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshal lo// dam chos dri ma med pa'i chus// thog mar bdag nyid
120b6(bstod tshogs): dag mdzad nas// gzhan dag mchog tu drag mdzad pa// dri med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams byas pa'i tshogs dag ni// sems can kun la yongs bsngo bar// thub pa khyod kyi ston mdzad pa/
120b7(bstod tshogs): dpal sbyin la yang phyag 'tshal lo// rig dang zhabs su ldan pa po// tshangs pa lags par bram ze bzhed// rig gsang zhabs ldan khyod mnga' ba// tshangs pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa'i
120b8(bstod tshogs): zhabs bzhir rab sgoms shing // tshangs spyod 'bras bu mchog bsnyes pa// tshangs pas 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// tshangs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dag
121a1(bstod tshogs): yang dag blangs pa gtsang mar mdzad// nyon mongs sdig pa 'khru mdzad pa// chu yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten pa dag bde byed mchod// bde byed klu chen ma dros mchod//
121a2(bstod tshogs): chu lha des kyang khyod mchod pas// chu lha'i sbrul phyag 'tshal lo// 'dren pa kun gyi mchog gyur cing // khyod ni mtshungs med rab zhibs// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal mdzad pa// dpal bzang la
121a3(bstod tshogs): yang phyag 'tshal lo// khyod la rgol ba'i nyon mongs pa// do gal byed pa thams cad kyang // tsan dran spangs pa ltar bsil mdzad// tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i dpal dang
121a4(bstod tshogs): gzi brjid ni// sus kyang 'gran par mi bzod de// mig gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gzi brjid mtha' yas phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa'i 'od zer rab byung bas// nga rgyal khengs pa
121a5(bstod tshogs): ni mdzad cing // dman rnams spro ba bskyed par mdzad// 'od dpal la yang phyag 'tshal lo// e m+b+ha mya ngan 'das la zhi// khyod 'dra thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// mnga' brnyes pa yang bde
121a6(bstod tshogs): gshegs pas// mya ngan med nga pal la phyag 'tshal// sred pa med pa goms mdzad cing // 'dren pa kun gyi mchog gyur pa// stobs chen thams cad zil gnon pas// sred med bu la phyag 'tshal
121a7(bstod tshogs): lo// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pas// mdzes pa gzhan kun skyil gyis gnon// mtshan dang dpe byad rab rgyas po// me tog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang 'di zer gyis//
121a8(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten thams cad khyab mdzad pa// tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol// mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// 'od kyis gang la reg pa yang // chags med bde ba rab rgyas pa// pad+ma'i 'od
121b1(bstod tshogs): zer rnam par rol// mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa'i bsod nams 'od zer gyis// 'gro rnams zang zing tshim mdzad pa// khyad par 'phags pa'i nor sbyin pas// nor dpal
121b2(bstod tshogs): la yang phyag 'tshal lo// dran pa rnams la mnga' brnyes pas// thog ma med cing rab mkhyen pa// gang gis khyod dran 'phongs sel bas// dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa
121b3(bstod tshogs): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// snyan pa'i ba dan sa gsum grags// yon tan grangs med mtshan gyi dpal// shin tu yongs grags phyag 'tshal lo// stobs dang dbang po mchog brnyes pas// nag
121b4(bstod tshogs): gas ya / rgyal zugs par thugs pa nag lags rdzas/
121b5(bstod tshogs): ji bzhin du// shin tu rnam gnon phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gzhan nyon mongs sde bcom pas// khyed la dpal mchog gzhan ma mchis// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug g.yul las rgyal// shin tu rnam rgyal
121b6(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// bgrod pa cig pu'i lam chen du// 'gro kun ded dpon rab mdzad de// bdud dang ngan song 'jigs las spol// rnam par gnon gshegs phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul
121b7(bstod tshogs): rmang byung bas// sprul pa bye ba dpag med 'gyed// gdul bya kun la snang gyur pas// kun snang bkod la phyag 'tshal lo// mu stegs thar pa phyir bzlog cing // nyan thos zhi ba phyogs gcig la// khyod
121b8(bstod tshogs): kyis sras mchog rin chen rnams// pad+ma ltar smin phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams tshogs las rin po che// ye shes tshogs rdzogs pad+ma'i gdan// sku gsum lhun grub rab tu bzhugs// ri dbang
122a1(bstod tshogs): rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i mtshan// rin chen smras pa'i bstod pa 'di brjod pas// thub pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba// bdag gi spyod kyang
122a2(bstod tshogs): de dang 'dra bar shog/ bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches spras pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ka ra war+m+ma
122a3(bstod tshogs): dang // lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / @#// tshigs su bcad pa byud pa'i bdod pa/ rgya gar skad du/ ba dad+d+ha aSh+Ta ka sto traM/ bod skad du/ tshigs
122a4(bstod tshogs): su bcad pa brgyad pa'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// zla rgyas zhal 'dra khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan// seng ge'i sgra 'dra glang po'i stobs 'dra zhing // ri dbang ltar
122a5(bstod tshogs): brtan rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i thugs// lha dbang bla ma'i thub dbang phyag 'tshal lo// spyan gsum spyan legs pad+ma ltar yangs spyan// gnod sbyin klu yi mig 'dras gzigs mdzad cing // thar pa thob
122a6(bstod tshogs): mdzad spyan ni dkyus ring ba// spyan stong gzigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lho mchog du mo'i yan lag mchog gis btud// gtso mo'i gser ltar 'bar sku mchod 'os sku// mtshan bzang mdzes
122a7(bstod tshogs): pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros yangs shing gser ltar dri ma med// blo gros grags shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan// sangs rgyas mkha' ltar dri
122a8(bstod tshogs): med spyan mnga' ba// dpa' bo mi g.yo'i blo mda' de la 'dud// smra ba'i mchog 'gyur snyan pa'i don gsung ba// yang dag don gsungs 'dul ba'i don gsung zhing // smra ba'i dbang phyug rgol bas mi bskyod
122b1(bstod tshogs): gsung // bden zhig gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// gzhan du mi 'dul 'dul ba'i don du btul// nyon mongs spong sogs rnam par dag pas 'dul// thub pa tshul spyod chen pos legs 'dul
122b2(bstod tshogs): mdzad// snyoms shing mdzes pa'i tshems ldan mgon la 'dud// bsod nams dpag med bsags pas sku mdzes la// 'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i sku// gsor sbyangs gtso ma lta bur dri
122b3(bstod tshogs): med sra// srid las grol sku rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo mtshan zhabs rab mchog ldan pa'i zhabs// lha dbang spyi bos legs par btud pa'i zhabs// zhabs sor dra bas legs
122b4(bstod tshogs): brgyan mdzes pa'i zhabs// dpal be'u g.yung drung gi ni zhabs la 'dud// tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// @#// da cogagasums pa/
122b5(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ tri rat+na s+phoH/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa// sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// skyob pa chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo// gsum la rtag/
122b6(bstod tshogs): tu bdag phyag 'tshal// tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi su gsum grub// rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa le mkhyen// chos sku mkha' 'dra gzug bsdu mdzes skur ldan// sangs rgyas dpag bsam
122b7(bstod tshogs): 'dral phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid rgyu mthun gsung rab bcu gnyis dang // chos la skye 'gag med cing spros la dben// de la dmigs te yon tan kun grub pa// legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la phyug
122b8(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ gnyen pos rim par bsal nas sangs rgyas sar bzhugs pa// sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing sbyor ba'i// 'phags pa'i
123a1(bstod tshogs): dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa// slob dpon chen po ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ tri rat+na sto sta b+hi ti
123a2(bstod tshogs): bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dkon mchog gsum la phyag
123a3(bstod tshogs): 'tshal ba la sogs pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mtha' dag bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na de'i phyir de dag la phyag 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs
123a4(bstod tshogs): pa gsungs te/ ma 'dres pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa dag ma lus par spangs pa ni sangs pa ste/ gnyid rab tu sangs pa bzhin no// yang na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spangs
123a5(bstod tshogs): pas shes bya mtha' dag la blo rgyas pas rgyas pa ste/ pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa lta bu'o// de ltar de dag ni spangs pa dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pas bstod pa ste/ nyid kyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o// gzhan gyi
123a6(bstod tshogs): don phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas te// gtse zhes smos pa las sa gsum dbang phyug chen por gyur pas na gtso bo ste/ de dag ma lus pa gnon pas lci bar gyur pa ni/ gzugs la la lci bar
123a7(bstod tshogs): gyur pa ni srang gi mgo mnon pa lta bu'o// des ni thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'dul zhes bstan par 'gyur ro// yang na phyin ci ma log pa'i yon tan rin po che sbyin pas na bla ma ste
123a8(bstod tshogs): de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni sgo gsum gyis rab tu 'dud pa'o// skyob pa chos la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ 'dis ngan 'gro dang srid par sdug bsngal ba las skyob cing sdug bsngal sel la bde la sbyin
123b1(bstod tshogs): pas na skyob pa zhes bya'o// de nyid kyis na chos te rnam par ltung ba las 'dzin pas so// de yang gang gis don dam pa'i chos de rtogs nas/ slar ngan song dang 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir ro// de rtogs
123b2(bstod tshogs): pa'i rgyud pa'i rgyuni bstan pa'i chos yin la/ dngos kyi rgyu ni lam gyi chos yin pas de dag la'ang btags te 'dzin pa zhes brjod do// yang na skyob pa zhes bya bas ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa phun sum
123b3(bstod tshogs): tshegs pa bstan la/ chos zhes bya bas ni rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to// de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no// dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo
123b4(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba la/ 'di dag ni lha'i bu'i bdud dag gis kyang ston pa dang lta ba mi byed pas na dge 'dun te/ de la ston pa mi byed pa ni shes nas dad pa thob pas so// lta ba mi phyed pa ni bdag med pa'i
123b5(bstod tshogs): ye shes rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro// de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang rung ste/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i 'phags pa rnams ni slob pa dang / mi slob pa
123b6(bstod tshogs): yang rung ste/ dge 'dun no// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa mtha' dag kyang spangs la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' dag kyang rdzogs pas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du drang
123b7(bstod tshogs): bar bya ba ma yin la/ sa gsum gyi 'gro ba dam pa dang / slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pas dgra bcom pa chen po zhes bya'o// de ltar mi phyed pa ni rang gi don thob pa yin la/
123b8(bstod tshogs): gzhan gyi don thob par byed pa'i phyir na che zhes smos te// 'di dag gzhan gyi yon sbyor ba che bas na chen po ste/ phul ba dang yongs su longs spyad pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams mchog/
124a1(bstod tshogs): 'phel ba'i phyir te/ de yang slob pa dang mi slob pa de dag ci rigs par srid pas cha shas lhag ma lus pas zas dang gos la sogs pa la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags phra mo bsgom pas spang bar
124a2(bstod tshogs): bya ba yod pa dang / sngon gyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu phung po lnga 'dzin pa zas la sogs pas da dung gso dgos pas longs spyod kyi/ sangs rgyas dang / chos ni de ltar ma yin pas so// de dag la
124a3(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o// gsum la rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni don go sla'o// de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzang po
124a4(bstod tshogs): thams cad kyi gtso bo spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba 'thob pa'o// rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'khor bar skyes pa na mgo bo gdugs lta bur 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba la
124a5(bstod tshogs): dga' bar 'gyur ba'o// dbang gi 'bras bu ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yid du 'ong ba rnams de'i shes pa'i yul du 'dud pa ltar snang zhing 'gyed pa dang / gzung du mi rung ba ltar snang bar mi 'gyur ba'o//
124a6(bstod tshogs): de ltar dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa mdor gsungs pa de dag rab tu gsal bar bstan pas 'gro ba dam pa rnams de bas kyang shas cher dad par byas pa dang / rang gi tshogs dri ma med pa
124a7(bstod tshogs): bsags pa'i phyir/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tra'i zhal snga nas bstod pa rgyas pa gsungs pa/ tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa yin te/ 'dis
124a8(bstod tshogs): rdzogs par byed pas na tshogs de sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/ de dag nyid chen po ste rang bzhin dpag tu med pa dang / bskal pa dpag tu med pa dang / yul dpag tu med pa la sogs pa'o//
124b1(bstod tshogs): gnyis zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes so// de yang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa ni bsod nams te/ bsam gtan dang shes rab ni ye shes so// brtson 'grus ni gnyi gar gtogs so//
124b2(bstod tshogs): zhes 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las gsungs so// de gnyis rdzogs pa ni bskal pa chen po grangs med par dang po sbyor ba'i lam sbyangs shing / gnyis par sa bdun pa'i bar dang /
124b3(bstod tshogs): gsum par sa bcu pa'i bar sbyangs shing dag par byas pa ni/ rdzogs shing mthar thug pa'o// des rgyu khyad par can bsags pa bstan nas/ da ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir mkhyen bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs
124b4(bstod tshogs): pa smos te/ mkhyen pa bzhi ni mi long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa bzhi'o// de la me long lta bu'i ye shes ni kun gzhi rnam shes gnas gyur pa/ shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes so//
124b5(bstod tshogs): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas gyur pa/ bdag med pa las bdag med par mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa kun rdzob
124b6(bstod tshogs): gyi dngos po ma lus pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar ma 'dres par mkhyen pa'o// bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni sgo lnga rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa 'gro ba rnams gdul ba'i bya ba gang yin pa ma lus par mdzad mkhyen pa'o//
124b7(bstod tshogs): de dag bsdus pa ni sngagasum grub ces bya bas bstan te/ de yang bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i 'bras bus ni gzugs sku gnyis 'grub la/ ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i 'bras bus ni chos kyi sku 'grub bo//
124b8(bstod tshogs): del me lta bu'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku ste/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las grol la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba tsam gyi ye shes so// de'i chos te stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sogs pa
125a1(bstod tshogs): ye shes tha dad pa du ma tshogs pas na chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni/ ka ya'i sgra tshogs la 'jug pas so// ye shes de yang dngos su na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye
125a2(bstod tshogs): shes so// so sor rtog pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ de yang sku de'i nang gi ye shes skye mched tha dad pa la rag las pa las grol ba kun rdzob sna tshogs mkhyen pa dang
125a3(bstod tshogs): bdag med pa la bdag med par mkhyen pa rnam par dag pa'o// bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni sprul pa'i sku ste/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i skye mched tha dad pa las skye ba 'od zer gyi rnam par snang bas 'dod
125a4(bstod tshogs): pa'i khams la sogs par/ shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i skur snang bas gang 'dul bar 'os pa 'dul ba'o// de nas 'dir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku thams cad kyi gzhi ni rnam par smin pa'i sku ste
125a5(bstod tshogs): de'i mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang sgo nga'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi snang ba las chos dang sprul pa'i skur bzhag cing de gnyis kyi rten ye shes gnyis dang bcas pa de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes brjod do// yod ni
125a6(bstod tshogs): bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa las grub pa'i lus khyad par can dang / de'i 'od zer gzugs khyad par can snang ba'i gzugs kyi sku gnyis te/ gang mig gi yul du gyur pa de nyid gzugs so// rang
125a7(bstod tshogs): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba'i ye shes ni gtso bo ste/ sna tshogs shes pa dang bdag med par shes pa yang ye shes kyi tshogs las byung bar brjod par bya'o// de las gzhan pa bdag med pa tsam
125a8(bstod tshogs): de ni dam pa'i chos dkon mchog du bzhag gis sangs rgyas su mi bzhag ste/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ye shes kyi yul yin la/ thob par bya ba'i 'bras bur bzhag par bya'o// des na rang gi mtshan nyid dang ldan
125b1(bstod tshogs): pa'i sku ni gsum kho nar brjod par bya'o// da ni sku gsum po de dag nyid las dpe dang mtshan nyid kyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa le mkhyen ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
125b2(bstod tshogs): te// rnam par rtog pa'i rigs gsum 'am/ bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir rnam rtog mi mnga' ba ste/ gnyis su 'dzin pa mtha' dag drungs nas phyung ba'i ye shes chen po'o// de'i phyir mi mnga' zhes bya ba'i
125b3(bstod tshogs): dgag pa 'di ni ma yin par dgag pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i rigs de dag ni yod pa ma yin la/ des dben pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni mnga' ba'o// des na ci'ang ste ci'ang rung
125b4(bstod tshogs): rdul zla rab dang de ba la sogs pa de dgas la zhes bya ba rabatu gsal bar mkhyen cing ba ste/ ji ltar mkhyen nen/ swA sI'i rnam par rtog pas sgo btags pa dang / bskur pa btab pa dang / bral zhing pan rjen
125b5(bstod tshogs): momisgrib pa thogs pa med cing mun pa med la shel dang ltang tshor lhur gsal ba'i rnam par dbyer med pa mkhyen te/ de nyid ye shes de'i las yin no// de'i dpe bstan pa ni chos sku mkha' 'dra zhes bya ba sa
125b6(bstod tshogs): 'dus ma byas nam mkha' thogs pa med cing mi sgrib pa ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang / shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med la/ dmigs pa dang rnam par yongs su ma chad par snang ba'o//
125b7(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba'i don to// 'dir ye shes lhag ma gsum ni gzugs la sogs pa dang / gang zag la bdag med pa tsam dang / 'dul ba'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal la thogs pa dang / 'dul ba'i
125b8(bstod tshogs): thabs shes pa la yul so sor nges pa'i ye shes yin la/ ye shes 'di ni yul de dag dang bcas pa'i ye shes de dag nyid kyang chos can du gyur pa dang / de'i chos nyid la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i spyi'i mtshan nyid
126a1(bstod tshogs): du gyur pa ste/ chos can dang chos nyid du bcas pa mtha' dag mkhyen par gyur pa'o// gzugs sku mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ba ni mtshan dang dpe byad rab tu 'bar ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
126a2(bstod tshogs): sprul pa'i su'o// sangs rgyas kyi don ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no// dpag bas ma 'dru zhes bya ba ni su gsum chur gyi pos/ 'gro ba rnams kyis dpag shing bsam pa lhor yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs pa
126a3(bstod tshogs): byed pas na/ lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing chen po rnam pa bzhi po dang 'dra ba ste/ bsod nams dpag bsam shing khyod de ring ga la byung zhes bstod pa lta bu'o// de yang sku de dag gsum char yang sngon gyi
126a4(bstod tshogs): smon lam gyis pan dpag tu med pa 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas brtson de ltar smon lam btab pa bzhind la gdul bya'i don la 'bad pa med par 'byung ba yin la byed par du gzugs kyi su ni thogs
126a5(bstod tshogs): pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyi tshe ba'i gang zag dang / 'gro ba yongs su smin par byed pa la song bas su yang 'jug go// kha cig na re gzugs sku zhes bya ba ni spyir bstan pa ste/ mdzes srung
126a6(bstod tshogs): ldan zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o// dpag bsam 'dra zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku'o// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi dbang du byas pa'o zhes zer ro// de lta bu'i sku gsum po de dge
126a7(bstod tshogs): la lus zhing gi rdul snyed du mos pa'i sprul te/ phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ tshig gi don ni sngar ji lta ba bzhin no// chos nyid rgyu mthun gsung rab bcu gnyis dang zhes bya ba ste/ bstan pa'i chos la bstod pa ste//
126a8(bstod tshogs): chos nyid zhes bya ba la chos nyid bdag rnam pa gnyis kyis stong pa nyid do// bdag med pa dang / bdag dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba spyi'i mtshan nyid don dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo'o// /
126b1(bstod tshogs): de'i rgyu mthun pa ni bstan pa'i chos bdag med pa dang / bstan pa'i gsung rab te/ 'dir mthun pa'i rgyu ni chu mthun pa ste/ bskyed par rung ba dang thob par nus pa'o// de la bskyed par rung ba ni rgyu des phyin
126b2(bstod tshogs): ci ma log par yongs su grub pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'o// thob par nus pa'i ni ye shes de skyes pas mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa de bzhin nyid de thob par nus pa'o// de dag ni rab tu phul du byung ba'i
126b3(bstod tshogs): gsung yin pas gsung rab ste/ phyi rol pa'i tshig la ni snga ma lta bu'i rung ba dang nus pa med pas rab ma yin no// bcu gnyis ni mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs
126b4(bstod tshogs): su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gling gzhi'i dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / gtan la phab pa'i sde zhes bya ste/
126b5(bstod tshogs): dag dang po ni ston pa'i zhal nas grag go// de'i 'og tu gang zag gi blol gnas pa'o// de'i 'og tu glegs bam du byis pa'o// de yang dang po de la dmigs nas zos pa dang // shes rab ste zhing de nas sgoms
126b6(bstod tshogs): pas chos nyid de thos pas mthun pa'i rgyu brgyud pa nyid du nges pa'o// de bas na slob dpon pa su ban dus bshad pa/ ston pa'i zhal nas byung ba skye bo'i mig ni zhi bar mdzad pa bkra shis kyis/ 'byung gnas
126b7(bstod tshogs): sems la zhog cig gang phyir 'di ni lus can rnams kyi rna ba'i bdud rtsi de/ nyon mongs pa yi dug kun sel bar mdzad pa yin pas de'i don yang dag bsam par gyis/ rgyu 'di rnams kyis rtag tu gus par
126b8(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dag mnyam pa'i rigs zhes so// chos la skye 'gag med cing spros la dper/ de la dmigs te yon tan kun sgrub pa/ zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'i chos la bstod pa ste/ chos la don
127a1(bstod tshogs): dam pa'i chos so// de la don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa med cing gzhan yang spros pa ste/ rtag pa dang chad pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / gcig dang tha dad pa'i spros pa de dag las
127a2(bstod tshogs): dben pa'o// de yang don dam pa'i chos ni bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yin la/ spros pa de dag ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dbang gis btags pa tsam du zad pas na bdag tu 'dzin pa log ma thag tu de dag kyang
127a3(bstod tshogs): ldog la/ bdag med pa'i ngang la de dag dang po nas kyang med kyi btags pa glo bur bar zad pas so// de ltar spros pa dang bral ba bdag med pa la bdag med par shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis dmigs pas//
127a4(bstod tshogs): bdag tu 'dzin pa log pas de ma thag tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa du ma dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan kun grub pas na/ 'phags pa'i
127a5(bstod tshogs): gang zag rnams ni 'dus ma byas las rab tu byung ba lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o// legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la zhes bya ba ni lam gyi chos kyi bstod pa ste/ de la legs pa ni nges par legs pa ste/ nye bar
127a6(bstod tshogs): zhi ba'i bde ba'o// de'i rgyu ni skyes par byed pa ste/ des bdag med pa'i ye shes bskyed la des kyang nges par legs pa de 'thob pas so// 'dir zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i sngon du rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyes pa
127a7(bstod tshogs): des ni legs rgyu'i mthar thug pa yin la/ des 'jug brtul ba mthong ba'i lam gyi bar gyi legs rgyur rigs par bya'o// de nyid dam pa ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyis nyams su myong bar gyur pa dang / ltung ba las
127a8(bstod tshogs): bdag tu 'dzin pas na dam pa'i chos zhes bya'o// de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no// nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag/ gnyen pos rim par bsal nas sar zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs
127b1(bstod tshogs): pas ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bstod pa ste/ de la sems kun nas nyon mongs par byed pas nyon mongs pa ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa drug go/ de dag nyid sgribs te zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i
127b2(bstod tshogs): ye shes la sgrib pa dang mthong ba'i gags byed pas so// shes bya ni chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de la sgrib pa ni brjod par byed pa sgra'i spyil yod par 'dzin pa ste/
127b3(bstod tshogs): dngos su gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rigs ji snyed pa'o// sgrib pa de gnyi ga yang rab tu dbye ba mang po dang ldan pas na mang po'i chog can no// gnyen pos zhes bya ba ni bdag med shes
127b4(bstod tshogs): pa'i ye shes so// rim par bsal nas zhes bya ba ni de dag gcig car mi spong gi dang po mthong bas spong la de'i 'og tu sgom pas spang bar bya ba spong ba'i phyir ro// de las 'bras bu 'thob pa bstan pa//
127b5(bstod tshogs): sar zhugs pa zhes bya ba ste/ sa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sa ste/ brgyad pa dang / mthong ba dang / bsrabs pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang byas pa rtogs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
127b6(bstod tshogs): kyis la zhugs pa dang / yang rab tu dga' ba dang / dri ma med pa dang / chos kyi sprin gyi bar la zhugs pa'o// 'dir bden pa bzhi'i rnam pa bcu drug dag yid la byed pas ye shes kyi skad cig bcu
127b7(bstod tshogs): drug gis phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad spangs pas mthong ba'i lam la brgyad pa'am/ rab tu dga' ba'i sa pa'o// de'i 'og tu tshul de nyid kyis bsgom pas spang bar bya ba bcu spangs pa las ni nyan thos dang /
127b8(bstod tshogs): rang rgyal ba'i lhag ma dag bzhag pa ste/ rnam pa gsum pa'i bar dang / 'dod pa'i rnam pa drug pa dang / dgu pa dang / srid rtse'i dgu pa zad pa las mthong ba dang / bsrabs pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral
128a1(bstod tshogs): ba dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa pa'o// cig car kho nar spang ba dang / lam rdzogs pa ni bse ru lta bu'i sa pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa lhag ma rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su
128a2(bstod tshogs): rdzogs pa las rnam par bzhag par rig par bya zhing / de dag nyid nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sgom pas spang bar bya ba ni/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis cig car spong la shes bya'i sgrub pa nis re re la yang rim gyis
128a3(bstod tshogs): spong ngo // la la ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yang sa re re la rim gyis spong ste/ spong byed ni chos la bdag med pa'i ye shes kyis zhes zer ro// de ltar ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa bstan nas/ da ni bsod
128a4(bstod tshogs): nams kyi tshogs la gnas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing sbyor ba zhes smos te/ sems can rnams kyi don ni dgongs pa ste/ bde ba dang phan pa'o// de dag mdzad pa ni bsdu ba'i
128a5(bstod tshogs): dngos po dang tshad med pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis ji ltar nus par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing ni snod dang bcud do// de dag sbyong ba ni rgyal ba'i yum las gsungs pa ltar te/ sems can
128a6(bstod tshogs): gos ngan pa dag mthong na/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni sems can rnams lus gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o// me tog 'bul na bdag gi sangs rgyas
128a7(bstod tshogs): kyi zhing der dus thams cad pa'i me tog rab tu rgyas par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni smon lam gyi mthus sbyong bar rig par bya'o// 'phags pa'i
128a8(bstod tshogs): dge 'dun che la zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las ring du song bas na 'phags pa ste/ dge 'dun ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no// che ba ni grangs dang yon tan gyis che ba ste/ grags pa mtha' yas pa dang /
128b1(bstod tshogs): legs par zhugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan chen po mnga' ba'i phyir ro// phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa dang bcas pa'i yul gyi yan lag thams cad rab tu 'dud pa'o// de ltar yon tan mtha' dag ma
128b2(bstod tshogs): lus pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal nas/ de dag la skyabs su song na/ ngan song rnams su mi skye bar lha'i nang du skye ste/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngan 'gro las yang
128b3(bstod tshogs): sa pa sungs da/ na sa dgas m+sa/ seMs sa/ sa/ na sa
128b4(bstod tshogs): song na de 'chi ba'i dus byas ni bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten zungar na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni der shin tu dang ba'i sems de skyabs su song ba'i rgyus skye bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas kyang de'i lus gzi brjid
128b5(bstod tshogs): dang ldan zhing rang gi lus rang gi 'od kyis brgyan la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o// gal te phyag 'tshal ba dang skyabs su song ba'i dge ba de yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan na ni ji ltar
128b6(bstod tshogs): bsngos pa'i thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// // de ltar nyes pa kun spangs shing // yon tan mtha' yas gter gyur pa// dkon mchog gsum po'i bstod pa'i tshig/ cung zad bshad pas
128b7(bstod tshogs): dge ba'i tshogs// gang rnams de yis 'gro ba rnams// sangs rgyas sa la gnas par shog/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
128b8(bstod tshogs): rgyag dgye khar ba d+ha zhi dang / zod kyilo rnab brjid pa la gyi na po'i ses bsgyud cing 'as te gtan la bab pa'o// / rgyagangs dang/ tha~Mr d+ha saH/ bdas dang / dkon ma tshag gsu byug
129a1(bstod tshogs): / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dmigs med chos kyi sku// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// cir yang sprul sku la// gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/
129a2(bstod tshogs): sgrub pa'i 'phags lam brgyad// ston pa'i gsung rab la// gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems rnams dang // dgra bcom dag la sogs// rang sangs rgyas rnams la// gus pas
129a3(bstod tshogs): phyophyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/ slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// @#// brgya cu ba zhes bya ba tham pa te dbyangs kyis mdza pa 'azhugs/ rgya gar skad du/ sha ta pany+tsa
129a4(bstod tshogs): sha ti ka nA ma s+ya sto tra/ bod skad du/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun// gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing // gang la'ang rnam pa
129a5(bstod tshogs): thams cad du// yon tan thams cad gnas gyur pa// gal te sems shig yod na ni// de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing // de bstod de ni bkur ba dang // de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs// thams cad mkhyen
129a6(bstod tshogs): pa yon tan kun// mnga' la de yang nyam mi mnga'// nyes pabag chags bcas de yang // skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga'// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni// gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la//
129a7(bstod tshogs): zhe 'bras gyur pa glang gis kyang // chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed// rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru// rus sAlnga mgrin pa chud pa ltar// dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i// mi nyid bdag gis
129a8(bstod tshogs): thob nas ni// mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel zhing // las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa// bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go/ snying po ci phyir blang mi bya// de ltar thub pa'i yon tan gyi// yul lha grangs med
129b1(bstod tshogs): shes mod kyi// rang gi don la gus pa yis// de yi phyogs gcig bsgrims te brjod// gang gi yon tan grangs dag dang // mthul thug pa ma mchis la// rmad byung phrin las dpag med can// rang byung
129b2(bstod tshogs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di snyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na// 'di ltar lags zhes ci zhig smos// khyod kyi yon tan slad du bdag/ bsod nams snyam nas spyi brtol skyes// bstod pa gleng bslang ba ste
129b3(bstod tshogs): le'u dang po'o// // spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi// rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs nas// 'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces// khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes// khyod ni ma bcol legs mdzad pa//
129b4(bstod tshogs): khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams// khyod ni madrin mdza' bshes te// 'brel pa med pa'i gnyen 'dun lags// nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na// dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal// legs mdzad khyod kyis
129b5(bstod tshogs): srog kyang ni// slong po'i skye blo rnams la btang // nyid kyi sra dang srog dag gis// lus can gshed mas zin rnams kyi// lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni// lan brgya phrag tu thub mdzad// ngan 'gros bsnyengs skad
129b6(bstod tshogs): gas pa// da pa'i 'grub 'ang bas gas/ ky-i pa drug pa gags/ da nas skyes nga // rdzas rnams
129b7(bstod tshogs): bsnyen pas// yongs su dag pa'i las rnams kyis// khyod ni gzhirten gcig pur byur// sdug bsngal mang pos gzer ba na// khyed kyis dge ba'i thugs kyis ni// nyon mongs rnams la spyan btsugs nas/
129b8(bstod tshogs): skye bo nyon mongs can la ba rtse// khyod kyis gzhan gyi don slad du// su srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang // de 'dra srog chags 'gram pa las// bsos pa rnams la'ang 'byung mgyur// khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags
130a1(bstod tshogs): par// gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par// bshed ma bgyid pa'i sems can la'ang // gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang // khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te//
130a2(bstod tshogs): dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen// de gzhan skye bos 'ol mi mchi// dka' spyad las ni ma bgyis par// go 'phang rnyed dka' mi 'thob ces// de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par// khyod kyi brtson
130a3(bstod tshogs): 'grus legs par spel// khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la// khyod la zad lhod 'ga' ma byung // de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams// thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis// thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang // rtag
130a4(bstod tshogs): tu rjes su 'brel slad du// ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa yi// shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma chags// gzhan dang thun mong ma lags pa'i// bde ba gang de gya nom yang // dam pa'i spyod ldan khyod 'dral//
130a5(bstod tshogs): gnod par rabs kyi sman ma mchis// 'dres pa las ni legs bshad nyid// snying po skyon med nyi tshe zhig/ khyod kyis kun bzhes thugs la bzhag/ nyes bshad dug bzhin yongs su spangs// rin chen snying po/
130a6(bstod tshogs): mkhyen khyod kyis// legs bshad srog gis 'jal ba na// skye ba de dang de dag tu// byang chub slad du dpa' rtsal bstan// de slad grangs med gsum dag tu// khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na// brtson 'grus
130a7(bstod tshogs): 'ba' zhig grogs gyur pas// go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes// rgyul bstod pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing // dma' la rngan chan mi mdzad la// mnyam la 'gran pa
130a8(bstod tshogs): mi mnga' bas// khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur// khyod ni yon tan rgyu rnams la// mngon bgyis 'bras bu rnams la min// yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis// khyod kyi yon tan pa mthar phyin// ji ltar khyod kyi
130b1(bstod tshogs): zhabs rdul yang // bsod nams skye ba mched 'gyur ba// de ltar khyod kyis legs spyad pas// bdag nyid rab tu bskrun pa mdzad// nyes pa nyams smad rtsa nas bton// yon tan spel nas rnam par sbyangs//
130b2(bstod tshogs): gzhung lugs pazang po des na myod// zlab mchog sreg par brnaMs pa lags// demar bdag gi rgyu pa // rig sags lhags 'angam smras pa// de stur rnam pa rnams pa // zhes parjod
130b3(bstod tshogs): bcom// ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang // 'dra ba tsam yang mi gda' ba// de ltar khyod kyis bsags bsags nas// bdag nyid la ni yon tan bsgrubs// 'jig rten pa yi dpe dngos kun// gegs bgyid pa
130b4(bstod tshogs): dang sgrib pa can// re zhig pa dang nyi tshe ba// shin tu rnyed par sla ba lags// khyod kyi yon tan bla med la// gegs bgyid ma mchis rtogs ma mchis// brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas// dpe lta mchis
130b5(bstod tshogs): par ga la 'gyur// gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs pa'i dkyil// gting dang pha rol med brtags na// rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni// gnag rjes lta bur sa ler gda'// chos rnams kun gyis mi bskyod pa// khyod kyi
130b6(bstod tshogs): brtan pa mngon bsams na// sa yi brtan pa nyid kyang ni// shir sha'i ge sar rtse ltar chung // thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi// snang bas mi shes rab rib dag/ 'joms pa'i zad ni nyi ma yang //
130b7(bstod tshogs): mi khyer tsam du'ang mi spyod do// khyod kyi gsung thugs mdzad spyod rnams// dag pa'i gnan ston zla dang // chu dang nam mkha'i dag pa rnams// dri ma can ni lta bur gda'// 'jig rten legs pa
130b8(bstod tshogs): gang ci'ang rung // thams cad bsngos na'ang der rabs te// nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas chos la khyad mi khor// rin chen chos gang brnyes nas khyod// mchog tu
131a1(bstod tshogs): gyur pa de nyid dang // khyod du bskrun zhing de dang ni// khyod dang bsgrun ldom kho nar bas// gang la spyi tsam btun nam ni// cung zad brjod par bgyid pa de// smra ba po yi rang dga' dang //
131a2(bstod tshogs): thabs dang gtsam bu tsam du bas// dpe med pa la bstod pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// // khyod ni bdud las rnam rgyal te// 'gro kun dad par mdzad pa yang // bdag gis chos nyid rjes bsams
131a3(bstod tshogs): na// chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo // sdang bas rgol bar rtsol byed pa// mang po'ang gzhon par bya ba ni// khyad par gnas la brten pa yi// bzod pa'i tshigs su mtshar mi che// gang tshe bdud rnams mngon
131a4(bstod tshogs): btul ba// de yi nub mo kho na la// nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa// de nyid rmad du byung ba lags// 'od zer phreng ba stong ldan pa'i// nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang // dpa' bo khyod kyis
131a5(bstod tshogs): mu stegs las// rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar// 'dod chags bral bas tshogs bcas dang // zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can// gti mug bral bas rmongs pa ste// gsum pos rtag tu
131a6(bstod tshogs): gsum dag btul// dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang // dam chos ma lags smod mdzad kyang // dam pa dag dang tha ma la// khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga'// dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la/
131a7(bstod tshogs): rjes su chags dang khong khro bar// khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur na// khyod la bstod du ci zhig mchis// yon tan rnams la'ang ma chags la// yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi mnga'// kye ma'o khyod kyi
131a8(bstod tshogs): thugs stobs ni// rab dang yongs su dag pa lags// dbang po rnams ni rab dang ba// dus rnams rtag tu mi nyams pas// khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag/ mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda'//
131b1(bstod tshogs): rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang // mdzad spyod bzang pos bsgrags pas na// khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag/ rnam dag byis pa'i bar la grags// rmad du byung ba'i bstod pa se le'u bzhi pa'o//
131b2(bstod tshogs): bar nil yid du 'ong // 'ab la gnod pa mdzad mi ma ba// dul ladzim brjid che bu y-is// sgra 'dis sa shig dang mi mdzad// khyod kyi sra gang gis ni/ lan bgyir mthong dang gang zhig gos/ dang
131b3(bstod tshogs): mthong ba de gnyis ka/ 'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad// pyid kyi sa ni mdzes pa'i bying // bsgrubs mi rnams rang bzhin pas// mthong ngo cog ni phye zhing // dga' ba skyed par mdzan pa lags/
131b4(bstod tshogs): rten g+h+ri yon tan dag dang ni/ khyen pa'i yon tan phan tshun d+ha// 'tsham pas khyod kyi ska dang ni// yon tan phran tshigs mchog dang ldan// mtshan dang de'i byad bzang 'bar ba// khyod kyi skalas ma
131b5(bstod tshogs): gtogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di// gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur// khyod sa rten pa'i yon tan la// de dpal che zhes gsung gsung ltar// de ma yon tan rnams kyang stsa
131b6(bstod tshogs): des legs bkod ces gsung ba 'dra// sbrul bstod pa skye le 'u lnga pa'o// // 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni// khyod med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings// khyod ni 'gro bri'i nyon mongs dag/ dgrol skad
131b7(bstod tshogs): yun ring thugs rjes bsdams// dang por khyod la phyag bgyi'am// 'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod// skyon mkhyen yun ring de lta bur// bzhugs mdzad thugs rje chel bgyi// dben pa'i bde ba spangs gyur
131b8(bstod tshogs): khyod// mang po'i nang du bzhugs pa gang // de khyod thugs rjes dus 'das pa// glags shig thod nas bgyis par bas// rig pa yis ni mtsho nang nas// klu bzhin khyod kyi thugs rje yis// dgon po'i
132a1(bstod tshogs): zhi nas grong gi mthar// gdul ba'i don gyi slad du drangs// nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du// thugs rje gtso dang ldan pas na// rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsal yang // khyod kyi zhabs kyis
132a2(bstod tshogs): 'dor bar mdzad// rdzu 'phrul seng ge ba sgra dang ni// nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa gang // de ni bzhed spyod me mnga' ba// khyod kyi thugs rjes bstan pa lags// gzhan gyi dani du rab bzang gi/ nyid kyi
132a3(bstod tshogs): don la brtse med pas// mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la// thugs rjes thugs rje mdzad ma gyur// 'di ltar res 'ga' brtan pas gang // gzhan don bsgrub pa mdzad slad du// khyod ni lan brgyar
132a4(bstod tshogs): phyogs dag tu// gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags// de ltar khyod la gnod mdzad kyang // nongs pa can du mi rtse bas// khyod kyi bzhed pa kho na dang // mthun 'jug pa ni lags par gda'//
132a5(bstod tshogs): thugs la bstod pa ste le'u drug pa'o// // tshig bzang ba dang don che dang // bden pa dang ni snyan pa dang // zab gsal gnyis ka'i don ldan dang // bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa// khyod kyi
132a6(bstod tshogs): gsung ni de lta bu// khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang // thams cad mkhyen pa lags so zhes// su zhig nges pa skye mi 'gyur// mang po ril gyis snyan ma lags// bcos ma 'ga' tsam snyan pa lags//
132a7(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi gsung don grub pas kyang // thams cad legs gsungs kho na lags// khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na// gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang // gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag/ thams cad ro/
132a8(bstod tshogs): gcig nyid du 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i// phrin las rnams kyang rab tu bzo// de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi// snod 'di 'dra ba 'di gyis so// khyod zhal bltan rab sdug pa// de las mnyan
132b1(bstod tshogs): na snyan pa yi// gsung 'di dag ni zla ba las// bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bzhin du gda'// khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi// rdul rab zhi mdzad char sprin 'dra// zhe sdang sprul ni gdon pa'i phyir// nam mkha' lding
132b2(bstod tshogs): dang 'dra ba lags// yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i// rab rib 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra// nga rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pas// brgya byin mtshon cha 'dra ba lags// don gzigs pas na mi
132b3(bstod tshogs): bslab// nongs mi mnga' phyir rjes su 'thun// legs par sbyar bas go sla ste// khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan// re zhig dang por khyod kyi gsung // nyan pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog mdzad//
132b4(bstod tshogs): de nas yid la bsam bgyis na// rdul dang mun pa dag kyang sel// phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin zhing // bag med rnams ni skrag par mdzad// bde ba can dag skyo bgyid pas// khyod gsung
132b5(bstod tshogs): kun dang 'tsham par 'jug/ mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed// bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel// tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas// gsung 'di skye bo kun la smran// lta ba dag las dgar
132b6(bstod tshogs): mdzad cing // mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren// nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung // yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs// kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing // dgongs pa'ang kun du nyer gnas
132b7(bstod tshogs): pas// de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun// thams cad la yang bslu mi mnga'// gang slad yul min dus min dang // snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa// de slad khyod gsung don mchis te// brtson 'grus
132b8(bstod tshogs): legs par bsams pa bzhin// gsung la bstod pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang // legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med// thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas// khyod kyi
133a1(bstod tshogs): bstan 'dra gzhan la med// khyod kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu// gcig pu phangs la lta chags pas// byis pa gal te smod bgyid na// lha dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis// gzhan ni 'gro ba'i
133a2(bstod tshogs): don slad du// sdug bsngal mang bstar gang lags pa// de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang // gnas par bgyi ba la thug na// phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa// khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te//
133a3(bstod tshogs): mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang // ci yi slad du sgrub mi bgyid// khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang // byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang // khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang // legs pa bzhi po 'di kun
133a4(bstod tshogs): 'thob// dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di// mu sgrogs thams cad skrag mdzad la// bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing // lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin// 'chi bdag bstan pa khams
133a5(bstod tshogs): gsum gyi// sa chen dag na spyod bgyid pa// mi thogs zlog pa ma mchis pa'ang // khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis gnan// khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba// dga' na bskal par yang gnas la//
133a6(bstod tshogs): gang du bdud kyis mi rdzi ba// dor yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi// lung gi don ni bsam pa dang // bsgom dang gus par mnyan pa yi// dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni// bstan las gzhan la mchis ma
133a7(bstod tshogs): lags// drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan// de ltar legs pas khyab 'di la// mgus gang lags de las ni// sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis// bstan pa la bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// /
133a8(bstod tshogs): khyod thos pas ni spo ba skye// mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur// khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te/ bstan pas rnam par grol bar mdzad// khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur// 'phel bas skye
133b1(bstod tshogs): dgu rnams kyang dga'// gshegs pa na ne pan 'dogs mdzad// ldog pa na ni chud par 'gyur// bsgrags pas sdig pa 'jog par mdzad// khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur// btsal bas s+ho
133b2(bstod tshogs): gros spyi 'gyur te// yongs su shes pas rnam par 'dag/ khyod la bsrabs dpal du byed// bsnyen pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur// bsnyen na 'jigs pa med par mdzad// bsnyen bkur bgyis
133b3(bstod tshogs): khyod sA lngar 'os rin chen te// legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags// chos ni spyad 'os rin chen pas// khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags// khyod ni chu bos 'das pa'i gling // sbas pa'i
133b4(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid stob pa ste// srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i sbubs// zar 'tshal rnams kyi 'dren pa lags// tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog/ zhing gshin 'bras bu phun sum tshogs//
133b5(bstod tshogs): srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir// grogs kyi phul yang khyod lags so// phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdza' bshes te// 'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug/ zhi phyir gcig tu yid du 'ong //
133b6(bstod tshogs): yon tan kun mnga' mchod 'os khyod// sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad// sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad// don kun 'grub phyir dpal yangs te// yon tan legs rten bkra shis lags
133b7(bstod tshogs): smon lam la bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// // khyod ni rnga then bgyid la skul// chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yang gcod// gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god// dal bus bgyid la gzhen skul 'debs//
134a1(bstod tshogs): dul ba rnams ni lam la sbyor // dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad// de slad skyes bu 'dul ba yi// kha lo skur ba bla med mchog/ khyod ni nyam thag rnams la brtse// bde bar gnas la
134a2(bstod tshogs): paphan par dgyes// phongs par gnas la thugs rje bas// kun la phan par bzhed pa lags// byed ni dgra bo rnams la'ang bya bas// nyams par gyur la pharan 'dogs mdzad// gtum po rnams la thugs brtse
134a3(bstod tshogs): bas// khyod ni ya rabs rmad cig lags// phan 'dogs bgyid smad pa ma dag/ gal te bla mar 'tshal na go/ khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas// bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal// rang gi don la mi lta bas//
134a4(bstod tshogs): nyid kyi grwa ba la dgur cing // g.yang sa'i mun na gnas rnams la// dpal bar byu pa'ang byed// 'jig rten gnyis kar smar gdugs dang // 'jig nan las ni 'dab skad du// mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten
134a5(bstod tshogs): la// khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad// yul la nye bar spyod pa na// lha mi'i spyod pa tha dad kyang // chos kyi longs spyod thun mongs pas// khyod la dbye ba mi mnga'o// bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang //
134a6(bstod tshogs): na tshod rigs dang yul dang ni// dus kyi skyon med chos rnams kyis// 'di dag kun la sman yon btags// khyod kyi nyan thos srid bral zhing // ye mtshan 'dzin pa med rnams la'ang // lha rnams//
134a7(bstod tshogs): thal sbyar smon bgyid cing // ya mtshan che ba lta bur mchod// e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi// nyid khur gyur pa byung ba brjid// des na mi yang lha rnams kyis// smon par bya ba nyid du gyur//
134a8(bstod tshogs): lam lo 'jug pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu pa'o// // mnyel dang zhi bde nyams gyur dang // skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang // mi mthun pa dang mang po yi// skyon yang yon tan bzhin
134b1(bstod tshogs): dgongs shing // 'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i// thugs kyis brtsod pa mdzad pa gang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do// bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing // /
134b2(bstod tshogs): res 'ga' bsrung ba dag kyang mdzad// nyam nga'i shul du'ang gshegs mdzad cing // rang rod can du'ang mnal ba mdzad// mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang // gdul bya rnams la byams sla
134b3(bstod tshogs): du// skungs berdo dang gtsam tshul dang // skad dang cha lugs skyur ba'ang mdzad// kun gyis dga' mgur rang dron phyir// bran bzhin bskor bar bsgrims pa las// mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la/
134b4(bstod tshogs): mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so// khyod la gang dang gang du yang // ji skad bskul yang mi spong ste// nyid kyi sgrub pa bzang po las// 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma mchis so// ji ltar khyod ni gnod
134b5(bstod tshogs): bgyid la// phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bur// skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang // phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid// khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra bo la// phan pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te// rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba
134b6(bstod tshogs): la// yon tan 'ba' zhig tshol ba lags// khyod ni gang na dug bcas shing // zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa// der ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang // khyod la bdud rtsi can du gyur//
134b7(bstod tshogs): bzod pas mi snyan brjod pa dang // 'khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis// mi snyan smra la bden pas te// khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul// thog ma med dus goms pa yi// mi yi rang bzhin
134b8(bstod tshogs): mang po yang // khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlog nas// skad cig nyid la yongs su sbyar// bka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis pa dang //
135a1(bstod tshogs): 'jungs pa rnams ni gtong bod dang // gtum pa nges par bgyid pa gang // de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags// dgra' bo'i dbang po nyinyed ni dang // nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang //
135a2(bstod tshogs): sor mo'i phreng ba'ang ni bgyis na// su zhig ngo mtshar bskyed mi bgyid// khyod kyi chos kyi ngos tshim pas// gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas// ran mang bting ba'i gnas mal
135a3(bstod tshogs): du// stan rnams bsod nyams nyal bar bgyid// khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas// res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung la// spros gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang // drung du gshegs
135a4(bstod tshogs): nas bshad pa'ang mdzad// dri med gos la tshon bzhin du// thog mar sbyin sogs gtam dag gis// sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni// phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad// 'khor ba mi bzad
135a5(bstod tshogs): gting nas ni// 'gro ba nyon mongs drang slad du// khyod kyis gang zhig mo stsal ba'i// thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis// spu yi cha lugs rnam mang dang // gsung gis so so'i sad bzhin du/
135a6(bstod tshogs): gdul bya'i bsam pa tha dad pa// de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad// de dag kun kyang dag pa dang // mi 'gal ba dang mchod sa dang // brjid dang lha me rnams la ni// smon 'dogs bkur ba
135a7(bstod tshogs): steg lags// sgra rung bgyid pa pa la cher ni// legs par de thog ma lags kyi// bden par gsung ba khyod la ni// de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags// bdag nyid dag pa'ab zhig
135a8(bstod tshogs): gis// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad// 'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing // 'jig rten gsum na mchis ma lags// thog med srid pa nyam nga bar// snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi//
135b1(bstod tshogs): sems can kun la sman slad du// khyod ni de ltar brtson pa lags// mkhas pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // gang gis khyod dran lan lon pa'i// sgrub de mchis snyam
135b2(bstod tshogs): mi bgyid de// skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das// de dag gis kyang la nam lon// khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag/ rang don kho na bgyid par bas// de yi slad du'o brgyal gang // de la
135b3(bstod tshogs): lan go ci zhig lon// khyod ni sems can gnyid log pa'i// rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs tse ba// bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni// grogs bzang bag dang bcas pa lags// khyod kyis
135b4(bstod tshogs): nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad// bdud kyi g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzad brjod// 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan// phan dgongs thugs rje can gyis ni//
135b5(bstod tshogs): sems can rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba// gang zhig khyod kyis ma 'tshastsa ba// gzhan go ci zhig ma chis lags // gal te chos ni 'di dag dang // spro bzhig tu btub nan// don mi 'tshal bar
135b6(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis ni// lhas byin la brten kun la'ang stsol// de skad 'gro la brda' sprod pa// 'gro ba'i mgon po khyod kyis ni// 'di na phan tshun byed pa po// med pa skad du nges par gsungs// 'jig
135b7(bstod tshogs): rten rnams la thugs brtse bas// yun rings su snyed dam chos bshad// 'jig rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i// slob ma dam pa'ang mang du bsun// mngon du gtul bya'i tshogs kyang ni//
135b8(bstod tshogs): mdzes bzang yan chad btul lags pas// de ko khyod la sems can gyi// bu lon lhag ma ci mchis na// 'di ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// sku ga dung til 'bru bzhin blags nas// 'jug
136a1(bstod tshogs): tu'ang khyod kyis shin tu ni// dka' spyad yal bar ma dor ro// gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag/ gzhan don kho nar mdzad do zhes// 'jig rten yid ches dka' 'di la// khyod kyis
136a2(bstod tshogs): mya ngan 'das pa bstan// de skad chos su ma lus pa// sras kyi mchog la gtad mdzad do// gzugs su til 'bru sgyur bshegs nas// khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das// e ma'o gnas pa e ma'o
136a3(bstod tshogs): tshul// e ma'o yon tan e ma'o su// sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la// ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis// par 'dogs mdzad cing bltan sdug/ su gsung zin las ni gyur pa// khyod la'ang sdang bar
136a4(bstod tshogs): rab bgyid pa'i// rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs// bsod nams rgya mtsho rin chen gter// yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs// khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa// de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lags
136a5(bstod tshogs): mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang // bdag gi zho shA bas 'tshal bas// des na 'jigs pa mchis slad du// glo ba la ni gcags bzhin mchis// khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid// tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyag//
136a6(bstod tshogs): bstan mon grangs kyang ma mchis pa// khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags grang // mtsho chen tshwa ba ni bas par ma gyur kyang // skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar// khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma sngags kyang /
136a7(bstod tshogs): bdag ni mchog tu slob dga' zhing mchis// bdag gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i// dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras byu 'khrungs pa yis// ngan rtog rlung dmar 'chubs pas dkrugs pa yi//
136a8(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog/ bu lon med par bsod pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// / brgya lnga bcu pa'i bsod pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze dbyangs kyis mdzod pa rdzogs so//
136b1(bstod tshogs): ga pa hrI r+m+ma / / zlums ga tugs /
136b2(bstod tshogs): da / smra/ ma rgya pa rgya/
136b3(bstod tshogs): ba mo'i pa bshad pa ni// btsun bcu pa yidangon// mad byu da seM pa sa ga/ sa pa kye+e/ slo sa / rnam par dbyu bar bcoMg+sa//
136b4(bstod tshogs): dz+haiM / yi du ga ciganas san sa gas pa dbas rnas pags san// deb kyang pal ba na pa dang /
136b5(bstod tshogs): byung bal bsod pa dang / sbrul bsod pa zhes bya ba'o// sman dgas pa'i bstod par snyed rje sogs pad byabs rnam pa brgyad / thugs rjel brjod pa dang / gsung sa bsod pa dang / bstan la ba
136b6(bstod tshogs): smon mas pa ba pa dang / las drug pa la bstod pa dang / me bsnad padang sa par gyi sri pa dang / thul ni med pal ba sad panas byug/ de rnams kyi bam
136b7(bstod tshogs): tshigs sa bcad pa dag ni// tid bslang bsod dang sa // dam drug 'bras tha bzang // rang byung bzhin no// spyam dpas nam brgyad man// rdzas sung nga bas pa sa
137a1(bstod tshogs): smon lam dang ni lam 'jug dang // dka' mdzad nyid dang mkhas pa dang // bu lon med dang bcu gsum mo// bstod pa bcu gsum po de rnams kyi re re'i bshad pa yongs su rdzogs
137a2(bstod tshogs): pa ni phyis bshad par bya'o// de la gleng bslang ba zhes pa ni dang por brtsam pa'o// gleng bslang ba der don gang dang gang gis bshad pa zhes bya ba bstan pa dang / rgyu la bstod pa la sogs pa rnams la yang
137a3(bstod tshogs): tshigs su bcad pa gang gis don grang bshad pa de yang rab tu bshad par bya'o// re zhig gleng bslang ba'i bstod pa'i tshig gi don ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os
137a4(bstod tshogs): nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyes pa ma lus pa zad pa rjes su dpag pa dang / yon tan ma lus pa mi shes pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la yon tan gyi phyogs
137a5(bstod tshogs): gcig tsam gyis bstod pa dang phyag 'tshal ba'i yon tan gyi tshogs tsam bshad pa zhes bya ba'o// 'dir yang bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni// ston la skyabs 'gro sogs mchod 'os// nyes pa
137a6(bstod tshogs): med pa rjes su dpag/ yon tan mtha' yas kyang ni chas// bstod pa 'dir ni phyag 'tshal phyogs// de la gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su
137a7(bstod tshogs): bcad pa gnyis brtsam par bya ste/ gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun// gtan nas yod ye mi mnga' zhing // gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du// yon tan thams cad gnas gyur pa// gal te sems shig/
137a8(bstod tshogs): yod na ni// de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing // de bstod de ni bkur ba dang // de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs// gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun// zhes smos pa la/ de nyid la ni skyabs su 'gro/
137b1(bstod tshogs): pa'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang sbyar ro// gang zhig ces bya ba ni thun mong gi sgra yin yang don gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na la 'jug go// gang gi phyir nyes pa thams cad zad
137b2(bstod tshogs): pa dang yon tan ma lus pa dang ldan pa ni gzhan med pa de'i phyir 'di ltar bshad de thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun// mnga' la de yang nyams mi mnga'// nyes pa bag chags bcad de yang //
137b3(bstod tshogs): skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga' zhes bya'o// nyes pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste/ nyes pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// yang na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud la nyes pa byed pa ni snod ma
137b4(bstod tshogs): yin par byed pa zhes bya bas na nyes pa'o// mi mnga' zhes bya ba ni mi mnga' ba de/ ston du gyur pa ma brnyes pa'i phyir ro// yod ye zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas
137b5(bstod tshogs): mtshar ba gsal bar byed pa'o// yang na tshig kha bsrung ba'i phyir tshig gi phrad do// gang zhig la nyes pa mi mnga' ba de skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa zhes bya'o// phyi rol gyi 'dod
137b6(bstod tshogs): chags dang bral ba dang / slob pa rnams la nyes pa med pa'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'di bshad de/ thams cad ces bya ba ni
137b7(bstod tshogs): ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i don to// gal te phyi rol gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba de rnams kyi nyes pa med na yang de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyes pa nges par ma spangs pa'i phyir dang // slob pa po rnams kyi
137b8(bstod tshogs): yang ji lta bar sbyor bas khams gsum dang / gnyis dang / gcig gi thob pa'i bsgom pas/ spangs par bya ba rnams ma spangs pa'i phyir ro// dgra bcom pa rnams la yang khams gsum gyi
138a1(bstod tshogs): nyes pa med na de rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ bshadapa/ gtananas shes bya ba ni dus thams cad du zhes bya ba'o// don gang yin zhe na/ gal byed ma
138a2(bstod tshogs): bcom pa rnams la yang nyes pa thams cad mod mod kyi gtan nas med pa ni ma yin te/ yongs su spangs pa'i dus su yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyis yongs sum spangs pa'i chos can min pa'i phyir ro//
138a3(bstod tshogs): 'on rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyes pa thams cad gtan nas med pas de la yang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas na de rnams las kyang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir/ bshadapa/
138a4(bstod tshogs): rnam pa byams cad ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis zhes b+ha ba'i don to// gang gi phyir de rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs paspangs par mgyur te/ de rnams k+Shi bag rgyags ma spangs
138a5(bstod tshogs): pa'i phyir ro// de bsan de rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das la yang shes pa thams cad ni gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du mi mang 'o// de'i phyir
138a6(bstod tshogs): skyes pa ma lus pa shin tu mi mnga' ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan khon la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin no des bshad do// gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun mi mnga'// zhes bya ba ni ba shad pa'i
138a7(bstod tshogs): go rim gyis tshigs su btsud pa 'di sa dgra donan rjesas thun pa 'i 'thur gyigs pasan/ rdzogs su ca padang rjems mthun pa'i phying dgatan nas dang / rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni go ma
138a8(bstod tshogs): gdon pa'o// phyi rol gyi ri bo la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams la gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa med na de rnams la yang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/
138b1(bstod tshogs): dededag dgag par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa/ thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni yon tan ces bya ba dang sbyar ro// yang yon tan thams cad gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang thun mong du nyon mongs pa
138b2(bstod tshogs): med pa dang / smon lam gyi ye shes la sogs pa'o// thun mong ma yin pa rnams kyang ma 'dres pa dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o// de rnams kyang chung ngu dang / 'bring la sogs
138b3(bstod tshogs): pa'i dbye bas ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang chen po nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas na/ bshad pa/ rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni khyad par thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to// khyad par 'phags
138b4(bstod tshogs): par bgyib la/ khyod la thang stod 'ga' mabyung // de skad khyod kyi ldad par rnams// brog drang rim pa dbyer ma mchis// zhes pa gang 'chad par 'gyur bar// gang la zhes bya ba n+ti don sa
138b5(bstod tshogs): bcom ldan 'das khon dang sbyar ro// 'ang zhes bya ba'i spyan khyad par gyi gsal bar byed pa'o// zhes pa ma lus pa zad par gyur pa dang / yon tan gyi byed par ma lus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir deshi
138b6(bstod tshogs): la ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i rigs su zhes bya ba ni nus pa'o// gnas ts+tshe ces bya ba ni yang dag par gnas pa ste/ bzhed pa ts+tshomA gyi phyir dang / mngon du gyur pa'i nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
138b7(bstod tshogs): yon sbyin ni sbeng bab byaste/ zhes bya'i gnyen por bzang zhing goms pa byas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro// bshad pa ni 'di yin no/ nyes pa med pa tsam gyis yon tan med pas byas sa
138b8(bstod tshogs): nus so// skyabs kyi do ni skabs kyi don zhes bya ste grub pa'i mtha'o// ri bol sogs pa 'ide rnams kyang yon tan med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ni nyes pa mi mnga' ba dang / yon tan
139a1(bstod tshogs): dang ldan pa'o// de bas na de nyid skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin gyi ri bo la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya'o// de nyid kyi phyir mang po skyabs su 'gro ba ni
139a2(bstod tshogs): ribo dag dang nags tshal dang // skyed mos tshal dang shing drung dang // mi rnams 'jigs pas bsdigs pa yi// skyabs 'gro 'di ni mchog ma yin// skyabs 'gro 'od ni dam pa min// de la sbubs su
139a3(bstod tshogs): 'gro bas ni// sdug bsngal kun las grol mi 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o// gral te rnam pa thams cad du yon tan gnas par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos la
139a4(bstod tshogs): sogs pa rnams las khyad du gyur pa'i phyir stabs su 'gro bra la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yid na yang de bzhin du spangs pa phun sumatshogs pas kyang bcom ldan 'das bstod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bstan
139a5(bstod tshogs): gtan nas rnam pa thams cad dri zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bshad do// de zhes bya ba ni snang bshad pa'i zhes pa thams cad mi mnga' ba dang yon tan rnams cad dang ldan pa yang ngo do//
139a6(bstod tshogs): nyid ces bya ba ni nges par bzung ba'o// nges par bzung ba gang yin zhe na/ skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'o// de ltar gyur pa las gzhan pa ni skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i snong ma yin no zhes bya
139a7(bstod tshogs): ba'o// sgrubs 'gro sa pa'i skyabs lngas blangs pa'i phyir ro// skabs kyi don ni zhes snang bgad de/ des ni yid kyilas li spro bar byed do// de bskyod ces bya ba ni yang dag par gyur pa'i yon tan la
139a8(bstod tshogs): bstod pa'o// 'gro ba'i rigs zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar ro// des ni ngag gi las la spro bar byed do// de ni bkur ba dang zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar ba la sogs pas bsnyen bkur bya zhes par
139b1(bstod tshogs): dgongs pas so// des ni lus kyi las la spro bar byed do// de yi bstan la gnas zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis des bkag pa mi spyad pa dang / rjes su gnang ba sgrub par byed pa'o//
139b2(bstod tshogs): de lta bus ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur te/ des ni sgrub pa la spro bar byed do// rigs pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa las ma 'das pa ste/ rigs pa dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i don to//
139b3(bstod tshogs): gal te sems shig yod na ni zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la phan pa'i sems bzung bar bya ste/ gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro// bdag la phan par sems pas na zhes bya'o// gzhan du na phyugs rnams la yang
139b4(bstod tshogs): sems yod de/ de rnams kyis ni nyes pa dang yon tan brtag pa'i nus pa dman pas bdag la phan par mi sems pa'o// de bas na bdag la phan par sems pa gang yin pa des ni nyes pa thams
139b5(bstod tshogs): cad mi mnga' ba dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa la skyabs su 'gro ba bya ba dang / de'i bstan pa la gnas par bya'o zhes bstan to// de bas na tshigs su bcad pa de gnyis kyis ni ston pa la
139b6(bstod tshogs): skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os bstan to// dgongs pa gang gi slob dpon 'di nyid kyis skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa 'di lta bus gsal bar byas so zhes bya ba
139b7(bstod tshogs): bshad par bya ste/ 'dir yang slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos zhar la bstan to// kha cig na re skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa mi shes pas 'di skad zer te/ de ring gang la skyabs su mchi/
139b8(bstod tshogs): ji srid bdag la sems yod na// gang gi bstan la gnas pa dang // gang bstod gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi// zhes bya ba de'i phyir gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba rgyas par slob dpon
140a1(bstod tshogs): gyis bshad do// 'dir yang 'di ltar 'chad par 'dod pas gang gi phyir 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa tshol bar byed pa rnams
140a2(bstod tshogs): gang la 'jigs pa gang gis 'di nyid smras pa zhes bya'o// 'di nyid spel ma'i spel mar gnas brtan shAkya blo yis bshad pa ni/ 'bar zhing tsha ba'i 'dod chags sogs// mi yis lus ni bsregs gyur cing
140a3(bstod tshogs): skye mched kun la gnod byed pa'i// dmyal bar yid na skrag gyur pas// de ring gang la skyabs su mchi// zhes pa ni rgyas pa'o// bshad pa ni 'di yin te/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mes yang dag par gdungs
