208a5(bstod tshogs): chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'i phyir na sku gsung 'phrin las zhi gyur pa'o// de la zhe sdang gi rgyu dang bral ba khyod la sdang bar bgyid pa ni gdug pa can sdang bar bgyid pa gang yin pa de rnams gti mug mang po dang ldan pa zhes bya
208a6(bstod tshogs): ba la sogs pas bshad par bya ste/ rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pas bskyed pa dang 'dra ba'i tshig phrad de/ bya ba mngon du gyur pa dang rtse gcig pa la 'jug pa'o// rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni ma
208a7(bstod tshogs): rigs pa'o// mi bzad pa zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'o// de lta bas na re zhig shes rab 'chal ba sdang bar bgyid pa yin te/ shes rab dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid la phan pa ni/ bsod nams rgya mtsho rin chen
208a8(bstod tshogs): gter// yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs// khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa// de dag la yang phyag 'tshal legs// yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos
208b1(bstod tshogs): pa la/ bsod nams ni dge ba'i las te/ de nyid rgya mtsho dang 'dra bas na tshad med pa'i phyir ro// rin chen ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams te/ gter ni rin po che'i gter te/ mi zad pa'i
208b2(bstod tshogs): phyir ro// chos ni byams pa dang snying rje la sogs pa rnams te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos te/ chos kyi tshogs ni chos kyi tshogs so// de ltar byams
208b3(bstod tshogs): pa nyid kyis yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas te zhing du gyur pa'o// sems can gang zhes bya ba ni srog chags so// khyod la zhes bya ba ni khyod dang sbyar ro// 'dud pa ni 'dud par byed pa'o// de dag la yang
208b4(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la'o// legs zhes bya ba ni legs par byas pa'o// de gang yin zhe na/ smras pa/ phyag 'tshal ba ni srog chags de rnams la phyag 'tshal bar bya ba gang yin pa de ni shin tu
208b5(bstod tshogs): legs zhes bya bas ni ston pa la gus pa bstan to// da ni bstod pa rngo mi thog pa bshad par bya ste/ mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang // bdag gi zho shabs 'tshal bas// des na 'jigs pa mchis slad du/
208b6(bstod tshogs): glo ba la ni lcags bzhin mchis// mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la// me bas pa gang yin pa de ni mi bas pa'o// khyod ni khyod kyi'o// yon tan sngar bshad zin to//
208b7(bstod tshogs): mgon po zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o// zho sha ni nus pa ste ye shes kyi zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o// kyang gi sman don gzhan 'chad par 'gyur ba'o// bas 'tshal ba ni gang la bas pa ma mchis pa zhes bya ba'o//
208b8(bstod tshogs): bdag gi zhes bya ba ni bstod par byed pa yi'o// des na bya ba ni rgyu de las so// 'jigs pa mchis slad du zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mibs pa dang bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal
209a1(bstod tshogs): pa'i slad du dang sbyar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang 'gal ba'i skyon thob cing gnod pa'i ltung ba yin te/ de'i phyir 'jigs pa ni 'jigs pa'i slad du'o// glo ba la gcags bzhin
209a2(bstod tshogs): mchis zhes bya ba ni bstod par bya ba'i phyir bdag bstod par mi byed pa zhes bya ba drang bar bya'o// gcags bzhin zhes bya ba na mchis pa dang sbyar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams kyis tshim pa'i phyir
209a3(bstod tshogs): bstod pa mi byed pa ni ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang 'jigs pa mchis pa'i slad du zhes bya ba ste mdor bsdus gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mabs pa yin na gang gis bstod par byed nus pa yin zhe na/ smras pa/
209a4(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid// tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab// bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa// khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags grang // bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa// zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o// /
209a5(bstod tshogs): mtshad ma mchis zhes bya ba ni yongs su gcod mi nus pa ste/ yon tan gyi nus pa gcig kyang rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// gcig la sogs grangs kyis bgrang mi nus pas na grangs kyang ma mchis pa ste/
209a6(bstod tshogs): yon tan mtha' yas pa'i phyir ro// sangs rgyas las sems can gzhan gyi yul ma yin pas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// bstan pa ni dpe'o// bstan min ni dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i don to// bdag nyid
209a7(bstod tshogs): ni bdag nyid kyis so// nyid ces bya ba ni nges par 'dzin pa'o// bdag nyid kyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog dang rang rgyal ba rnams kyis ni ma yin no// bdag ces bya ba ni rang gi sgra'i rnam grangs so// dper na
209a8(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten pa kha cig smra ba ni rang gi bdag nyid kyis bdag grong du 'gro bar bya zhes bya ba'o// rang gi zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi sku'i nga ba nyid do// khyod ces bya ba ni nges par 'dzin pa'o//
209b1(bstod tshogs): ci zhig nges par 'dzin zhe na/ kha cig 'di skad smra bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yang shAkya'i sras dang dus mnyam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byung de dag phan tshun yon tan rgyas par mkhyen
209b2(bstod tshogs): ba zhes bya bas na de dag dgag par bya ba'i phyir nges par 'dzin pa ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyod nyid kyis bdag nyid mkhyen gyi/ gzhan gyis ni rngo mi thog go zhes bya ba'o// de ni sangs rgyas bcom
209b3(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das snga ma dang phyi ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis 'jig rten du dras mnyam du 'byung ba de ni gnas dang go skabs med do zhes bya ba de ni mdo'i tshig go// de bas na khyod kho nas bdag nyid mkhyen pa'i
209b4(bstod tshogs): mchod 'os yin gyi/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i ni ma yin te/ kho bo cag mi gtsang ba'i srin bu dang 'dra bas lnga spos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'o// de'i phyir na khyod kyi/ mtsho chen cha ba ni bas par ma gyur kyang //
209b5(bstod tshogs): skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar// khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma bsgrags kyang // bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis// khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam zhes bya ba la/ yon tan rnams kyi cha ni cha ste/ de'i
209b6(bstod tshogs): sgra tsam gyi rtse mo ste nyung ngu zhes bya ba'i don to// de nyid bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi ma bsgrags pa ni ma bstod pa ste/ yon tan thams cad lta ga las so// de bzhin du yang mchog ni phan par du'o// bdag ni
209b7(bstod tshogs): bdag gi'o// dga' ba ni rangs pa'o// glo ba ni glo ba la mchis pa'o// yon tan gyi cha tsam ma bsgrags pas dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba'i brgal ba'i lan bshad pa ni bas par mgyur gyung zhes
209b8(bstod tshogs): bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la/ bas par mgyur zhes bya ba ni bas par ma gyur pa'o// mtsho chen ma ba ni cha ba zo// skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu ni bgyid ltar ni zhi bar 'gyur ba'o// ltang ni gang gi phyir ro//
210a1(bstod tshogs): de bas na tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi mtsho chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi cha tsam la bstod pas bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis zhes pa ste mdor bsdus pa'o// da ni
210a2(bstod tshogs): bstod pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bsngo ba bshad par bya ste/ bdag gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i// dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis// ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshubs pas dkrugs
210a3(bstod tshogs): pa yi// 'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog/ dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o// 'bras bu 'khrungs pa ni 'bras bu byung ba yis so// 'di'i ni brgya
210a4(bstod tshogs): lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa las byung ba ste/ dge ba ni ngag gi ngo bo nyid kyi dge ba'i las kyi'o// ci 'dra ba zhig ce na/ smras pa/ thub pa la dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thub pa la dad pa las byung ba'i spobs
210a5(bstod tshogs): pa ni shes rab ste/ de las skyes pa ste byung ba gang yin pa de ni thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa ste/ dge ba'i las de'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis so// 'dod chags dang gnod sems la sogs pa ni ngan rtog go//
210a6(bstod tshogs): de nyid yul rnams la sems rnam par g.yeng ba'i phyir rlung dmar 'tshubs pa'o// de yis 'tshubs pa ni ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshubs pas dkrugs pa'o// 'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog ces bya ba ni skye
210a7(bstod tshogs): bo thams cad kyi sems dbang du gyur nas dgra bcom par gyur cig ces bya ba ni dgongs pa'o// de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas brgya lnga bcu pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa'o// bde gshegs la bstod bshad pa yis/
210a8(bstod tshogs): bdag gis dge ba gang thob pa// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir// de las bde gshegs 'gyur bar shog/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa dge slong dga' byed snyan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
210b1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI shad+d+ha kar war+m+ma dang / lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / @#// []#/ rgya gar skad du/ gaN+DI sto tha gA thA/ bod skad du/
210b2(bstod tshogs): gaN+DI'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig sngon du byang chub shing gi drung du nyi ma'i lam nas sod cig gA greng gA greng// gA gA gre gA ga gA gred g+ha na g+ha g+han g+ha greng lus
210b3(bstod tshogs): lago chas bcings rnams dang // gang zhig gzugs mdzes bud med rnams kyis rnaTA pa ti D+D+h+ya T+Ta b+hi/ d+hA T+TanA b+hi/ DA D+ha rnams kyis// 'di ltar rjes su mi 'khrugs lha dang mi yis phyag byas gang de shAkya seng ge
210b4(bstod tshogs): nyid kyis srungs// gang zhig 'dod lha'i lus can ma rnams ka ha ka ha ka ka hA hA hI ta zhes dgongs rnams dang // gang tshe dregs can rnams kyis ta Te ta ta Ti ta nI tA Ta nA ti zhes rab tu smra ba rnams dang ni/
210b5(bstod tshogs): kung kud brang bud ku kU tsi ta ku tsi ta ku ha ra tsi ldan po rnams kyi ngag rnams kyis// mi skrag zos pas dri ma kun zhe gang yin thub pa'i dbang po de yis zhi gyur cig/ smin ma 'khyog po bskyod dang 'dod dran mnga'
210b6(bstod tshogs): yi rol pas rdzi ma mga' bras 'bebs rnams dang // rtsol ba'i lus can ma rnams yal ga rol pas rtse ba'i yan lag can ma rnams dang ni// ngo tsha dang bcas zur gyis sgra dang yid 'ong snyan 'jam rab
210b7(bstod tshogs): tu dga' byed sna tshogs pa'i// tshig rnams kyis ni thugs mi 'khrul pa 'dod dran las rgyal gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo// sa gzhi kun tu g.yo dang rno ba'i mda' yi tshogs kyis bar snang la ni
210b8(bstod tshogs): gtibs pa yi// 'bar ba rnams dang khro bo'i mi rnams phyogs dang phyogs su 'bar bas chu tshogs rnams 'khrugs dang // 'bang mdung ral gri 'khor lo sog le rnon po can gyi bdud kyi dpa' bo sba
211a1(bstod tshogs): 'byin pa// byams pa'i mtshon cha gang gis rab tu zhi zhing mngon rgyal de yis thub dbang khyod kyis srungs// rnam par 'pho ba las skyes khro ba rab gsal rnam gtsigs dge ba
211a2(bstod tshogs): nges par sogs 'jigs pa'i// 'brug sgrog char sprin dra ba rab gsal glang po'i bum bgyings bcings pa'i mun nag 'thibs pa dang // 'dod lha'i dpung tshogs 'joms pa'i mi 'phro ba dang ral
211a3(bstod tshogs): gri'i 'od kyis sna tshogs ma lus gsal// me tog mda' can sde rnams gang gis skad cig gis 'joms sangs rgyas khyod kyis srung bar mdzod// mdzes pa'i rna ba'i drung gang pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i
211a4(bstod tshogs): rjerdzi ma mig gi 'bras bu g.yo// shin tu chags pas rnam par smin ma rab tu rnam rgyas mthun pa dang bcas smin rol pa'i// mig can bdud kyi lus can ma rnams yongs chags gyur dang mtha'
211a5(bstod tshogs): dmar zhi ba min rnams kyis// kun tu drang bar ma btub skyon bsal gyur pa'i drang srong mchog de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ gang gi thugs ni 'khrul par mgyur bdud rnams gsal ba rnam par gtsigs dang dog
211a6(bstod tshogs): par bcer dang lde bskyod dang // dpal kyi rtse mo lagacan rnams dang glang po rta yi gdong can dang ni seng ge stag gi gdong rnams dang // rab tu mdzes pa'i 'dod pa'i rgyun du bzhin rtsi ba med pa 'khor bas 'jigs
211a7(bstod tshogs): gang shes// bsregs pa bsas pa 'jig rten mgon pa grub pa dbang po sangs rgyas gang yin khyod kyis grangs// gang gi na 'khrugs pa med des gzhan po'i klung dang rgya mdzo na 'dzin rnams dang ni/
211a8(bstod tshogs): 'brug spogs rnams dang bdud kyi dpa' bo sna tshogs brgya phrag gdong dang drag po'i gzugs can mtha' yas dang // gang zhig me tog can de rtsa bzhin ma brtses thams cad mkhyen pa dang ni 'dod chags
211b1(bstod tshogs): sh+tsa Sh+Tan+ta / ShA r+b+yA t+yA /
211b2(bstod tshogs): dang bral ba// dpal ldan sangs rgyas dpa' bo sdig pa'i 'jigs pa 'brog pa rnam 'grar med pa de yis bsrung bar mdzod// bdud rnams phung chen lag nA ral gri dgra sa gzhu dang mdung thung lhag par rtse mo rnom
211b3(bstod tshogs): dang // gang mdapa'abebs dang srog byed du mas gsang sgrogs pa 'jigs par byed pa 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyis// gang gi thugs ni mi 'khrug ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa dam pa skyel mo grang bcings pa//
211b4(bstod tshogs): sredags ma 'jigs pa 'phrog byed sangs rgyas dpa' bo shin tu dpa' ba de la 'dud ci phyag 'tshal lo// mthon po arba Ta Ta Tar rgod rab gas la non po byung bar bcings pa'i dril bu sogs pa dang // bsgyings pa
211b5(bstod tshogs): dang bas brgyad pa gtsigs pa ral pa bzhis pa'i gsan mig yon pan rna thas// sa pa ga ma tugs sa ba ngas pas gang gis byang nabaH// dum+b+ha sa narnams pan pan bang
211b6(bstod tshogs): gsapa pa'i pa Ta tags la sangs rgyas dpa' bo bder gyur cig/ ke kaN+Da rA ma ra N+Da DA pra ti thA la kAn dang rabA Na N+DaH ra d+ha d+haT+Ta// chom pa rnam brtan ma parta Na kar+tha ta ka thA hi snyi khal snang khal snyam/
211b7(bstod tshogs): dzam pran dzam tha' dza dzi mthang kha ma kha mu khra la mAng waHkhwa mang khu/ khu mang khuHkhwa mang khu sogs rnams kyis mi 'jigs lha dang me yis phyag byas shAkya se ni khyod kyis srung // gang gis bdud kyi chu 'dzin thogs
211b8(bstod tshogs): pa'i lus kyis yongs su bsgrengs pa'i dargyal mtshan mo grol// bdud kyi lus can ma rnams kyi ni gdong gi pad+mo 'i nags dpal ma mthun phyogs gcig pa// yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub zla ba dang ni son ka'i
211b9(bstod tshogs): kra mu bzhin yongs thob pa// de 'dir chos kyi phonya spogs pa chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi gaN+DI'o// gsod pa mthob tshim med skad cig kyang ni rnam par dpyod pa'i mthar byed 'dis ring po nas/
212a1(bstod tshogs): der ni sems rnams chud pas dus kun tu ni rgyun mi 'chad par legs par spyod par byed pa yi// 'dir ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bskor zhugs pa yang yang srog chags rnams la slob pa gang yin
212a2(bstod tshogs): pa// 'di ni phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du ni mi dman rab tu grags pa rtsub pa chos kyi gaN Di'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du skar ma'i tshogs las rnam rgyal bas// 'bar de mu stegs skye bo dang ni rgyal ba'i bstan la 'dir/
212a3(bstod tshogs): sa bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gi ni rgyan gyi snying po gaN+DI 'di// g.yul las rgyal ba'i cang te'u gtum po bzhin du grags pa'o// gang yang khyod ni skrag pa ma yin dza mi dza mi nU D+hu ma rinya dza De na nA Di nA De// Do ma ba na Di ma ban Du Ti ma
212a4(bstod tshogs): ba rmArmAnan b+hU ma// dA mr-i T+Ta drA pra Na yang la ba 'a la// thabs mnga' ba'i skabs kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams pacar pa tsha ba 'ju rten
212a5(bstod tshogs): pa yis ltos// sa gzhi rab tu g.yo ba'i g.yo ba las byung ri bo rab tu bskyod cing ri rab rgyal po g.yo// lha'i tshogs dang gdon gyi 'od zer dang ni klu'i rgyal po ma lus pa rnams skrag pa dang // mu stegs rnams
212a6(bstod tshogs): kyis gaN Di gtum po sna tshogs 'jigs par byed pas zos pas skrag po dang // sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi ni zhi ba zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa bzhir sgra sgrogs dge 'dun la 'dir sgrogs// 'di ni gtsug lag khang gi rtse
212a7(bstod tshogs): mor rab tu sgrogs pa'i gaN+DI ste// sprin gyi sgra bzhin byed pa sgra rnams de ring yid du 'ong ba ni// ma ltar shin tu mnyen gshin pa yis legs par phyi rol song rnams kyi// bu rnams zas dus la ni yongs su 'bod par byed
212a8(bstod tshogs): pa'i gaN+DI'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo yongs su 'joms pa mchog tu gyur pa ste// sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen thams cad kyis ni ma klubs pa'i// sgra sgrogs byed pa'i lha yi rnga chen dang mnyam sgra chen gyi/
212b1(bstod tshogs): gaN Dis sdig pa ma lus rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o// 'dis ni lha dang lha min lto 'phye chen pos mchod byas pa// zhi ba mchog tu nye bar bzhud pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yi// gaN+DI sgra sgrog 'chi ba
212b2(bstod tshogs): pa'i chen dang mnyam smras// mu rmugs can gzhan pa ni snying nam par 'jams pa'o// d-i nig 'di gas pa pa mi rnams da / lha dang me dang skam sbyin rnams 'dzi / babyung
212b3(bstod tshogs): po rnams kyis bde gshegs gaN Di 'di nyon cig/ lus pa med pa'i dge slong tshogs kyis yongs su bskor// glang chen rnams kyis 'jigs pa'i dus tshigs 'khrugs pa'i dus kyi nam mkha' chu 'dzin
212b4(bstod tshogs): khyab bzhin gyis// 'gro ba rnams ni 'joms dang yang ba dang 'jigs pas 'dar ba bzlog par byed pa'i rgyu// nye bar zhib mu stegs ma lus pa yi nga rgyal de yis shin tu med byed pa// thub pa mchog
212b5(bstod tshogs): rnams kun gyis chos rnams 'phel ba'i don bzhag pa de'i gaN+DI khyod kyis srungs// bsod nams mchog gyur de grub gyur cig 'tsho ba g.yo ba'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi// mtho ris dang ni byang grol rab ster
212b6(bstod tshogs): ngan 'gro ster byed sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'dir ni dbus na 'dug pa'i sbrang ma skra 'byin lta bur bdag gis smra ba yi// bdud dgA'i zhabs kyi chu skyes dgal me tog snyim pas gtor ro khyod kyis srungs/
212b7(bstod tshogs): brgya byin la sogs lha tshogs rnams kyis shin tu gus pas me tog gtor rnams dang // mkha' la sil sbyin sgrogs pa rnams kyis yongs gang gus pas me tog gtor rnams dang // mtho sa nas nis
212b8(bstod tshogs): la babs par grags pa yun rings bskyal byas gang yin pa// snying rje'i gter chen bcom ldan 'das kyis gaN+DI rab gtum de yis 'gro bsrungs// yum gyi zhums nas 'thon pa tsam gyis rang gis gom
213a1(bstod tshogs): / pa bdun du bzhud pa pa'o// 'khor ba mthar phyung rang gi tshig ni rab tu brjod pa blo gros mi chung ba// gang du skye ba'i dngos por srid pa gsal bar brjod pa rnams su gyur pa yis// bde ba
213a2(bstod tshogs): gshegs pa'i mun pa dum bur byed pa'i gaN+DI de yis rgyal gyur cig/ lhun po mchog gi stong dang rin chen ri bo nor bu'i 'od can kun gyi ngos dang ni// ri dbang rgyal po gangs ri'i steng dang mi yi yul dang klu yi
213a3(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten dag na gnas pa'i// 'chi med 'dod khams dbang po dang ni gling bzhi'i mi bdag nyi zla lha min dbang po rnams// bde gshegs chos kyi gaN+DI thos pas thams cad bde gshegs dgongs pa bzang
213a4(bstod tshogs): la 'bod pa'o// sa gsum kun na yod pa'i mi sdug rigs mang glang chen dregs pa mang po rnams bzung zhon// thams cad mche ba ring po phyir bton rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i rtags ni gzung byas nas/
213a5(bstod tshogs): bsdigs pa'i rigs kun 'ongs pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bla ma mkhas pa'i hUM sgras 'jigs mdzad pas// 'jig rten kun las rgyal ba byung zhes sgra sgrogs zhabs drung 'dud cing sangs rgyas cod pan brgyan// bdud kyi bu mo khri
213a6(bstod tshogs): sAn sa le dang 'dra mig ldan nu ma mkhrang zhing rgyas ldan pa// dang po'i 'gros 'dra bran mo'i steng du zhon zhing klu len rnga yi tshogs rdung mgyogs 'gro ba// rgya mtsho chen po 'byur ba'i chu bo bzhi ltar rgyun mi 'chad par mang po
213a7(bstod tshogs): 'ongs rnams la// tsuM TuM b+hi bruM khyad 'phags sgra rnams rgyun mi 'chad par sgrogs byed gaN+DI nyid yin no// bdud kyi stobs las rgyal byas 'jigs pa chen po bstan pa byas nas skyon zad pa'i// 'dir ni de bzhin
213a8(bstod tshogs): shin tu mdzes pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa gang // ma lus yon tan bzang po dang ldan sangs rgyas dag pa'i thugs rje can de yi// gaN+DI gtum po sdig 'phrog byed pas mi rnams kyi ni dur bu
213b1(bstod tshogs): byed gyur cig/ tshangs pa lkug pa ltar gyur lha yi bla ma'i snyems pa med gyur thams cad 'du// 'tsho byed blo chung gyur to skal ba dang ldan khyab 'jug ci yang mi smrar song // 'dir ni gang gi yon tan grags pas lha
213b2(bstod tshogs): rnams gang de ngo tshas yan lag khums// thub pa'i gaN+DI 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa med pa'i 'gro rnams ngan 'gro las ni srung // tshangs pa mig stong dbang po khyab 'jug nyi zla srin po gnod sbyin rnams dang ni//
213b3(bstod tshogs): dri za lto 'phye mi 'am ci dang lha min ma dang bdud ris yi dgas dang // gang zhig langs pas sa yis gzhi rnams gser 'od 'bar 'gyur gos ser can de kun// thams cad ma lus de bzhin gshegs pa bla mas
213b4(bstod tshogs): chos ni nyan du 'bod pa'o// gang gis skye bar chung zhing dman pa'i dgongs can mu stegs pa rnams skrag pa 'thob// khyad 'phags 'phel ba'i blo can sangs rgyas pa rnams spro ba rab tu 'phel 'thob pa//
213b5(bstod tshogs): gang 'di'i yon tan rnams 'thob rgya chen po yi skyon ni zad par 'gro ba yi// gaN+DI de yis rtag tu rtsod du sa srid pa rnams kyi sdig pa zad gyur cig/ rnam dag dgongs can gang la cho ga bzhin du phyag byas mthon po'i
213b6(bstod tshogs): 'gro bgrod dang // gang gis mi mthun phyogs ni thams cad myur du zad pa ster bar byed pa dang // 'khrug long gti mug rab rib thub pa'i chos kyis gaN+DI de yis 'joms gyur cig/ tshe dang ldan pa rnams
213b7(bstod tshogs): kyis srid pa lus byung 'jigs pa de ni khyod kyis chom// 'di zos dge bas sa 'dzin pa yi tshangs sogs sa bzhi'i mthil du myur du ltung // sa 'dzin rnams ni 'dar zhing sa gzhi myur du sa yi 'og tu 'gro ba dang //
213b8(bstod tshogs): mu stegs pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa gzhan la phan rtsom dag pa'i bdag nyid can// sangs rgyas pa rnams myur du nye bar zhi 'gyur gaN+DI de ni 'du bar mdzod// gaN+DI'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi
214a1(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa rdzogs so// mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i bu'i rnal ldan pa dang / oM tsA ba btsun patarmA yon tan gyis bstur ba'o// / []/ rgya ga gad du/
214a2(bstod tshogs): thug ldan pa/ bod gad / brel mar bskyod pa nas bya ba/ thabs cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// gting ma 'amed pa'i 'am ba la// rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam par gnas// 'dod chags la
214a3(bstod tshogs): sogs mi bzad pa'i// chu srin gyis ni lus zos pas// de ring gang la skabs su mchi// ji srid padag la sebs yod na// gang gi bstan la gnas pa dang // gang bstod gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi/
214a4(bstod tshogs): gang sheg sa ni 'as pa kra/ g+hutan na m+b+ha yong sa mi ma zhing // gas 'ang rnamapa thams du// kun tan 'ams cadaganas byu ba// gzhan gyi gnod pa bsngal ba'i byed// gung gnas
214a5(bstod tshogs): zad gyur pa// gzhan mngon pa zo dang zar pa'i phyir// yon tan go bam byas bdag gi min// gal nyi sems shig yod nan// de nyid la ni grabs 'gro zhing // de bstod de ni bkur ba dang // de 'i bstan pa
214a6(bstod tshogs): gnas pa'i rigs// gang zhig zhes de gzhan la gnod// de ni yon tan gang gzhan spyad// nus pa rang gi zhes bcom pa// 'tsho ba dang don yon tan no// thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun/
214a7(bstod tshogs): nas// skye bo dkar ba spyod pa cad// bcom ldan 'das kyi srud nga ni// gsung dang thugs kyi zin gas pa// ne 'gas glang ba gang gibakyang // chos dang ldan par grags mi rnyed// che ba'i yon tan ma yis ca
214b1(bstod tshogs): tshig rnyed nges par ma blangs pa// gal te ston bstod mi byed na// mi khom gnas bzhin bdag bcom 'gyur// rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga dra// rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar// dam chos dga' ston
214b2(bstod tshogs): cher bcas pa'i// mi nyid bdag gis thob nas ni// mang du bcad par gyur pa ste// mthar yang bskal pa'i skyon gyis gnas// lcen don can mgyur te// gzhan du bdag ni bslus par gyur//
214b3(bstod tshogs): mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brang zhing // las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa// bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go/ snying po ci phyir blang mi bya// yon tan gyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// gal te bstod pa mi byed na//
214b4(bstod tshogs): shA ri'i bu la sogs pas kyang // nges par bstod par mi 'gyur ro// de ltas thub pa'i yon tan gyis// yul lta grangs med shes mod kyi// rang gi don la gus pa yis// de yi phyogs gcig
214b5(bstod tshogs): bsgribs te brjod// gang zhig gzhan la slob pa dang // dman phyir legs par ma bslabs gang // nyes pa zad kyang de slob cing // gang phyir don gyis khyod mi slob// gang gi yon tan grags dag ngag/
214b6(bstod tshogs): mthul thug pa ma mchis la// rmad byung phrin las dpag med can// rang byung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan grangs kyi mthu yis ni// slob la smra bar nus pa dang // mtha' can gzhal bar byed nus
214b7(bstod tshogs): kyi// mi slob pa yi mdun du min// 'di snyed bgyi ba'i mtha' med na// 'di ltar legs shes ci zhig smos// khyod kyi yon tan slad du bdag/ bsod nams snyam nas spyi brdol skyes// sangs rgyas
214b8(bstod tshogs): bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bstod pa gleng bslang ba zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o// // bde gnas snying rje med pa ni// spyod dam mi spyod rnams mi spyod//
215a1(bstod tshogs): rang gi bde bas gzhan dbang phyir// de nyid dang ni nges par sbyar// spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi// rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs nas// 'gro ba 'di ni nyam thug ces// khyod bdag
215a2(bstod tshogs): da kyis nas rnaMs pazhes// dU rnam par byungs nas s+ho// gzhan gyis nyan la babyed// 'altar bdug pa rnal btsun pas// dge ba myer / khyod ma pa tsam lags pa /
215a3(bstod tshogs): khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams// khyod ni madrin mdza' bshes te// 'brel ba med pa'i gnyen 'dun lags// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i phyir// thugs rjes 'gro ba blangs nas ni// slong la dgyes pa 'phel 'gyur
215a4(bstod tshogs): ba// baM spud ma ldang dang bcas// nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na// dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal// legs mdzad khyod kyis srog kyang ni// slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btang // bdag la bdag nyid
215a5(bstod tshogs): spangs nas ni// gzhan la bdag nyid blangs pas na// rtswa yis rin chen rigs chen ltar// dgyes pa mi nyams ldan pa yis// nyid kyi sku dang srog dag gis// lus can gshed mas zin rnams
215a6(bstod tshogs): kyis// lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni// lan brgya phrag tu bslu ba mdzad// 'jig rten bdag lha'i bsam pa can// snying rje'i sems ni med pa ste// sdug bsngal 'jigs sam bde 'dod pas//
215a7(bstod tshogs): tshul khrims kun tu blangs nas srung // ngan 'gros bsnyengs slad ma lags la// bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma lags// dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' zhig gis// khyod kyis tshul khrims goms par mdzad//
215a8(bstod tshogs): phyi rol rkyen gyis ma rdzogs dang // rang sbyor phun tshogs med pa'i phyir// bsam pa rnam par dag pas kyang // tshul khrims pha rol dag mi 'gyur// rtag tu gya gyu rnam spangs shing // drang brtan rnams ni rtag
215b1(bstod tshogs): bsten pas// yongs su dag pa'i las rnams kyis// khyod ni gzhi rten gcig pur gyur// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i rgyu// thugs rje'i dbang gis mchod bya yang // ma 'ongs sdug bsngal bskyengs pa
215b2(bstod tshogs): yis// gzhan nyid rang nyid la nyes pas// sdug bsngal mang pos gzer ba ni// khyod kyis dga' ba'i thugs kyis ni// nyon mongs rnams ni sran btsugs nas// skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse//
215b3(bstod tshogs): gzer bar gyur pa rnams la yang // nyes pa rnams ni mi sems pa// bzod pa'i pha rol phyin 'dod phyir// byas pa nyid ni rjes lta bas// khyod kyis gzhan gyi don skad du// sru srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang //
215b4(bstod tshogs): de'adra srog chags 'gum pa las// bsos pa rnams la'ang byung mgyur// phan byed mchod pas dga'agyur pa// ngo mtshar che ba'i sems mi rtse// mgon po khyod ni dgyes pa gang // bdag gi de ni ngo mtshar
215b5(bstod tshogs): dgongs// khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par// gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par// bshad ma dgyid pa'i sems can la'ang // gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang // gang yang gshed ma nyid kyis ni//
215b6(bstod tshogs): ral gri nyid kyis bcad byas nas// byang chub gnyer bar gzigs nas ni// byams pa la ni bzhugs par gyur// khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te// dpa' khyod kho nas snying por
215b7(bstod tshogs): mkhyen// de gzhan skye bos 'ol mi mchi// de ltar bdag nyid gyur pa yang // sems can rtag tu sdug bsngal can// ji ltar sangs rgyas chos rnams la// so sor brtags nas brtson 'grus bya// dka' spyad
215b8(bstod tshogs): las ni ma bgyis par// go 'phang rnyed dka' mi 'thob ces// de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par// khyod kyis brtson 'grus legs par spel// khyad par yon tan rnyed nas ni// nyes pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
216a1(bstod tshogs): sems can don du khur khyer yang // thugs ni kun tu mi bsnyel te// khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la// khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung // de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams// thog drung
216a2(bstod tshogs): rim par dbyer ma mchis// bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni// dag pa'i rjes su cis mi mchi// lha dang nga rgyal snang med pa// gang gi shes rab kyis ni bsal// thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang // rtag
216a3(bstod tshogs): tu rjes su 'brel slad du// ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa yi// shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma chags// kha cig mu stegs pa rnams ni// longs spyod kyis ni des legs 'thad// gzhan la gcig tu nyid kyis ni/
216a4(bstod tshogs): longs spyod dgag pa ma mdzad do// gzhan dang thun mongs ma lags pa'o// bde ba gang de gya nom yang // dam pa'i spyod ldan khyod 'dral// gnod par bas kyi sman ma mchis// khyod kyi shes rab mtshungs min
216a5(bstod tshogs): te// dud 'gro du ma rnams la yang // gang zhig ye shes rnam dag phyir// ji ltar rjes su mchi mi bgyid// 'dres pa las ni legs bshad pa// snying po skyon med nyi tshe zhig/ khyod kyis kun bzhes thugs la
216a6(bstod tshogs): bzhag/ nyes bshad dug bzhin yongs su spangs// legs bshad chen po sku srog gis// tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed tsam yang // gang zhig shes rab rnam 'phel phyir// ji ltar rjes su mchi mi bgyid// khyod
216a7(bstod tshogs): nyid gcig pus rnam mkhyen mdzad// rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis// legs bshad srog gis mjal ba na// skye ba de dang de dag tu// byang chub slad du dpa' rtsal bstan// sems can brtson 'grus 'phags
216a8(bstod tshogs): pa ni// grangs med par ni gyur pa yang // spyod med zha bo rnams kyi gang // skye bos thob par mi nus so// de slad grangs med gsum dag tu// khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na// brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grags
216b1(bstod tshogs): gyur pas// go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyed pa zhes bya ba las rgyu'i sgo nas bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // yon tan thams cad
216b2(bstod tshogs): cung zad gzigs// gsol ba na yang mnal mi mnga'// nye bar blangs pa brtan mdzad cing // khyab par laM ni thugs ni chags// mthol phrag dog mi mdzad cing // dman la rngan chen me mdzad la// mnyam
216b3(bstod tshogs): la 'gran pa ma mchis pas// khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur// dka' bas sgrub la nyams mi mnga'// yun ring du ni mi gnas shing // chags bcas kyang ni ngal che ba// 'bras bu las ni shin tu chung //
216b4(bstod tshogs): d+ha sa// ra bya // / rba // sa rnag/
216b5(bstod tshogs): snying rjes phongs pas mi sems pa// brtson 'grus mi g.yo blangs nas ni// ji ltar khyod kyi zhabs rdul yang // bsod nams skye ba mchog gyur pa// de ltar khyod kyis legs spyad pas// bdag nyid rab tu
216b6(bstod tshogs): bstan pa mdzad// 'jig rten pa yi 'phags la ma dang // brtson 'grus shes rab kyis kyang ni// tshe rabs snga ma'i mthar yang ni// khyod ni yang dag byung ba yis// nyes pa nyam smad rtsa nas bdon// yon tan
216b7(bstod tshogs): spel nas rnam par sbyangs// gzhung lugs bzang po des na khyod// grub mchog lhag par brnyes pa lags// rtag tu ngal zhing mgon med pa// slong zhing bde ba ma mchis te// sems can rnams la nyams
216b8(bstod tshogs): med pa'i// nyon mongs mang po spyod mthong nas// ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de// bag chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa// de ltar rnam pa thams cad du// nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom// gzhan gyi phun
217a1(bstod tshogs): tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir// khyod ni gtso bor mthong nas ni// bdag gi yon tan dman pa'i phyir// gzhan min brtson 'grus phrin las can// ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang // 'dra ba tsam
217a2(bstod tshogs): yang mi gda' ba// de ltar khyod kyis bsags bsags nas// bdag nyid la ni yon tan bsgrubs// chung dang dman dang 'tsho ba med// kha na ma tho chags bcas dang // tshim par mi byed legs mtha'
217a3(bstod tshogs): med// thun mongs gsal dang mi ldan te// 'jig rten pa yi dpe dngos kun// gegs bgyid pa dang sgrib pa can// re zhig pa dang nyi tshe ba// shin tu rnyed par slab lags// mang ba dang ni rab kyi rab// kun tu
217a4(bstod tshogs): bag// la ba ye sa// la med yang ba dag/ la sa// dus sa sa// gan pa ga /
217a5(bstod tshogs): dpe lta mchis par gal 'gyur// nyan thos blo mchog rnams kyis kyang // bskal pa rnams kyis ma rtogs pa// lha ma yin gyis gting rnyed pa'i// khyod kyi dgongs 'dra ga la mchis// gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs
217a6(bstod tshogs): pa'i dkyil// gting dang pha rol med brtags na// rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni// gnag rjes lta bur sa ler gda'// 'dod pa'i mtha' la ma chags pas// gang zhig kha cig gis skyon min// khyod kyi bka' ni
217a7(bstod tshogs): brtan bcas pa// su zhig gis ni 'jal bar nus// chos rnams kun gyis mi bskyod pa// khyod kyi brtan pa mngon bsams na// sa yi brtan pa nyid kyang ni// shing sha'i ge sar rtse ltar chung // bde ba 'dod pas phyi
217a8(bstod tshogs): rol pa// nyi ma'i rjes su nyal byed de// khyod ni nyi ma dang mtshungs min// thun mong gi ni dbye bar brjod// thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi// snang bas mi shes rab rib dag/ 'joms pa'i zad na nyi ma yang // me khyer
217b1(bstod tshogs): Ar+yAH k+Sha // dang bsam pa dag pa ltas// du lags pa par phrul// b+had tu spyad pa pas man sa// sangs rgyas dan ma pa mnas// rgyud kyigasang thugs sa du spya rnams
217b2(bstod tshogs): drug gnan shAn da// rmang rnam pa 'dag pa rnams// rnam na nyid// bu bda'o// gzhaladu me pa ma nA rnams/ dpe tshul gyis smras ga sanas// byud pa ni byu ba'i bye
217b3(bstod tshogs): tshig tsam yang ni mang pa yin// 'jig rten legs pa gsa'ang rung // thams cad sngon 'a de bas te// nan mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis// sangs rgyas chos la khyud mi khor// bas dri'i rA nga 'dab
217b4(bstod tshogs): ma/ thal ba margyas rgyu dang barbAs// na // mun byung ba sa nas byung/ gan // da ba sa /
217b5(bstod tshogs): khyod dang bskrun rtsom khon dpas// yang na de yang khyod mtshungs min// gang pyi gnas ka mnyam pa ni// tshad ma mkhan gyis brjod mi nus// des ni sras kyang rtogs mi 'gyur// gangal sprinam bsnyen nas maM//
217b6(bstod tshogs): cung zad brjod par bgyid pa de// sgrub po yi rang dga' dang // thabs dang gtsam bu tsamadubs// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las dpe med par bstod pa
217b7(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba skye la 'u gsum pa'o// / 'grelas bdud las rnam par rgyab// rjes su dpag pas rnam par stug/ tshad kyigan thos kyis kyang ni// mnam gnas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// khyod ni bdu sa
217b8(bstod tshogs): rnam rgyas te// 'grothun dadapar ma da pa yang // bdag gi kyis nyid sa bsas nas// rten sang ga ma mthang// khyod nas pas gnas sa yin yang // gang gis rgyal bar bya ba'i rigs// delas med
218a1(bstod tshogs): gzhan rgyal ba'i phyir// bdud kyi nan dang mngag gzhug rnams// sdang bas gol bar rtsol byed pa// mang po'ang gzhol bar bya ba ni// khyad par gnas la rten pa yi// bzod pa'i tshigasu
218a2(bstod tshogs): mtshar mi che// g.yeng ba'i rkyen dang mjal na yang // gzhan la mi bsten pa yis ni// 'khor ba thog ma med pa ni// khyod bdag nyid kyis dgyes par mdzad// gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btul ba// de yi nub
218a3(bstod tshogs): mo kho na la// nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa// de nyid rmad du byung ba lags// gang gis de ltar bsam min yang // lhag par nyon mongs las rgyal gyur// skye ba gzhan dang thun mong gang // mu stegs las rgyal
218a4(bstod tshogs): de smos ci// 'od zer phreng ba stong ldan pa'i// nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang // dpa' bo khyod kyis mu stegs las// rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar// chags sdang gti mug bcas pa dang // de nyid dang ni
218a5(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba srid// phra rgyas spangs pa rnams kyis ni// rgol ba'i tshe na rnam dpyod yin// 'dod chags bral bas chags bcas dang // zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can// gti mug bral bas rmongs pa ste// gsum pos rtag tu
218a6(bstod tshogs): gsum dag btul// btang snyoms gnas la gnas pa gang // ngo mtshar min zhing dka' ba min// 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa'i phyir// de ni ngo mtshar zhes bya ste// dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang // dam chos
218a7(bstod tshogs): ma lags smod mdzad kyang // dam pa dag dang tha ma la// khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga'// yun ring por ni mngon 'dod pa'i// yid la re ba spong ba dang // mi rigs pa ni rtsod pa yis// chos nyid la ni gegs byed la//
218a8(bstod tshogs): dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la// rjes su chags dang khong khro bar// khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur ba// khyod la bstod du ci zhig mchis// gang zhig 'phel ba'i rgyu mtshan phyir// srog kyang khyod kyis mi dgongs na// gzigs
218b1(bstod tshogs): pa dang ni gsan pa dang // khyod kyis ma gzigs ma gsan bzhin// yon tan rnams la'ang ma chags la// yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi mnga'// kye ma'o khyod kyi thugs stobs ni// rab dang yongs su dag pa lag// /
218b2(bstod tshogs): phan tshun rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir// nges par lus dang sems dag gi/ mya ngan dga' sogs gnas skabs ni// re dogs kyis kyang shin tu bsgribs// dbang po rnams ni rab dang ba// dus rnams rtag tu mi
218b3(bstod tshogs): nyams pas// khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag/ mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda'// shin tu nyung ngu 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni sras na yang // nyes zad shin tu ma lus pa'i// gzhan don gyis ni drangs pas
218b4(bstod tshogs): na// rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang // mdzad spyod bzang pos bsgrags pas na// khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag/ rnam dag byis pa'i bar la grags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang
218b5(bstod tshogs): pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las rmad du byung bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// // gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong bas// sems ni dang bar ma gyur pa// de la mig ni med pa ste// yang na yod
218b6(bstod tshogs): kyang don med pa'o// nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong // 'bar la gnod pa mdzad mi mnga'// dul la rngom brjid che ba yi// sku 'dis su zhig dang mi mdzad// gang yang lha dang zhi ba 'am// yul ni shin tu rnyed pa na// thams cad
218b7(bstod tshogs): chags dang bral 'gyur zhing // 'di ni mthong ba'i nang na mchog/ khyod kyi sku de gang gis ni// lan brgya mthong dang gang zhig gis// dang por mthong ba de gnyis ka/ 'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad// rnam par sdang ba'i
218b8(bstod tshogs): sems ldan yang // mthong bas ngoms par cis mi 'gyur// khyad par la mkhas ma yin yang // gang zhig yi dgas rnams kyis ni// khyod kyi su ni mdzes pa'i phyir// blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin pas// mthong ngo //
219a1(bstod tshogs): cog ni phyi phyir zhing // dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa lags// dub par ma dgongs ngo mtshar te// rjes su mthun pa'i don mdzad cing // 'phrin las gsal bar gyur pa na// gang gis 'bad/
219a2(bstod tshogs): pa med par 'phrul// rten gyi yon tan dag dang ni// brten pa'i yon tan phan tshun du// 'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni// yon tan phun tshogs mchog dang ldan// khyod la yon tan mi mnga' na// de bzhin
219a3(bstod tshogs): gshegs pa'i sku 'di ni// gzhan pa gang zhig la ni rten// gzhan mi pas ni rnam par spras// mtshan dang dpe byed bzang 'bar ba// khyod kyi sku las ma gtogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di//
219a4(bstod tshogs): gzhan gang nig la legs gnas 'gyur// phun sum chags las lhag pa'i sgra// gzhan da mtshungs min thub pa ni// rten pa yin khyad par gyis// phun sa mtshogs pa lhag par chung // khyo sa rten pa'i
219a5(bstod tshogs): yon tan la// dadapal che zhes gsung gsung ltar // de yi yon tan rnams kyang sbyar// nged legs bkod ces gsung ba 'dra// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes
219a6(bstod tshogs): bru las sprul bstod pa zhes thab la byi// gas dang bshes pa ma T+Ta d+hA dang // myi spyan snad pa la sogs mang // gsum la drab pa med bzod // d+hanas na ga bsngal yang /
219a7(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni// bud med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings// khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dag/ dgrol skad yun ring thugs rjes bsdams// bcings pa'i nani nyon mongs pas/
219a8(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba yis nanan mongs bzang // byed na thugs rjems bcings pas// bzad pa gang dang mtshar lags// dang por byed la phyag bza'am// 'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod// kun ma khyen mun de bung /
219b1(bstod tshogs): bzhag sa mdzad thugs rje che la bgyi// de ltar sdug bsngal btang snyoms nas// dben pa'i gnas su bzhugs par mdzad// shin tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir// de ltar gyi yang bzod par mdzad/
219b2(bstod tshogs): dben pa'i bde sangs gyur byed// mang po'i nang du ba zhugs pa gang // de khyod thugs rjengs 'das pa// glags shig thod nas bgyes par bas// 'jig rten spyod pa 'drab mad // ma 'ongs bde ba la brten nas/
219b3(bstod tshogs): da ltar byung las gus pa yis// sems can rnams la rnam dpyad nas// rigs pa yis ni mtshon nas// klu bzhin khyod kyi thugs rje yis// dgon pa'i zhing gnas grong gi mthar// gdul ba'i don gyi slad
219b4(bstod tshogs): dadrungs// gzhan la chags shing dgongs pa yis// thugs rje btsun mos mi bya med// yang na byed ni de chags pas// ngang dang mthun pas spangs nas gang // rke she mchog la gnas bzhin du// thugs
219b5(bstod tshogs): gcodadang ldan pas na// rol mo mkhan gyi sgra rdul yang // khyod kyi zhabs kyis 'dor bar mdzad// don dam pa ni ma brnyes pas// sngon ni de bzhin dka' spyod min// sangs rgyas nyid ni brnyes pa yis// zhig nas
219b6(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid spangs nas kyang // rdzu 'phrul so ng+ge'i sgra dang ni// nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa gang // de ni bzhed spyod mi mnga' ba// khyod kyi thugs rje bstan pa lags// gal te sems can don mdzad 'di// sems can yod
219b7(bstod tshogs): ni mi 'gyur ba// gus pas gzhan du mi 'dra la// ji ltar mi bzad ltar brtse med// gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi/ nyid kyi don la brtse med pas// mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la// thugs rjes thugs rjes mdzad ma/
219b8(bstod tshogs): gyur// yang na khyod nyid dka' ba rnams// spyod pa ma nyams des ni mdzad// khyod kyis nyid don las lhag par// gzhan don rjes su gzigs par mdzad// 'di ltar res 'ga' bstan pas gang // gzhan don grub
220a1(bstod tshogs): par mdzad skad du// khyod ni lan brgyar phyogs dag tu// gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags// gang zhig rjes su mi mthun pa'i// rol mo mkhan gyi bze sogs ni// ngan pa'i las la'ang drang bar
220a2(bstod tshogs): nasmra / shA bas/ // 'gyu ga sa /
220a3(bstod tshogs): chags pa yod de dngas mi shes// kha cig dngos pa shes na yang // rjes su mthun min gtong ba yang // gtong ba men la chags pa yang // dngos po shes na rjes su 'thun// brags rje de yi spyod legs mang / gang
220a4(bstod tshogs): gis smra bar byed par nus// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las thugs rjel bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// // tshig bzang ba dang don che dang // bden pa
220a5(bstod tshogs): dang ni snyan pa dang // zab gsal gnyis ka'i don ldan dang // bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa// nyon mongs 'joms dang rtsub min dang // gsal dang bde blag rtogs pa dang // sna tshogs don ni ma 'khrugs dang //
220a6(bstod tshogs): snying po can dang mang ba yang // khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu// khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang // thams cad mkhyen pa lags so zhes// su zhig nges pa bskyed mi 'gyur// rjes su chags dang bar ma dang //
220a7(bstod tshogs): sdang bas gnod pa byed pa la// nyes kun skyug par mdzad pa'i phyir// thams cad la ni thugs mnyam mnga'// mang po ril gyis snyan ma lags// bcos pa 'ga' tsam snyan pa lags//
220a8(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi gsung ni don grub pas// thams cad legs gsung kho na lags// mos khams dbang po'i dbye ba yis// gang phyir bsam pa sna tshogs pa// de bas thabs la mkhas pa yis//
220b1(bstod tshogs): skyes bu 'dul mchog kha lo sbyar// khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na// gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang // gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag/ thams cad ro gcig nyid du 'gyur// yun ring
220b2(bstod tshogs): 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni// thugs rngu brtson 'grus phun tshogs pas// dgongs pa yang dag shes rab kyang // thams cad la ni brtson dang ldan// e ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i// 'dren
220b3(bstod tshogs): las rnams kyang rab tu bzo// de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi// snod 'di 'dra ba 'di bgyis so// snod kyi skyon dang 'brel bas na// rnam par bdud rtsi 'di 'dra ba'ang // ro ni phrogs par gyur pa ste//
220b4(bstod tshogs): 9r+k+ka da / pa brgyug// pa nAgs// gas pa dren tru~M gas// bad+ma rnaM ga pa na du ga/ gas bas
220b5(bstod tshogs): me sdug pa ni bstan pa dang // byams pa dang ni snying rje yang // spyod pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyis ni// khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi// rdul rab ni mdzad char sprin 'dra// zhe sdang sprul ni gdon pa'i phyir//
220b6(bstod tshogs): nam mkha' lding dang 'dra ba lags// gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i// rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa yis// de bzhin las bdag gir bya ba// bdag med pa dang dbyer med pas//
220b7(bstod tshogs): yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i// rab rib 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra// nga rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pas// brgya byin mtshon cha 'dra ba lags// gal te 'di ni ma gsung na// bde gshegs/
220b8(bstod tshogs): dgra bcom sangs rgyas dang // de ltar rtogs nyid phun tshogs pa'i// khyod kyi bden gsung sus rtogs 'gyur// don gzigs pas na mi bslub// nongs mi mnga' phyir rjes su mthun// legs par//
221a1(bstod tshogs): sbyar bas go sla ste// khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan// zab pa dang ni snyan pa dang // go sla dang ni legs sbyar dang // gdul bya dang ni rjes su mthun// gdug pa la yang bden don phyir//
221a2(bstod tshogs): reshig dang por khyod kyigasung // nan pa rnams kyi yid breg mdzad// de nas yid la bsams bgyis na// rdul dang mun pa dag kyang tsa/ longs srid cung du tsam zhig dang // skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yang
221a3(bstod tshogs): gzhan yang 'gro ba gzhan dbang la// nges par 'byung ba ston par mdzad// phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin cing // bag med rnams ni skrag par mdzad// bde ba can dag skyo bgyid pas// khyod gsung kun dang
221a4(bstod tshogs): 'tsham par 'jug/ yongs smin dbang gis shes rab ni// sgom pa'i rang bzhin bskyed mdzad cing // de las ltung ba'i dus su ni// zos bsam rang bzhin gyis kyang ni// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' ba bskyed//
221a5(bstod tshogs): bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel// tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas// gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman// shes rab spyan ni zag pa med// dang po bden pa skyed par mdzad// de 'og dbang po'i dbye ba yis// bsgom//
221a6(bstod tshogs): pa dang ni mi slob lam// lta ba dag la dgar mdzad cing // mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'drin// nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung // yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs// 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yis// sngon
221a7(bstod tshogs): dus lo rgyus gsung ba'i phyir// skal can rnams la don dam pa// shin tu ma 'das pa yis kyang // kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing // dgongs pa'ang kun tu nyer gnas pas// de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun// thams cad/
221a8(bstod tshogs): la yang bslu mi mnga'// khyod kyi nyan thos mchog rnams kyi// rigs dang smin dang mos pa yis// mi shes pas ni bsgrib pa'i tshig/ khyod ni thugs dgongs ma nyams pas// gang slad du min yul min dang // snong
221b1(bstod tshogs): min rnams su mi 'jug pa// de srad khyod gsung don mchis te// brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin// khyod gsung yon tan cha tsam la'ang // bdag gis bstod pa nas ma yin// gang gis khyod kyang
221b2(bstod tshogs): 'dod chung ba'o// rab tu gsal bar kun tu 'dren// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las gsung la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o//
221b3(bstod tshogs): bskyod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang // legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med// thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas// khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med// gzhan rnams kyang ni thar don min// dga' bas thob cing
221b4(bstod tshogs): ga cu shA / byas gyu/ d+hA/ ga / sa rgyags sa/ /
221b5(bstod tshogs): dgra ma mchis// byang chub sems ni nyer blangs nas// gzhan don la chags thugs mnga' bas// khyod bskal bye bar skad ceg bzhin// dmyal bar yang ni de bzhin bzhugs// 'gro ba yini don slad du/
221b6(bstod tshogs): sdug bsngal mang ltar gang lags pa// de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang // gnas par bgyi ba la thug na// nyon mongs bde ba chung byed pa'i// mi yi bdag po'i bga' lung gis// dmyal ba yi yang las rnams
221b7(bstod tshogs): la'ang // byas pa gzo bas 'jug par mthong // phan pa gsung zhing phan pa mdzad// khyod kyi bstan pa ce smos te// mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang // ci yi slad du bsgrub mi bgyid// zhi gnas ye shes rdzogs pa dang //
221b8(bstod tshogs): rtogs par gyur nas dad pa dang // nyon mongs kun las rnam 'grel byed// byis pa slob dang mkhas rnams kyis// khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang // byang chub ba de da nga ni ba dang // khyod kyi yan tan bsngags pa dang //
222a1(bstod tshogs): legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob// stong pa nyid ni gsung ba dang // srid par smon pa mi mnga' dang // mtshan ma med pa rnyed mdzad pa// gang de chags sdang med pa'i phyir// dpa' bo khyod kyi
222a2(bstod tshogs): bstan pa 'di// mu stegs thams cad sgeg mdzad la// bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing // lha dang mi rnams dbug kyang 'byin// bdag tu lta bas 'dus byas la// smod med mya ngan 'das mi 'thad//
222a3(bstod tshogs): de slad de yi mi mthun pa// 'chi bdag gis ni 'tshe bar 'gyur// 'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi// sa chen dag la spyod bgyid pa// me thogs bzlogs pa ma mchis pa'ang // khyod kyi bstan pas thal
222a4(bstod tshogs): gyis mnan// skyes nas nges par 'jig pa'i phyir// 'on te nyon mongs bzhin 'chi 'pho// khyod sras kyis kyang dbang thob phyir// de las 'di ni khyad ches 'phags// khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba//
222a5(bstod tshogs): dga' na bskal par yang gnas la// gang du bdud kyis mi rdzib// der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi// thabs sogs sgrub la mkhas pa yis// shes rab gsum po rnam 'phel phyir// gang tshe sems ni nges sbyar dang //
222a6(bstod tshogs): bzhag dang sdang ba zhes bya 'dis// lung gi don ni bsams pa dang // bsgom dang gus par mnyam pa yi// dus gsum tshe dbye khyod kyi ni// bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags// rigs pa lnga phyir ma 'phel
222a7(bstod tshogs): zhing // bsam bya'i gnas dang bral ba'i phyir// mu stegs gzhan gyi mthong bzhin yang // ltal srid pa'i gdon gyis dkrugs// drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan// de ltar legs pas khyab 'di la//
222a8(bstod tshogs): mgus gang lags de las ni// sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bstan pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad/
222b1(bstod tshogs): papa'o// / gang zhig snga mer smon lam mdzad// yang na mthong dang thos pa yang // 'gro ba rnams la smon mdzad pa// da ltar yang ni don ldan 'khums// khyod zos pas ni spo ba skyed// mthong bas
222b2(bstod tshogs): da pa skye bar 'gyur// khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te// bstan pas rnam par grol bar mdzad// kye ma'o gnas skabs thams cad du// skye dgu rnams la sman mdzad pa'i// chos bstan pas ni byed
222b3(bstod tshogs): pa na// gang mthar bde ba sgrub pa'i phyir// khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur// 'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga'// gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad// ldog pa na ni 'god pa mdzad// gang zhig dad pas
222b4(bstod tshogs): brlan sems kyis// yon tan dran pa gsal bas kyang // gal te khyod ni bde mdzad na// de las ngo mtshar ma mchis lags// bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad// khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur// btsal
222b5(bstod tshogs): bas blo gros skye 'gyur te// yongs su shes pas rnam par 'dag/ de bzhin skyabs 'gro len pa dang // sbyin dang slob pa rjes byed pa'i// 'jigs 'joms mdzad pa ci ngo mtshar// gang zhig chos la mngon 'dod pas//
222b6(bstod tshogs): khyod la bsu bas dpal du byed// bstan pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur// bsten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad// bsnyen bkur bgyis pas bde bar 'gyur// glags skabs tshol bar byed pas kyang // khyod kyi
222b7(bstod tshogs): drung du nyer mchis na// phyi nas gdung ba dang ldan phyir// sman pa bzhin du de bzhin khyod// tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas dag/ bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas dang // shes rab phun tshogs mi 'khrugs/
222b8(bstod tshogs): pas// khyod ni bsod nams mtsho chen lags// mtshang 'bru ba la brtson pa ste// b+ha ra d+h+wa dza la sogs kyang // nges legs dang 'dra cis mi 'gyur// khyod la de ni ngo mtshar ci// khyod sku bltar 'os rin chen te//
223a1(bstod tshogs): legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags// chos ni spyad 'os rin chen pas// khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags// 'jigs pa mi bzad rnams su yang // khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis gang //
223a2(bstod tshogs): zhi bar gyur pa de la yang // mtshar min gang zhig thugs rje'i bdag/ khyod ni chu bos bdas pa'i gling // smras pa'i bdag nyid skyob pa ste// srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i skyabs// zar 'tshal rnams kyi
223a3(bstod tshogs): 'dren pa lags// me tog gcig ni rab phul bas// gang zhig ngan 'gror lhung ma gyur// de la dus nges bstan pa la// mtshar men khyod sngon 'di 'dra lags// tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog/ zhing
223a4(bstod tshogs): gshin 'bras bu phun su mtshogs// srog chags kun la phan mdzad byer// grags kyi dul yang khyod legs so// gang zhig gis khyod mthong tsam gyis// skyon yon la na ma mkhas pa// dud 'gro dang ni gzhan
223a5(bstod tshogs): min 'gyur// de la drin sogs mtshar ma lags// phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdzad pashes te// 'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug/ zhi phyir gcig tu yid du 'ong // yon tan kun mnga' mchod 'os khyod//
223a6(bstod tshogs): gang zhig mthong ba tsam gyis ni// ngan song gi ni sdug bsngal yang // nye bar zhi ba de la yang // gnas min 'jig rten dogs pa can// sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad// sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad//
223a7(bstod tshogs): don kun grub phyir dpal yangs te// yon tan legs brten bkra shis lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las smon lam gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba ste
223a8(bstod tshogs): le'u dgu pa'o// // snga phyir sems gnas bsgrub slad du// rmugs la sogs pa zhi ba'i phyir// phyi rol g.yeng bzhi don du// nang gi cho ga shes spangs pa'i phyir// khyod ni rngan then bgyid la skul
223b1(bstod tshogs): chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yang gcod// gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god// dal bus bgyid la bzhin skul 'debs// zhi gnas nges par rdzogs nas ni// phyi nas bden la sbyar bar mdzad// bsgom pa khyad par mdzad/
223b2(bstod tshogs): slad du// sa bon med par spangs par mdzad// dul ba rnams ni lam la sbyar// dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad// de slad skyes bu 'dul ba yi// kha lo rgyur ba bla med mchog/ zad du phyin nas
223b3(bstod tshogs): khyod mtshang 'bru// gang zhig sa bon med par spangs// 'on kyang de la btang snyoms min// phan pa'i dus la gzhes par mdzad// khyod ni nyam thag rnams la brtse// bde bar gnas la phan par bgyid//
223b4(bstod tshogs): phongs par gnas la thugs rje bas// kun la phan par bzhed pa lags// gang zhig bar ma la phan bzhed// de ni shin tu ngo mtshar min// gang zhig slar yang byas 'joms pa'i// gnyen dang grogs rnams
223b5(bstod tshogs): rgyu sa / sal / na sa// su na / sa
223b6(bstod tshogs): bza' btung gos la sogs pa yi// nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis ni// lus tsam la ni phan byed dag/ phan 'dogs bgyi slad pha ma dag/ gal te bla mar 'tshal na go/ khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas//
223b7(bstod tshogs): bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal// thar pa'i sa bon ji ltar yang // de rnams dge ba la btsud nas// dus gcig yongs su smin slad du// dus ni kun tu 'da' bar mdzad// rang gi don la mi lta bas// nyid kyi dgra
223b8(bstod tshogs): bo ltar gyur cing // g.yeng sa'i mun gnas rnams la// ra ba lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod// de nas ji ltar snod gyur pa'i// yongs su smin par gzigs nas ni// slar yang thugs ni ma bsnyel zhing // sman gdags
224a1(bstod tshogs): su ya yang sa sa tha pa ma pa yang ga tha pa tshangs sa sa pa sa ma ba mas sham ca ga tham pad mam dang pa ma masas mthams mthar mas thang bcas pas ma mtshamatshams mas mamamamam sa ma nga da ra
224a2(bstod tshogs): bsam gtan la brtson lags// 'jig rten gnyis kar sman gdags mad // 'jig rten las ni 'da' slad du// mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la// khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad//
224a3(bstod tshogs): de las tha dad med pa yis// rgyu bcas rgyu ni med pa yang // 'phags pa'i lam la 'gong mdzad dang // khyod kyis 'jig rten la sngon mdzad// yul la nye bar spyad pa na// lha min spyod pa tha dad kyi// khyod kyi
224a4(bstod tshogs): longs spyod thun mong pas// khyod la dbyib mi mnga'a'o// gang du tshun med pa la// khyod kyis bstan par rab brdud na// de mthar pa'i rnab cas la// mdor bsdus pas na spos ci dgos// bcom ldan
224a5(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis skyob dang // na tshod rigs dang yul dang ni// dus kyi skyon meng chos rnams kyis// 'di dag kun la sman yon btags// 'di ni dman dang 'di mchog ces// khyod kyis bltos pa bsal nas ni/
224a6(bstod tshogs): de ltar yon tan 'phags 'dren pa// 'bad pas jel dbadag nyid bzhin// khyod kyi nyan thos srid bral zhing // ya mtshan 'dzin pa med rnams la'ang // lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing // ya mtshan che ba
224a7(bstod tshogs): lta bur mchod// bdag nyid 'jigs pas bde thab pa'o// yul dag spangs par gyur nas ni// 'gran zla bzhin du cig nas cig/ mchog tu rjes su 'brang ba byed// e ma'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi//
224a8(bstod tshogs): nyid khur gyur pa byung ba brjid// des na mi yang lha rnams kyis// smon par bya ba nyid du gyur// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las lam 'jug pa la bstod pa
224a9(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu pa'o// // mnyel dang zhi bde nyams gyur dang // skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang // mi mthun pa dang mang po yi// skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs shing // gzhan la sman
224b1(bstod tshogs): pa mdzad la chags// thugs rje yis ni thugs bcings pas// bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis ni// khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi dgongs so// 'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i// thugs kyis brtson pa
224b2(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa gang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi// chos nyid bcom ldan de chad do// zhi gnas bde ba ma thob pa// sngon mdzad gang do ngo mtshar min// khyod kyis ni gnas thob pa yang // spangs pa'i
224b3(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa ngo mtshar ro// bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing // res 'ga' ba srung ba dag kyang mdzad// nyam nga'i shul du'ang gshegs mdzad cing // rang rod can du'ang mnal ba mdzad// slar yang phyag
224b4(bstod tshogs): gi bdud rtsi yis// gzhan rnams la ni phan pa mdzad// de nyid kyis ni mi 'grang ba'i// me sran spyod pas phal pa bzhin// mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang // gdul b+ha rnams la byams skad du/
224b5(bstod tshogs): srungs brdo dang gcam tshul dang // skad dang cha lugs sbyar ba'ang mdzad// mang po'i rang don mthar thug dang // de ni khyod kyi che ba lags// de la mngon 'dod don la yang // de lta'i sdug bsngal bsdam pa mdzad/
224b6(bstod tshogs): kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir// bran bzhin bskos par bsgrims pa lags// mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la// mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so// lci dang cha lugs yang dgongs pa'o//
224b7(bstod tshogs): de tshe khyod la gal so// gang phyir gzhan ma spangs nas kyang // sdug bsngal ldan pa mthar phyin pas// khyod la gang dang gang du yang // dza sang bskul yang mi spong ste// nyid kyi sgrub pa bzang po las// 'da' bar
224b8(bstod tshogs): 'gyur ba ma mchis so// pa'am yang na gzhan legs la// byams pa'am yang na snying rje yis// khyod yon phrag dog gis gdungs dang // de bzhin rgyu med dgra bo la// ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la/
225a1(bstod tshogs): phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bur// skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang // phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid// nyes rtog gdon gyis zos pa ni// phyir zhing shin tu mi bzad la// mgon po rang sems rjes
225a2(bstod tshogs): mthun pas// khyud kyi zhes pa mthong ba la// byad ni ga nang bgyid dgra bo la// phan pa mad dpa'i bshes lags te// nag tu rgyan dag tshol ba la// yin tan 'ba' zhig tshol ba'ang lags// shin tu dge bal
225a3(bstod tshogs): spyod ldan pa// mgo dang yid dang tshig dag gis// khyod ni phyag 'tshal mchod 'os la// rtag tu bdag ni phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod ni gang na dug bcas shing // zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa//
225a4(bstod tshogs): dor ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang // khyod la bdud rtse can du 'gyur// shin tu phan tshun 'gal ba can// sems can rnams kyi log rtog pas// mi bskyod de la phan 'jug pa'i// thugs ldan khyod la phyag
225a5(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// bzod pas mi snyan bzod pa dang // 'khu ba dag ni bde legs kyis// mi snyan smra la bden pa ste// khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul// dgra rnams la ni 'bad min pas// thugs kyis kyang ni
225a6(bstod tshogs): rtag tu btul// bzlog la yang dag 'jog mdzad pa'i// rgyal mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thog ma med dus goms pa yi// mi yi rang bzhin mang po yang // khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlog nas// skad cig
225a7(bstod tshogs): nyid la yongs su bsgyur// shin tu bzang min khams tsam yang // yun ring gis ni 'phel mdzad pa// sman pa'i spyod pa rjes 'jug pa// sman mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
225a8(bstod tshogs): 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// // rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis pa dang // 'jungs pa rnams ni gtong phod
225b1(bstod tshogs): dang // gtum pa nges par bgyis pa gang // de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags// rang rig rjes su mi gcod cing // dge ba gong du 'dren byed pa// skye ba gzhan du mdzad pa'i phyir// dge mchog khyod la phyag
225b2(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// dga' bo dbang po nyer zhi dang // nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang // sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi ba gyis na// su zhig ngo mtshar skye mi bgyid// shin tu mchog don mdzad slad du// dmu rgod rnams ni
225b3(bstod tshogs): bde ba yis// shin tu ngo mtshar gyur pa yis// 'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi chos kyi ros tshim pas// gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas// ran mang bting ba'i gnas mal du// brtan//
225b4(bstod tshogs): rnams bsod nams nyal bar bgyid// gzhan gyi dbang gis lus tsam ni// shin tu tshim dang rjes mthun min// gang phyir gzhan gyis tshim byed las// tshim mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis dus dang
225b5(bstod tshogs): bsam mkhyen pas// res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung la// spros 'gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang // drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad// rgyun min mkhas pa ma yin phyir// thams cad du ni tshig mi 'grub//
225b6(bstod tshogs): de ni shin tu spangs mdzad phyir// bden gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dri med gos la tshon bzhin du// thog mar sbyin sogs gtam ngag gis// sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni// phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad//
225b7(bstod tshogs): rig dang thabs la mi mkhas pa'i// tshig gis sems ni 'gugs mi 'gyur// gzhan gyis sems ni bkug mdzad nas// 'chi med gsol mdzad la phyag 'tshal// 'khor ba mi bzad gting nas ni// 'gro ba nyon mongs
225b8(bstod tshogs): dra slad du// khyod kyis gang shig ma sal ba'i// thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis// kha cig pha rol 'dod slad du// brtson 'grus ldan la thabs mi mkhas// thabs mkhas brtson 'grus med pa las/
226a1(bstod tshogs): 'dren mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal// sku yi cha lugs rnam mang dang // gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du// gdul ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa// de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad// gzhan gyi
226a2(bstod tshogs): cha lugs sna tshogs ni// don med yang na gzhan gsod phyir// don ldan su ni sna tshogs pa'i// don kun mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag kun kyang dag pa dang // me 'gal ba dang mchod 'os dang // brjid dang
226a3(bstod tshogs): lha mi rnams la ni// sman 'dogs bkur ba sha stag lags// phyi ral rnams kyi spyod pa ni// gzhan gsod pa dang smod pa ste// bkra shis gzhan don kun ldan pa'i// spyod pa mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal// sma dang
226a4(bstod tshogs): bgyid pa phal cher ni// legs pa rdo thog ma lags kyi// bden par gsung po khyed la ni// de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags// gzhan gyi spyod pa tshig ni gzhan// nyon mongs phal cher 'khrugs pa yang //
226a5(bstod tshogs): spyod pa dang ni don mthun pa'i// legs gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid dag pa 'ba' zhig gis// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad// 'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing // 'jig rten gsum na
226a6(bstod tshogs): mchis ma lags// gal te dbye byed rnams kyi ni// 'ba' zhig khyod ni snod gyur na// de bzhin dpag med dge ldan po ba// sgor gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thog med srid pa nyams nga bar// snga nas gcig
226a7(bstod tshogs): tu nyams pa yi// sems can kun la sman slad du// khyod ni de ltar brtson pa lags// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba la mkhas par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste/
226a8(bstod tshogs): le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // gang phyir mya ngan gyis nyams pas// ston pa rnyed par dka' ba yang // slar yang dka' la brtson ldan pa// khyod la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis khyod drin
226b1(bstod tshogs): lan lon pa'i// sgrub de mchis snyam mi bgyid de// skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das// de dag gis kyang lan ma lon// rang don byed par bdag mchog cing // de ltar gang gis rmad byung gsungs// thog mar ma
226b2(bstod tshogs): thogs phun sum tshogs// ston mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag/ rang don kho na bgyid par bas// de yi slad du'o brgyal gang // de la lan go ci zhig lon// khyod ni
226b3(bstod tshogs): sems can gnyid log pas// rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs che ba// bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni// grogs bzang bag dang bcas pa lags// gti mug mnal ni bcom pa'i phyir// shin tu
226b4(bstod tshogs): sang stong phyug 'tshal la// spyod dang skad mnas gas dpyang ster// 'jig rten mkhyen la slar phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis nyon mongs bsgom pa bshad// bdud kyis g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad// 'khor ba'i
226b5(bstod tshogs): rang bzhin mi bzad brjod// 'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan// gal te gzhan gyi rgyud rnams kyi// nyon mongs bdud las rgyal gyur pa// bdud kun las rgyal smos ci 'tshal// phan dgongs/
226b6(bstod tshogs): thugs rje can gyis ni// sems can rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba// gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa// gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kyi// mgon khyod grangs dang 'phags pa dang // bla ma yan lag
226b7(bstod tshogs): gzhan 'dun gyis// dgongs pa mdzad pa gang lags pa// de phyir kun bdag la phyag 'tshal// gal te chos ni 'di dag dang // spo ba zhig tu btub na ni// gdon mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni// lhas byin
226b8(bstod tshogs): la brten kun la'ang rtsol// khyod kyis mdzad par mi spyod gang // de ni nges par bgyid mi rigs// gnas ma yin las ldog pa dang // gnas la zhugs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten rnams la thugs
227a1(bstod tshogs): brtse bas// yun rings sa steng dam chos bshad// 'jig rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i// slob ma dam pa'ang mang du bskrun// bskrun nas gdul ba'i khyad par gyis// bstan pa rgyas
227a2(bstod tshogs): ni btab nas kyang // mngon du btul ba'i tshogs kyang ni// mdzes bzang yan chad btul lags pas// dgo khyod la sems can gyi// bu lo ni lhag ma ci mchis na// chos kyi sku yis ma lus pa'i//
227a3(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba dag dang ldan khyod kyis// skyob dpon khu tshur bcing min phyir// bu lon lhag ma gzhan ci mchis// 'di ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas// mjug tu'ang khyod kyis shin tu
227a4(bstod tshogs): ni// dka' spyad yal bar ma dor ro// yang na gzugs su'i mthar yang ni// sems can don mdzad nyid gzigs nas// nyid kye bdel chags mi mnga'// de la bltos pa dor bar mdzad// gzugs kyi srud
227a5(bstod tshogs): chos 'di dag/ gzhan don kho nar mdzad do zhes// 'jig rten yid ches dka' 'di la// khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan// de ni spyod bzang mthar thug pa'i// sems can gzhan don mdzad pa nyid// gang zhig thog ma dbus
227a6(bstod tshogs): mthar yang // khyod kyis ma nyams nyid du 'khams// de slad chos sum lus pa// sras kyi mchog la gtang mdzad do// gzugs su til 'bru ltar bshig nas// khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das// de ltar thog ma dbus
227a7(bstod tshogs): mtha' ru// chos gzugs sku gnyis bdag nyid kyis// sems can don la phan mdzad phyir// bu lon mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal// e ma'o gnas pa e ma'o tshul// e ma'o yon tan e ma'o sku// sangs rgyas kyi ni
227a8(bstod tshogs): chos rnams la// ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis// tshul khrims dang ni bsam gtan rgyu// de'i 'bras gzugs dang gzugs med pa'ang // gang phyir khyod kyis ma dgongs te// de phyir bsam min khyod phyag 'tshal//
227b1(bstod tshogs): phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug/ sku gsung phrin las zhi gyur pa// khyod la'ang sdang bar rab bgyid pa'i// rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs// khyod la sdang bar byed pa la// sman mdzad pa ni bsam mi nus// de sman
227b2(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa bsam min pas// rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bsod nams rgya mtshor rin chen gter// yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs// khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa// de dag la yang phyag 'tshal
227b3(bstod tshogs): lags// khyod kyi zhabs rdul gyis brgyan pa'i// yul gang de la'ang phyag 'tshal nas// dge ba'i bstan pa la mkhas pa'i// mtshan gyis brgyan pa smos ci 'tshal// mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang // bdag
227b4(bstod tshogs): gi zho shabs 'tshal bas// des na 'jigs pa mchis spyad du// glob la ni gcags shing mchis// khyod ni rang sangs rgyas kyis min// nyan thos mchog gtso bos ma yin// byang chub nye ba'i byang sems kyis/
227b5(bstod tshogs): rtogs mi 'gyur na gzhan ci smos// khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid// tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab// bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa// khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags drang // bsam min tshogs des phun sum
227b6(bstod tshogs): tshogs thob pa// gzhan don spyod pa ngo mtshar dge las kyi// yon tan cha tsam brjod par bdag rmongs pas// rang don dgongs pas mi nus par yang byas// mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang // skye bo'i
227b7(bstod tshogs): gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar// khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma spogs kyang // bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis// btsun pas mdzad pa'i bstod pa'i drung du ni// brjod nyung mdzes pa ma yin ci zhig 'gran//
227b8(bstod tshogs): 'o na'ang bdag ni mi shes pa yis spel// skye bo'i rna bar ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur// bdag gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i// dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pas ni// ngan rtog rlung dmar tshub mas dkrugs
228a1(bstod tshogs): pa yi// 'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bu lon med par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o//
228a2(bstod tshogs): spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po ma tha tsi Ta dang / slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po dag gzhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma dka' sha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod
228a3(bstod tshogs): rnams pabang pos pardzu c-i nas rta gtan la pa // ga sa dang/ san ta g+sa ts+tsha/ bad sra dang / de badzin gshegs pa thams la
228a4(bstod tshogs): bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// bstan pa 'gro ba kun gyis mchod gyur cing // gzhan don rdzogs mdzad pa la rnam par mkhas// nyon mongs sprul chen kun tu 'byin mdzad pa'i// de bzhin
228a5(bstod tshogs): gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// zag bcas bag chags thams cad spangs gyur cing // don kun de nyid nges par gzigs mdzad pa// skye dgu thams cad don la brtson gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa
228a6(bstod tshogs): kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas snod gyur cing // lam mchog mya ngan 'das pa ston mdzad la// yid la re ba kun tu rdzogs mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
228a7(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten rnams la rjes brtser mngon pa dgus// byams dang thugs rje yongs su bsgos gyur cing // kun don spyad pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
228a8(bstod tshogs): don bsam pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i// gdul bya'i pad+ma 'byed pa'i spyan dang ldan// rgya chen slob ma dam pa'i yon tan bskyed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// bskal pa mtha' yas tshogs
228b1(bstod tshogs): nibasags gyur cing // tshangs dbang lha dbang rnams kyis phyag byas la// skul 'dom gang 'od kyis brgyan gyur pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nyes pa'i rtsa ba ma lus bcom gyur cing //
228b2(bstod tshogs): ye shes me yis dri ma'i shing bsregs la// shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud// nyon mongs bag chags bcas kun rnam bcom zhing /
228b3(bstod tshogs): grags pa chen po kun tu grags gyur la// mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// pad+ma la bu'i spyan ni rabargyas shing // bcoma'i gser gyi phung po 'dra ba yi// de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal
228b4(bstod tshogs): 'dud// bsod nams rgya chen rmad byung 'di yis ni// bdag nyid nyon mongs bag chags bcas 'byin cing // 'khor ba'i nyon mongs rgya mtsho chen po 'dir// nub par gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'don par shog
228b5(bstod tshogs): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskyed pa rdzogs so// rgyag swA dang / thag ldan shA ma na myob/ bad sa dang/ bcom ldan 'das thA thub pa'i bstod pa/
228b6(bstod tshogs): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo gros bzang // snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba// 'jig rten snang mdzad
228b7(bstod tshogs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba// gdul bya 'dul bzhin gdul bya'i pha rol byon// bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa// gdul bya'i mthar byin khyod la
228b8(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing // 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra// dge ba mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
229a1(bstod tshogs): pha rol gshegs pas gzhan gyis tshogs rdzogs shing // pha rol phas rgol tshogs 'joms mi g.yo ba// sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas// pha rol tshogs 'joms
229a2(bstod tshogs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dgra bcom rgyal po nyon gcil dri bsal ba// 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas// lha yi lha mchog dri med dri bral ba// thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag
229a3(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung // mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchis can// mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo
229a4(bstod tshogs): sbyar// yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur snyan pa'i gsung // thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs//
229a5(bstod tshogs): bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral// zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'// thar la 'jug par mkhas pa'i blo gros can// thar pa'i lam dgyes
229a6(bstod tshogs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyu la brten pa'i mkhas pa blo gros can// mtha' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mkhas pa// las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin kho nar gsung // lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
229a7(bstod tshogs): gang nas ma byon gang du'ang gshegs ma lags// rtag tu dben pa'i chos rnams rab gsung ba// smig rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yi mi mnga' ba// dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skye dang mi skye gang du
229a8(bstod tshogs): skye ma lags// skye dang 'jig dang gang du mi gsal ba// chos kyi gnas nyid ji ltar gnas la gnas// gnas dang mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung // rtag tu mi
229b1(bstod tshogs): g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// ri rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa slob dpon dkon mchog gsum gyi
229b2(bstod tshogs): 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// @#// yon tan tha mas pa stod pa bzhugs// rgya gar skad du/ kuN a bar+yan+ta sto traM/ bod skad du/ yon tan mtha' yas par bstod pa/ thams cad
229b3(bstod tshogs): mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' mi 'tshal bas gal te khyod bsngags mi brjod na// 'ga' yang khyod bstod mi bgyid khyod kyi 'byor pa 'gro bas rtogs ma mchis// gang slad 'gro 'dis khyod la bstod
229b4(bstod tshogs): pa bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mchis pa// de slad don 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lags// srid gsum dag la phan brtson blo mnga' ngan song gnas na'ang bsngags par 'os// rang don smon pa'i
229b5(bstod tshogs): blo gros can ni mya ngan 'das kyang ma lags shes// de slad khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mi ldog brtan zhing mi g.yo bas// 'jig rten skye zhing 'chi bas nyams thag yongs su bskyab par brtson pa lags//
229b6(bstod tshogs): srid pa'i 'gro ba dag tu sdug bsngal rnams kyis smras pa'i sems can la// bdag gi blo gros rtsub pos sdug bsngal rnam mang de dang de bsgrubs pas// de phyir bdag gis de dag rnams la bde ba bskyed phyir bzod bya
229b7(bstod tshogs): zhes// de slad khyod ni 'gro la zhi ba'i bde ba bskyed slad brtson pa lags// sems can gang dag ma rig mdongs pas bsam pa rgud pa'i blo gros can// pha dang bur gyur rnams kyis bdag la gnyen snyam byams pas
229b8(bstod tshogs): phan btags pa// de dag btang nas gcig pu thar par byed pa bdag gi tshul min zhes// de slad khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon med nges thar bgyi slad smon lam btab// sngon chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal kun tu myong gyur
230a1(bstod tshogs): tshen bdag la ni// gang dag yun ring ngo shes byams sems ldan pas lan brgyar grogs byas pa// bde ba thob tshe de dag bkol nas ji ltar yongs su spyad b+ha zhes// de slad khyod ni bdud rtsi
230a2(bstod tshogs): 'a sems can kun dang blan mangs gas pa par brtson// mchog sbyin 'tha bar sems can rnams dang ldan cig sangs spyang 'das dgangs nas// de dag nges par yongs su mi gtong bas na byed kye bstan pa/
230a3(bstod tshogs): ji ltar khyod nyid ne tsor 'khrungs tshe ljon shing gzhon nu legs spyad pa'i// ljon shing rgas par gyur kyang yongs su mi gtong de ltar brtson pa lags// gang slad 'gro ba mya ngan mi 'das mya ngan khyod 'da' blo ma byung //
230a4(bstod tshogs): bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes par nus pa ma lags de mi mdzad// de slad khyod ni kun mkhyen yon tan gter dag brnyes mdzad slad du brtson// stobs bcu'i yon tan bdag gir mdzad pa las gzhan khyod la phra ma
230a5(bstod tshogs): mnga'// gang sul la dag gis bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes pa de dag kyang // 'di bas shin tu smad pa'i gnas skabs dag tu lhung ba byung ngo zhes// de slad khyod kyis nyam ngar lhung ba'i tshe yang bdag nyid smad ma
230a6(bstod tshogs): mdzad// bdag la smod pa mi rung skyes bu dar bzhum par bgyid pa lags// gang slad gal te rang la rag las 'bad pas byang chub thob gyur na// sangs rgyas go 'phang rnyed dka' ma lags snyam du khyod kyis blo gros
230a7(bstod tshogs): byung // de slad khyod kyis nyam nga'i dus su'ang kun mkhyen smon lam brtan bzlog pa// dman la dga' ba rnams kyi tshig dang / khyod kyis khyad du bsad par mdzad// nyon mongs chu bo rab 'khrug pa dang ngan 'gro kha dag rtag tu
230a8(bstod tshogs): gdangs pa dang // so so'i skye bo'i g.yo dang sdig pa'i grogs po rtag par rgyun du gnas pa dang // thub rnams rnyed par dka' zhes de ltar sems zhum 'gro ba gtong ba'i rgyu// gang lags de nyid khyod kyi thugs rje nag tu
230b1(bstod tshogs): skye ba'i rgyur yang gyur// ji ltar 'gro ba rnams la khyod blo shin tu byams pa skye ba ltar// 'jig rten 'di dag rang la'ang byams pa'i blo gros skye bar mi 'gyur la// 'jig rten phongs pa'i gnas skabs gyur na
230b2(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid dag kyang gtong bar bgyid// khyod ni shin tu nyam nga'i dus su'ang 'gro ba gtong ba bzhed ma mchis// gang zhig skye bo dman dang phongs pa re ba'i bsam ldan mthong na yang // brtse med 'bras bu
230b3(bstod tshogs): 'dod pas snod gzhan yon tan dag dang ldan tshol ba// bsam brlag de ni sbyin pa byed kyang slong ba rnams rang mtshungs so zhes// de slad khyod ni thugs rjes slong ba rnams la sbyin par bzhed la zhugs//
230b4(bstod tshogs): 'ba' zhig rang nyi dam dul bzhin du rigs par ldan pa'i cho ga spu yang // rang gi tshig dang 'gal bar spyod pas gzhan dag 'dul bar mi nus zhes// khyod kyis dgongs nas de rmad 'gro ba mtha' dgazugs la
230b5(bstod tshogs): bzhag mdzad nas// re zhig bdag nyid ma dul ba nyid dul bar mdzad phyir brtson pa lags// gang slad mkhas pa rnams kyi mi dge'i las kyang zhi ba'i bde bar 'gyur mod kyi// 'on kyang 'phags pas mi
230b6(bstod tshogs): dge ba dag kun tu bsten 'os ma yin zhes// de skad khyod ni rtag tu rang bzhin yongs su dag pas sdig las log/ ngan song 'jigs pas ma lags lha yi bde spyad pazhes pa'i phyir ma lags// gang dag
230b7(bstod tshogs): 'gro la mi lta bdag nyid zhi bar 'gro bar bgyi skad spyod bgyid pa// des kyang ci ste brtson pa ma sten slad chad pas ma rdzogs mi 'gyur na// gang gis 'gro ba ma lus bskal phyir brtson pa brtsams pas ci smos
230b8(bstod tshogs): zhes// de slad khyod kyis rang gi bde la ma gzigs byang chub slad du brtson// khyod kyis 'byor pa chung ba'i tshe yang sbyin par bzhed pa ma spangs la// bdog pa chung yang slong ba rnams la zhum mi mnga' ba'i
231a1(bstod tshogs): thugs kyis stsal// dbang phyug chen po mnga' yang tshul dang 'gal ba'i tha snyad mi mnga' la// na tshod lang tshor gyur kyang 'dod pa rnams la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// khyod kyis thos dang blo gros
231a2(bstod tshogs): che ba'i tshe na'ang bdag bstod ma mdzad la// 'gro ba yon tan chung ba gzhan rnams kyang ni mthon por bkur bar gyur// yon tan tshigs la gnas tshe nyid kyi spyod pa nyes pa chung ngu'ang bzang // 'gro ba dmurgod
231a3(bstod tshogs): rnams la rtsol ba mi mnga' bde bar gnas pas bzhugs// khyod kyi thugs ni srid dang nyon mongs skyo bas zhi la dgyes gyur kyang // thugs rje nyid kyis mdzad pa'i yon tan skye bo rnams dang rjes su mthun//
231a4(bstod tshogs): byed pa ma gtogs gzhan gyis 'bras bu mi myong bar mi khyod mkhyen kyang // 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi 'byor pa bskyed slad bsod nams gter rnams bdar// khyod la shes rab la sogs yon tan gang dag
231a5(bstod tshogs): rtag tu mnga' gyur pa// de dag khyod kyis 'gro ba dag gi don rnams nyid du nye bar spyad// de las khyod kyi bsod nams 'bras bu gzhan du mchis pa ma lags la// de dag 'gro ba'i 'byor slad yongs su bsngos
231a6(bstod tshogs): kyang de na ma mchis ma lags// khyod la gzhan la sman pa'i thabs dang bral ba'i dus 'ga'ang byung ma gyur// thabs chung ma gyur 'bras bu ma mchis ma lags 'bras bu chung ma lags// bsod nams
