277b6(bstod tshogs): mdangs ldan nor bu mthon ka chen po ltar 'phro ba'i// 'od kyis phyogs rnams ma lus snang bar mdzad pa po// 'jig rten gsum na rmad byung glang po'i khri la bzhugs// bsnyengs bral sangs rgyas mi bskyod de la rtag phyag
277b7(bstod tshogs): 'tshal// rin chen dbang bskur 'byor pas 'gro don mdzad la mkhas// bsod nams tshogs mnga' ri rgyal mngon sum rgyu 'dra zhing // gser gyi rgya mtsho lta bus rta yi gnal bzhugs// thub pa rin chen 'byung ldan de la rtag
277b8(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal// rma bya'i rigs mchog rgya yis mdzes byas snang ba yi// 'od kyis phyogs kun khebs pas mngon dga' pad+ma ni// rA ga'i ri bo ltar mdzes rma bya'i gdan bzhugs pa// thub pa dpag med 'od mnga' de la phyag 'tshal lo//
278a1(bstod tshogs): dam chos 'od zer tshogs kyis mun pa sel mdzad pa'i// 'od kyi snang bas nam mkha'i cha kun rnam par 'gengs// bai DUr+ya yi mtsho ltar mkha' la bzhugs// sangs rgyas don yod
278a2(bstod tshogs): grub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// seng ge glang po rta dang rma bya mkha' lding gdan la rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs// sku mdog rim bzhin dkar dang sngo dang ser dang dri med dmar dang ljang gyur cing // byang chub mchog dang
278a3(bstod tshogs): rig mchog sbyin dang ting 'dzin mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan// rang rigs rin chen cod pan ldan pa'i ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid de la 'dud// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bstod pa rdzogs so//
278a4(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrat+takAr dang / dge slong rin cheni bzang pos bsnur cing gtanas phab pa/ @// n+ya ga skad du/ sap+ta ta thA ga ta swA tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshes
278a5(bstod tshogs): pa bdun gyi bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nang byung pa phyag 'tshal // ba'i bla ba lnga ma 'jig rten bye ma dzad byung // thugs rjes pas pa zhing ga'adulas pan pa'i thar pa ston// srid gsu
278a6(bstod tshogs): chu chen mthar phyin pa de la 'gro bar ston pa pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// srid pa'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang pha rol med pa 'di// 'jig rten nub cing 'dug par rab tu
278a7(bstod tshogs): gzigs nas kyang // phan gdags phyir ni chos rnams rab tu ston pa gang yin pa// rgyal ba gtsug tor mnga' ba de la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi zla dag las 'das pa'i gzi brjod mnga' ba des/
278a8(bstod tshogs): ye shes dang ni spyod pa'i ngang tshul rnams las kyang // rgya mtsho'i 'dzings ltar gting dpag nus par mi 'gyur ba'i// sangs rgyas thams cad bskyod pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gi grags pa zla ba'i 'od
278b1(bstod tshogs): zer 'dra ba yis// sa steng mtha' dag rab tu brgyan par snang ba dang // u dra ma wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rmad byung ba// thub dbang chen po log dang sel la phyag 'tshal lo// dri ma med cing rtag tu
278b2(bstod tshogs): phan par mdzad pa dang // chags pa med pa gang gis dri ma med pa'i thugs// rnam par 'phro bas mun pa'i thibs po rab bcom zhing // lha yis mchod pa'i gser thub de la phyag 'tshal lo//
278b3(bstod tshogs): btso ma'i gser gyi phung po'i kha dog 'dra ba yi// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i nyi ma stong pas lhag pa mnga'// skye bo kun gyis phyag byas 'jig rten mchog gyur pa'i// 'od srungs mtshan gsol gang yin
278b4(bstod tshogs): de la phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma'i 'od zer mang pos pad+ma'i tshal 'byed lta// / gsung gi 'od zer mang pos 'jig rten sad par mdzad// ston pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje'i sgron ma can// mya ngan 'das
278b5(bstod tshogs): pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gis byang chub skye ba gcig gis thogs gyur cing // byams pa zhes bya dga' ldan gnam gyi gnas nas bzhugs// sa steng bde bar gshegs par 'gyur ba
278b6(bstod tshogs): gang yin pa// de la bdag ni snying nas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i rgyal ba bdun po dag dang phyis gshegs pa// brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis bstod yis// bsod nams
278b7(bstod tshogs): mtha' yas dpag med padag gis gang thob pa// des ni sems can rnams kyang skyon chen bral gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po
278b8(bstod tshogs): shrad+d+ha kar dang / dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// mang+ga laM/ #/ da gshegs pa na pa pata rdzags// rgya gar skad du/ aSh+ma ta thA ga
279a1(bstod tshogs): sto tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan gyi me tog rgyas shing dag pa la// dpe byad bzang po'i
279a2(bstod tshogs): 'bru chags mdzes pa'i sku// gang gis mthong thos dran yang dpal gyur pa// mtshan gyi rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen zla ba pad+mas rab brgyan cing // shes bya kun la mkhas pas mkhyen pa
279a3(bstod tshogs): 'phags// rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i thugs mnga' pa// sgra dbyangs rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo// dzam+bu chu bo'i gser ltar lhad de ba// nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// dri medathe
279a4(bstod tshogs): gser gyi mchod stong lta bu'i sku// gser bzang dri med snang la phyag 'tshal lo// mya ngan 'das shing bde ba'i mchog brnyes pa// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gdung bzhi mdzad cing // 'gro drug mgon dang dpal du
279a5(bstod tshogs): gyur pa po// mya ngan med mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos sgra chen pos pha rol rgol ba 'joms// rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i sku mnga' zhing // 'gro ba'i dug gsum ma lus sel mdzad pa// chos
279a6(bstod tshogs): bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi blo gros gting dpag dka' ba'i tshul// rnam dag chos kyi dbyings las rol mdzad cing // shes bya ma lus mngon sum gzigs pa po//
279a7(bstod tshogs): chos blo mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i nad gso mdzad pa sman pa'i mchog/ bai DUr+ya ltar dang pa'i sku mnga' zhing // sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba sgrol mdzad pa// sman pa'i rgyal po de la phyag
279a8(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// thugs rjes kun la snyoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das// mtshan tsam thos pas ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal sel// dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla// bai DUr+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo//
279b1(bstod tshogs): nyi ma lta bur ma rig mun pa sel// zla ba lta bur nyon mongs gdung ba sel// dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla// bai DUr+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mi'i ston pa sman pa'i rgyal po ste/
279b2(bstod tshogs): bcom ldan 'jig rten gsum la skyabs mdzad pa// dag gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyiH// bin+du byA'i 'di la sdug 'tshal lo// khyod ni 'jig rten gsum gyi snyan pa ste// 'dod chags ni snga ga te
279b3(bstod tshogs): mug rtsad nas gcod// sems can thams cad bde la rab tu 'god// bai DUr+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes spyan gyis 'gro ba kun la gzigs// thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba kun la khyab//
279b4(bstod tshogs): dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla// bai DUr+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan 'dus la sogs// 'byung ba bzhi po 'khrugs par gyur pa la// nad kyi gnyen por phyag g.yas aru
279b5(bstod tshogs): ra// sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sku mdog mthing ga ut+pal sngon po 'dra// phyag g.yon bdud rtsi sman gyi lhub bzed bsnams// dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla// bai DUr+ya yi 'od
279b6(bstod tshogs): la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa rgya mtsho dag ni gzhir spangs nas// yon tan rgya mtsho dag gis pha rol phyin// thams cad mkhyen pa lha yi lhar gyur pa// bai DUr+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// smon lam rgya chen yongs
279b7(bstod tshogs): su dag gyur pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gzhan don mdzad// dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla// bai DUr+ya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs mkhas thugs rjes shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs zhing / gzhan
279b8(bstod tshogs): gyis mi thub bdud kyi dpung 'joms pa// gser gyis lhun po lta bur mdzes pa'i sku// shAkya'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la bstod pa slob dpon zhi ba tshos mdzad pa rdzogs so//
280a1(bstod tshogs): rab tu sa bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ su pra b+ha ta pra b+ha ta sto tra/ bod skad du/ rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo//
280a2(bstod tshogs): lha yi tshogs dang grub pa dri za'i gtso dang sdom brtson dbang rnams kyis// bstod tshig sna tshogs dag gis lha yul sa steng rnams su bstod mod kyi// bdag kyang ji ltar nub pas 'phags pa rdzogs pa'i sangs
280a3(bstod tshogs): rgyas bstod bgyi ste// nam mkha' la ni mkha' lding 'phur zhes bud pa rnams ni cis mi 'phur// mi mthun phyogs spangs gyur pa lus pa med pa'i skyon ni zad gyur la// btso ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma rgyas pa lta/
280a4(bstod tshogs): buMr yangs pa'i spyan// dpal ldan mdzes pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'o// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar na ma langs pa'o// bdud kyi dpung las rnam
280a5(bstod tshogs): par rgyal ba nyam nga lam na gcod mdzad pa// sa gsum phan par mdzad pa 'khri shing dra ba gsum la dral mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bde ba rtsol bar mdzad pa mi shis ri bo 'jig mdzad pa// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag
280a6(bstod tshogs): tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o// // gang zhig lha min mi dang lha rnams kyi yang sngon du bde ba'i gnas thob pa// ma lus pa'i sa'i khams su 'jig rten gcig bsdus dbyangs gsang mthon po
280a7(bstod tshogs): sgrogs// shed las skyed pa bsgo byed rang byung pad+ma'i skye gnas can ni gnyid log gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o// shar gyi ri'i rtse'i ngos la gnas shing dmar po'i 'od
280a8(bstod tshogs): kyis gnang non pa// mun pa'i tshogs rnams 'joms par byed par skye dgu rnams kyi mig gcig tu// nyi ma de yang myos pas 'phyin cing rnam pa kun tu gnyid log gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu
280b1(bstod tshogs): rab tu snga bar sad pa'o// glang po che ltar dkar bsil bsil ba'i zer can ri bong mtshan// mtshan mo'i thig le lta bur mdzes pa kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu gang // dman pa'i mdangs dang bral ba des
280b2(bstod tshogs): nirnam pa kun tu gnyid log gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o// rab mchog lag pa bzhi pa bcu drug phyed phyid phyogs kyi gdong pa can// bzlas dang nyes pa'i cho ga
280b3(bstod tshogs): shes shing nges brjod rig byed 'don pa po// dri med pad+ma'i skye gnas tshangs pa de yang rab tu gzhid log gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu sgru bar smad pa'o// gangs kyi ri bo'i rtse laganas
280b4(bstod tshogs): shing sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang // grong khyer sum brtsegs sreg par nus gang stag gi pags pa'i gos gyon pa// rtse gsum can dreg ri mchog bu mo dang ni lhan cig gnyid log gyur//
280b5(bstod tshogs): stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o// 'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na thogs shing lha min rnams kyis thub dka' ba// lha yi gtso bo bde sogs bdag po rmongs pa'i bsam pas rnam par
280b6(bstod tshogs): 'khor// mtshan mo min dang mtshan mo gnyid log 'dod pa'i 'dam du nges par bying // stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar sngo pad+ma ltar dkar yangs pa'i
280b7(bstod tshogs): mig/ lha min gtso bo thams cad bcom gyur thams cad byed pa sna tshogs gzugs// khyab 'jug kyang ni yun ringag nyid log mngal gyi gnas las thar ma gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar
280b8(bstod tshogs): nam langs pa'o// gang zhig ral pa ser skya'i tshogs bstan dmar po zangs mdog khrag gi mig/ phyugs bdag dga' ba'i dus su gcig du chags pa 'joms par nus pa po// 'dod pa'i lha yi
281a1(bstod tshogs): mda' sreg lus can me lha de yang gnyid log gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o// zla ba kha ba ku mu da mtshungs chang mthus mig ni dmar gyur la// 'dod pa
281a2(bstod tshogs): brtan sgra sgeg po zong bshol lag na 'dzin par brtson// stobs cani nin mgru'i 'phrul nas 'khyun cing 'di dgal bar gyur // stobs bcu mnga'abru khyod ni rtag tu rab tu sgru bar snad pa'o// klung chen gdong
281a3(bstod tshogs): can mche ba gtsigs pa rnam pa kun tu 'gegs byed pa// 'gram pa'i ngos gnyis myos chu rab 'bab nus pa sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs pa yi// tshogs kyi bdag po yang ni chang gi btung bas myos par gyur//
281a4(bstod tshogs): stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu sra bar sa pa'o// zar ma'i me tog ltar sngogang gi lag pa mchog nam drang thung thogs// pad+ma sa pa lta bu'i lus can gdong drug lha men khrung khrung bsad// mig gsum
281a5(bstod tshogs): ldan pa gzhon nu'i tshul can de yang gnyid 'thug log par gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o// zas la rab chags dman lus rtag par rnal 'byor rjes su dga' gyur pa/
281a6(bstod tshogs): gnod pa sna tshogs rnams dang ldan pa'i yi dgas lta bur tshig pa'i lus// zla dpung 'gro ba rnam bral gang yin gcer bu de rnams kyang gnyid log/ stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar bsad pa'o// bas
281a7(bstod tshogs): mtha'i gnas chen 'di na drang srong ngan spong aM gi ra sogs dang // kun tu rgyu sogs gnas 'jog rgyas pa grog mkhar ba dang dga' byed rnams// gzhon nu ma yi skye gnas chags shing rmongs pa de rnams kyang gnyid po// /
281a8(bstod tshogs): stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga par sad pa'o// gshin rje chu bdag lus ngan gnod sbyin 'dri dang lto 'phye'i dbang po dang // de bzhin 'jig rten skyong gzhan lha yul sa steng nam mkha' la gnas pa/
281b1(bstod tshogs): gzhon nu ma la rab chags zur gyi lha dang lha min rnams kyang gnyid log gyur// stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying gyur gti mug dra bas khebs pa'i lus//
281b2(bstod tshogs): rmub pa se ga sa shA rgyu ma pas/ 'i ba po namasu pa / bas parnam pa'i t+yA thas par
281b3(bstod tshogs): mi shes mtshan mo mun par sregs pa mal cha 'thun gyon cing // yul gyi sngas rten la ni rab 'brug gnyid log gyur pa'i tshe// dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dre log byed pa na// rtag pa nyid du gnyid
281b4(bstod tshogs): sad gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo// chu 'gram dag du ba lang rigs brgya rnams kyis chu 'thungs te// ngoms nas 'gro bar gyur na'ang chu la bri bar mngon pa med// de bzhin thub pa snyan dngags
281b5(bstod tshogs): mkhan brgyas yang dag bstod gyur kyang // yon tan rgya mtsho legs pa'i gter chen zad par gyur ma yin// rab tu nam nangs khyod gcig pu yi ye shes spyan phye gyur bstod pas// 'jig rten gsum
281b6(bstod tshogs): mgon rta bdun 'od kyis 'gro 'di rtag tu snang byas te// sna tshogs lam thob lam ngan las bzlog 'byor ldan dpal gyis byas pa dag/ dgos mod rang dgar bde blag dngos grub rnam pa kun tu spyod gyur
281b7(bstod tshogs): cig/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la// kha che'i rgyal po shrI ha ri sha de bas bstod pa rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta ma hA s+thAn tsi d+ya ban+da na ma sto ba
281b8(bstod tshogs): bod skad du/ gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bltams dang byang chub mnyam med chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor/
282a1(bstod tshogs): mchod rten thog mar 'jig rten gsum mchod dad ldan cho 'phrul chen po dang // gangs ri'i kha dog ltar gsal lha las babs pa'i gnas 'di dang // gang du bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa
282a2(bstod tshogs): de la spyi bos bdag phyag 'tshal// yangs can ba ra NA se byis pa gsod ri 'jigs rung bcings 'gram dang // mnyan yod dang ni byang chub shing drung ku sha'i grong mchog ser skya lum+bi ni// kau sham bi dang
282a3(bstod tshogs): mdzod 'thug mnyam pa'i grong mchog dga' skyong yul 'khor dang // stobs bcu ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spris phyag 'tshal// kha che dang ni nA yul la ba ya mun zhes dang // sa dgra la dang
282a4(bstod tshogs): oM Di sin+d+hu shing 'phel ba ga mang ba kha ko la// bal yul ka ma ru dang bum pa'i klong mchog kan tsi bzang po'i yul// stobs bcu ldan pa'i gdung bcas gzhan gang yin pa di la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal// ti se gangs
282a5(bstod tshogs): ri gangs can la gnas man+da ra dang ri rab rtse// klu gnas rnam rgyal nor sbyin gnas dang rig 'dzin grub pa'i gnas// tshangs dang khyab 'jug gnas dang phyugs bdag nyi ma zla ba'i gnas// stobs bcu
282a6(bstod tshogs): ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal// stobs bcu las byung rin chen snying can mchod rten brgyad po gdung bcas bum las grub// sol ba de bzhin rin chen mchod rten
282a7(bstod tshogs): gangs dang dngul 'dra rab mdzes pa// sa 'og sa steng lha yul rtser bzhugs mchod rten ji srid ma lus dang // sangs rgyas sku gzugs gang bzhugs de la nyin re bzhin du spyi bos phyag bya'o//
282a8(bstod tshogs): gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa// kha che'i rgyal po shri ha ri sha de bas yum gyi ched du mdzad pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rA dza shrI dz+nyA na mi dra dang / lo tsA ba khe'u brgad
282b1(bstod tshogs): yon tan dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// mang+ga laM// @#/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod paska' bang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// rgya gar skad du/ ta thA ga ta nA ma saM gI tI kal+li ka b+ha drA laM ka ra mA la nA ma/
282b2(bstod tshogs): bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad la gus pa'i gtsug gis phyag 'tshal lo// mdzes snang bskal par rnam par brgyan
282b3(bstod tshogs): zhing du// 'khor los sgyur rgyal yul 'khor srungs sras stong // sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rin po che// sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal pos bskal bzang 'dir// rgyal 'gyur lung bstan
282b4(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas stong dag dang // rdzus skyes mched gnyis la yang phyag 'tshal nas// rgyal kun yul rigs 'od dang yab yum sras// rim gro shes rab can mchog rdzu 'phrul can// 'dus
282b5(bstod tshogs): tshad tshe tshad bstan pa gnas pa'i tshad// sku gdung mchod rten tshul dang sems bskyed tshul// re re 'ang bco lnga bco lngas rgyas gsungs mod// 'dir ni gus pas mtshan tsam brjod par bya// bde
282b6(bstod tshogs): gshegs 'khor ba 'jigs dang gser thub dang // 'od srungs shAkya'i skyes mchog byams pa dang // seng ge rab gsol thub pa me tog dang // me tog gnyis pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo//
282b7(bstod tshogs): rgyu skar bzang dang ded dpon lag chen dang // stobs chen rgyu skar rgyal po rtsi sman dang // skam pa dang ni rtog dang 'od chen dang // grol ba'i phung po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad nyi ma'i
282b8(bstod tshogs): snying po dang // zla ba 'od 'phro 'od bzang mya ngan med// skar rgyal dang ni rab gsal phreng thogs dang // yon tan 'od la'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// don gzigs dang ni mar me mthu ldan dang //
283a1(bstod tshogs): sman pa dang ni nges pa mdzod spu dang // brtan ldan lha yi dpal dang gdul dka' dang // yon tan rgyal mtshan rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// sgra gcan tshogs ldan tshangs
283a2(bstod tshogs): dbyangs chug brgyan // tha~M ba ma na pa chen pa dang/ na rlom can mi bzhi sa pa// hUM chen rnams lags sa smra // da can ni pam rnamag
283a3(bstod tshogs): ye shes dgyes dang gzi chen tshangs pa dang // 'od dpag med dang klus byin brtan par gshegs// don yod mthong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// brtson 'grus byin dang bzang skyong dga' bo dang /
283a4(bstod tshogs): 'chi med sring+ga rgyal mtshan rgyal ba chos// mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po kha lo bskur// dgyes par gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// chu lha dang ni yon tan yan lag dang // spos kyi glang
283a5(bstod tshogs): po rnam gzigs 'brug sgra dang // legs sems yid bzang dri med zla ba dang // grags chen rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// gtsug na nor bu zag shul seng+ge'i stabs// ljon pa rnam
283a6(bstod tshogs): rgyal can dang shes rab brtsegs// legs gnas dang ni blo gros yan lag skyes// blo mtha' yas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs bzang dang ni mkhyen ldan 'od zer dang // brtul zhugs
283a7(bstod tshogs): brtan dang bkra shis bden pa'i tog/ pad+ma sred med bu dang lag bzang dang // ye shes 'byung gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan 'od 'phro tshangs byin rin 'byung gnas// lha yi me tog dang
283a8(bstod tshogs): ni don legs sems// chos kyi dbang phyug blo gros spobs pa brtsegs// rdo rje rgyal mtshan phan bzhed phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par rol ldan mun bral sgra gcan lha// ri bo'i rgyal mtshan tshogs 'od
283b1(bstod tshogs): riren chen snying // shin tu mthor gshegs skad rgyal du rings dang // yon tan grags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ke zlani 'od skang mkhan se ne'i tog/ dus mkhyen rgyal po dpal snying srid
283b2(bstod tshogs): ga smra / ga gags ma ga ga/
283b3(bstod tshogs): 'os lha dang sgron chen dang // 'jig rten 'od dang spos drizhim po dang // yon tan mchog 'dzin mun bral phyag 'tshal lo// seng+ge'i 'gram dang rin chen grags ston ni// bdud rtsi 'chang dang mi'i
283b4(bstod tshogs): zla shin na gzigs// rab brgyan nor 'dra po brtsegs pa'i tog/ chos 'byung don des ldan la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// tshe byin rin chen 'byung gnas skye dbang mtshungs// skabs kyis gshegs
283b5(bstod tshogs): dang blo gnas gdugs mdzes dang // gtso bo shin tu 'phags pa dpal si s+tha// rnam par rol ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// glu 'od me tog dang klu rtaga' dang // spos kyi dbang phyug shin tu grags
283b6(bstod tshogs): skabs// yon tan 'phreng rgyan pa lag mig brgyan dang // legs par spangs pa'i grola'ang phyug 'tshal la// zil gad na mtha' lus sun dang bden pa gsung // ni pa'i 'ad dang des
283b7(bstod tshogs): mtha' las gzugs// rnam sna na chen tag dang tshomasas// 'jig rten 'das pa rnams pa phyag 'tshal la// dan yong rnam pa gtan dang rtog pa dzad dang // ba tig rgyal mtshan dbang rgyalag/
283b8(bstod tshogs): chen// don mdzad gzigs dang grags yas rin chen la// don mkhyen blo rdzogs rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// mya ngan mad dang dri bral tshangs lnga dang // sa dbang po tog spyan dang rnam 'bris su//
284a1(bstod tshogs): chos 'od kun gzigs yon tan 'od gsal dang // dri med zla ba'i zhal 'ang phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen 'od dang rin chen tog dang ni// grags pa'i bla ma 'od byed gzi
284a2(bstod tshogs): dpag med// dus mkhyen sang ge'i sgra dang mkhas dang // rdul dka' yon tan glang po phyag 'tshal lo// klu la ga dang mthun thob pa dang // mab+hUr+tha la mAtha ya m+b+ha zlab mas
284a3(bstod tshogs): don rnams thams cad gzigs dang dpa' bo dang // 'byor ldan bsod nams sgron ma phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan 'od 'phro blo ni yangs pa dang // legs skyes nor lha yid gnyis spong ba dang /
284a4(bstod tshogs): 'dzin pa dpag med mchog sred tshems med dang // mi gnas pa dang der gnas phyag 'tshal lo// tshogs chen gtso bo 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang // phal chen rgyal bu gzi brjid mtha' yas dang /
284a5(bstod tshogs): don blo sman pa'i rgyal po tha ba spangs// rims nad med dang legs byin phyag 'tshal lo// grags byin me tog byin dang skyes bus byin// rdo rje'i sde dang phal chen byin pa dang // zhi ba'i blo gros
284a6(bstod tshogs): spos glang sred med bu// des pa dang ni mi tshugs phyag 'tshal lo// ni zla glog gi tog dang mchod pa dang // dpal sbas dang ni ye shes nyi ma dang // don grub lhun po brtsegs dang dgra 'dul
284a7(bstod tshogs): dang // pad+ma dgra btsem grags la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes 'gro sa dang nyon mongs bral ba dang // 'dam bu dang ni spos bzang yul 'khor rangs// lha grags srid zla gzigs dang zla ba
284a8(bstod tshogs): dang // skrag can rin chenathal phyag 'tshal lo// ngan chen rgyal mcha na dang ni bsam gtand kyis// rdzogs ldan rnam ngas yon tan na can dang // dgra ba tsam grags pa pa dngos mdzo
284b1(bstod tshogs): ldan// spobs grags rdo rje nor bu phyag 'tshal lo// tshe dpag med dang nor bu bkod pa dang // dbang chen yon tan 'byung gnas lhun po grags// 'od zer bcu pa ma smad glang po'i 'gros// yid zla/
284b2(bstod tshogs): rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshal lo// zhi ba rab gsal rgyal po kha lo bsgyur// dga' ba'i dbang phyug gtsug na rin po che// bsnyungs bral rin chen snying po zla ba'i zhal// dri ma med grags zhi brjid phyag 'tshal la//
284b3(bstod tshogs): dga' rtog sgra gcan lha dang na tshod bzang // lha dga' rin chen phung po mdzes par gshegs// seng+ge'i phyogs pa shin tu mthor gshegs dang // skyes dbang blo gros bzang po phyag 'tshal lo//
284b4(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten 'od dang rin chen gzi brjid dang // skal ldan shing rta kun rgyal dga' ba bkod// stegs mdzad dang ni spos glang blo 'od 'phro// ri bo'i rgyal mtshan spos bzang phyag 'tshal lo// chos
284b5(bstod tshogs): bstan dang ni gzi brjid drag shul can// chos kyi nor bu bzang sbyin bde gshegs zla// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang seng+ge zla ba dpal// legs skyes thub med tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo//
284b6(bstod tshogs): grags pa bshes gnyen dang ni bden pa dang // dka' thub chen po lhun po'i 'od zer dang // yon tan brtsegs pa mchod grags chos grags dang // sbyin 'od glog 'byin bden gsung phyag
284b7(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo// 'tsho byed na tshed bzang po legs tshogs can// rnam nges blo gros srid mtha' nor bu'i spos// rgyal dgyes seng+ge'i 'od zer rnam snang mdzad// grags mchog thugs rang gzhung la'ang
284b8(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// nor bu zla ba drag shul 'od zer dang // brtul zhugs thung med 'gros mchod nor bu'i tshogs// 'jig rten bla ma glang seng zla ba dang // rin 'od sgra gcan sbed la'ang phyag 'tshal lo//
285a1(bstod tshogs): yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer ldan pa dang // rab tu zhi stabs 'jig rten bzang po dang // mya ngan med pa shugs bcu stobs dgyes dang // mthu pal mthu thob mthu chen phyag 'tshal lo//
285a2(bstod tshogs): yon tan snying po bden par spyod pa dang // dge mchog rgyal po dkar rgyal 'od zer che// klog 'od yon tan rgya chen rin po che// dpal 'od drang na bdud 'dul phyag 'tshal lo// go bgos seng+ge'i
285a3(bstod tshogs): phyag dang me tog bzang // rin chen mthon po dang ni rgya mtsho dang // sa 'dzin don blo mnga' ba yon tan bsags// yon tan tshogs dang rin me phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten zla
285a4(bstod tshogs): ba dang // dbyangs snyan tshangs pa'i rtog dang tshogs can gtso// seng ge'i stabs dang drag shul byin pa dang // chos dbang gzi 'od 'od chen phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen grags pa tshogs
285a5(bstod tshogs): gsal grags mtha' yas// 'od gzer don ldan lha yi drang srong dang // skye dbang dge 'dun brtan dang phyogs bzang dang // tog dang yul 'khor me tog phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi blo gros rlung
285a6(bstod tshogs): gi shugs ltar gshegs// legs bsam grags pa snang ldan lha tshogs dang // yon tan srung don blo gros bsnyengs pa med// grogs brtan 'od gnas mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// nor zhabs thar
285a7(bstod tshogs): pa'i gzi brjid ngos bzang dang // blo yangs kun tu gzi brjid ye shes mchog/ tshangs par gnas dang bden pa gsung ba dang // blo bzang dang ni stobs byin phyag 'tshal lo// seng skyabs me tog tog
285a8(bstod tshogs): dang shes 'byung gnas// me tog byin dang yon tan snying po dang // rin chen grags pa grags pa rmad byung dang // mi tshugs bsnyengs med nyi 'od phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs gshegs lha yi mthu
285b1(bstod tshogs): rdul ye shes dgyes// lha bden nor bu'i snying po yon tan grags// ye shes dpal dang bcings med brtul zhugs brtan// lha yi gzi byin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs thub dal bzhud brtul
285b2(bstod tshogs): zhugs dka' thub dang // 'od gzer phung po dang ni gzi brjid che// tsam pa ka dang dga' mdzad tshogs can bzang // dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dgyes chen phyag 'tshal lo// sna ma'i me tog 'od dang tshogs can
285b3(bstod tshogs): 'od// spun mdzad mdangs 'gro don legs nges pa dang // khyu mchog dang ni lag bzang 'od zer che// bsam sbyin bsod nams 'od la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// rin chen dbyangs dang rdo rje'i sde dang ni// 'byor ldan
285b4(bstod tshogs): seng+ge'i stobs dang dri med spyan// 'od srungs dang ni blogs la ye shes 'gros// gzi brjid drag shul 'od chen phyag 'tshal lo// nyi ma'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i 'od// gzi brjid rnam 'byes khengs med sbrang dri'i zhal//
285b5(bstod tshogs): zla 'od glog 'byin rabazhir gshegs pa dang // mi 'khrugs dgra bcom grags la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi yon tan zhing bzang bkod rgyal po// mngon par 'phags dang sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang // pad dpal
285b6(bstod tshogs): rin chen bkod dang shin tu bzang // rin chen mchog dang thugs gzhungs phyag 'tshal lo// rgya mtshos byin dang tshang rtog zla ba'i gdugs// 'od 'phro dri med rgyal po ye shes grags// kun rgyal yon tan 'od
285b7(bstod tshogs): dang sgra grags dang // zla rgyas rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo'i 'od zer brtul zhugs bzang po dang // sgron rgyal glog gi 'od dang 'od zer rgyal// skar mkhan grags rdzogs pad+ma'i snying po dang /
285b8(bstod tshogs): rgyal dang spun mdzes rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// rnyog pa med don dang ni drag shul sde// bsod nams gzi brjid mthu rdul thogs med blo// sgra gcan lha dang shes pu kha lo skur// skyes mtshungs me tog
286a1(bstod tshogs): tog la phyag 'tshal lo// sgra gcan 'dzin dang sman chen chu skar rgyal// sman rgyal bsod nams glang po mchod mdzad dang // rnam grags rgyal po nyi ma'i 'od zer dang // chos mdzod blo gros
286a2(bstod tshogs): bzang po phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan dbang mtshungs dang ni rdo rje'i ste// shes rab brtsegs pa legs gnas blo dbyangs dang // tshangs dbyangs yon tan mchog dang 'brug sgra dang // mngon shes tog
286a3(bstod tshogs): dang tog 'od phyag 'tshal lo// dge ba tshangs pa skyes mchog spyan sdug pa// klus byin bden pa'i tog dang brgyan pa dang // zhum pa med pa'i dbyangs dang rin chen 'od// dbyangs byin rnams la gus pas
286a4(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// sen+de dang ni 'od zer sna tshogs dang // yi shes dpa' bo pad brang me tog rgyal// mthu stobs bsod nams phung po gzugs mchog dang // sang mkhan zla ba smon ma byug 'tshal la/
286a5(bstod tshogs): gzi brjid phung po byang chub rgyal po dang // ma zad mngon rtogs spyan dang yan lag rgyas// yul 'khor shes rab mchog ma gzi tshim mdzad// shes byin mgon po 'jam dbyangs phyag 'tshal lo// chags pa med
286a6(bstod tshogs): pa'i mdzod dang gtso bos byin// gtso chen ye shes mthu rtsal 'od 'phro can// dbang po dang ni shugs 'chang dkar rgyal dang // 'od bzang grags pa byin la phyag 'tshal lo// gzugs bzang dang ni rgyal po
286a7(bstod tshogs): don grub dang // seng+ge'i sde zhes bya dang nor lha'i bu// grags pa rgyal ba rgya chen snying po dang // bsod nams 'od zer spang 'don phyag 'tshal lo// sgron ma'i rgyal po dang ni ye shes brtsegs/
286a8(bstod tshogs): lha mchod sa bdag grol brnyes gtsug gi gser// sgra gcan bzang po thub dka' thub gsal dang // zla ba'i 'od zer rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// gser 'od legs byin lha yi yon tan dbang /
286b1(bstod tshogs): chos gdugs bsod nams lag dang chags shed dang // ye shes gya nom blo gros zhib mo// gzi byin thams cad rtsi sman phyag 'tshal lo// rnam grol tog dang 'od mdzad ye shes rgyal// 'jigs
286b2(bstod tshogs): mdzad chu bo spong dang thogs med grags// bden pa'i phung po dbyangs snyan ri dbang mtshungs// chos brtsegs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// thar pa'i gzi brjid legs mdzad rabazhi'i sku// yid 'od
286b3(bstod tshogs): gsung dang blo dbyangs chu yi lha// 'gros mchod seng logs chos kyi mthu rtsal dang // bskal bzang rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'khrugs mdog dang gzi brjid rgyal po dang // rtogs mdzad spyan
286b4(bstod tshogs): legs pan la gnas pa'i rtse// snang pa'i 'ad zer skabs ga san dag 'a zhugs// dan ya gshegs dang thab cos byuga'atsha // gzugs mtshag legs shegs ba sbyi grags pad/
286b5(bstod tshogs): 'od gtsang lha yi nyi ma shes rab byin// mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid gzi mdangs dang // rgyal rigs skal ldan shing rta phyag 'tshal lo// gser mchog rnam grol gtsug dang chos ldan dang /
286b6(bstod tshogs): spos gnas dregs pa spangs dang ye shes mdzod// tshangs par gshegs dang tsan dan mya ngan med// seng+ge'i 'od zer rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yul 'khor rtog dang bad snying gzi mtha' yas// lha 'od shes
286b7(bstod tshogs): rab me tog mkhas pa dang // ye shes 'byor ldan dang ni tshangs pa'i dbyig/ phyag na rin chen dbang phyug phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs par gsungs dang mchod gsung mchod 'os dang // skar rgyal nyi ma dang ni
286b8(bstod tshogs): 'dam las rgal// ye shes brnyes dang grub pa rma bya dang // chos byin rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// phan par bzhed dang ye shes ldan grags pa// 'od zer dra ba dang ni rnam par bcom// bai DUr+ya snying
287a1(bstod tshogs): me tog lha rgyal po// zla ba dang ni dran 'od phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'od yon tan mchog 'od rin chen dpal// skyes bu zla ba dgra can bdud rtsi'i 'od// 'jig rten mchog dang
287a2(bstod tshogs): skar 'od zhi ba'i stabs// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ri dbang rabazhi yon tan mthu stobs dang // lha dbang dang ni dbyangs snyan nges bzang dang // don gnas yon brjid mkhyen ldan zla med
287a3(bstod tshogs): dang // nga ro dpag med rgyal ba phyag 'tshal lo// 'od bzang thugs gzhungs don dgongs gti mug bral// dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags mchog mdzes gshegs// zhi don skyon med blo bzang dge ba dang /
287a4(bstod tshogs): ba ma 'dag zeng bzang ba phrag 'tshal la// skabs pa'i mdag deng grags pasang chags dbang dang // bsangs thal legs pags pa slobs pa'i rgyan// thamachog rngub chen lda dang / ba
287a5(bstod tshogs): med rnams la gras pas phyag 'tshal la// gzugs pa che dang changs dbyang sa dbyangs bzang dang / shes rab tshe grags thugs thame dang // dang 'khrugs kyang chub zlags sbyin gang bayang // gdangs
287a6(bstod tshogs): snyan bsod nams stobs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// mthu dpal 'phags pa dgyes dang mthu stobs dang // skar ma dgyes dang sprin sgra spyan sdug zhal// ye shes bzang ldan 'byor ldan yon tan phung // gsal ba
287a7(bstod tshogs): rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes nga ro dang // nam mkha' mchod si nang ro shes bkod dang // yon 'od gzi brjid drang srong dbang blo ldan// spobs tshogs mchod sbyin bzang
287a8(bstod tshogs): po phyag 'tshal lo// zla zhal shin tu gzigs dang rdul bral dang // yon tan tshogs dang tog ldan bsod rgyal mtshan// yul 'khor spobs pa rin chen rab sbyin dang // zla dgyes seng+ge'i stobs la'ang phyag 'tshal
287b1(bstod tshogs): lo// dbang sgyur rgyal po bdud rtsi gsal ba dang // bsam gtan bsnyoms dang 'khrug med dri ma zhi// phyogs ma bslad dang mdzes pa zhal bzang dang // shugs gnas yi ldan gsung dbang phyug 'tshal lo//
287b2(bstod tshogs): gzi brjid chen po blo gros zab bdud rtsi// chos kyi stobs dang mchod ldan me tog 'od// khams gsum mchod gnas sgra gcan nyi ma'i 'od// lhas mchod thar pa'i rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo//
287b3(bstod tshogs): dge gtsug bdud rtsi'i 'od dang rdo rje dang // brtan pa rin chen phung po mdzes gshegs dang // nyi ltar gshegs dang dag 'od yon tan gtsug/ dpal rdzogs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo//
287b4(bstod tshogs): seng+ge'i stabs dang gyen 'phags me tog byin// 'od dgyes pad+ma dang ni ye shes dgyes// dkod mdzes gti mug med gnas rma med pa// tog gi rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// bde dgongs
287b5(bstod tshogs): gti mug med rgyal chog mkhyen// dag pa'i rgya mtsho rin chen mnga' mi mnga'// dga' mdzad rma bya'i nga ro ma zhu dang // sring sred dri ma spangs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// spyod pa'i stobs dang lha mang snyan
287b6(bstod tshogs): bsgrags dang // rin stabs phyag pad bsnams dpal dgra las rgyal// 'byor grags yul 'khor bzang dang me tog 'od// seng+ge'i nga ro rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba ltar shar 'joms pa'i mchog
287b7(bstod tshogs): mi g.yon// phan ldan gshegs dang bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal// dbyangs bskul gau ta ma mdangs kyi stobs// blo gnas rang bzhin zla bzang phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub yan lag me tog bkra
287b8(bstod tshogs): shis dang // legs ston ye shes gzi stobs dge ba'i smon// mthu rtsal brtan po lha skar bzhi dang // nyi zhal thar pa'i brtul zhugs phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims 'od dang brtul zhugs gnas brtul
288a1(bstod tshogs): med// snying po 'phags dang mig dman 'phel bar mdzad// spos 'od dus mkhyen 'od dang dran pa'i dbang // thogs med rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub mchog
288a2(bstod tshogs): bgrod spyod gsal rin chen dgyes// chos dbang lha thams cad pa bshes gnyen tshe// gshes gnyen bzang po rab tu zhi ba'i skabs// bdud rtsi bdag po lhun 'od phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pas bstod
288a3(bstod tshogs): dang snang ldan gzi brjid 'bar// snang ba gzigs dang legs spyad rnam par smin// legs dgyes mya ngan bral dang rin chen 'od// spyod ldan stabs la 'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rgya
288a4(bstod tshogs): mtsha rmad byung nga rgyal spong // bdud brlag mdzad dang bag chags brgal ba'i skabs// mi phyed blo mang 'a rgya mtsho dag mdzad dang // tshigs can grol rgyal dga' 'od phyug 'tshal lo// byang rgyal lags
288a5(bstod tshogs): rin chen shin tu bsil// tshangs rgyal ye shes dgyes dang rdzu 'phrul tog/ skye dbang mtshungs dang sa yi dbang phyug dang // nyi dgyes dgra can zlab phyag 'tshal lo// me tog 'od dang sman bdag mdangs
288a6(bstod tshogs): mnga' dang // bsod nams dgyes dang dga' stobs dbyangs snyan dang // chos kyi dbang phyug tshangs dbyangs spyod bzang dang // 'khrul pa med pa'i bla la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// dbyangs chen snyan par grags
288a7(bstod tshogs): dang tog ldan dang // gzi brjid rnam grags 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang // ljon pa gti mug rab bzang dpag maud dang // zla bzang spobs yas tog la phyag 'tshal lo// brtul zhugs brtan dang mchod
288a8(bstod tshogs): gnas mya ngan brgal// dag dgyes 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs// zhabs mdzes ut+pal dul gnas me tog dang // spobs pa mtha' yas 'od zer phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong gsal ba yon
288b1(bstod tshogs): tan brtson 'grus snying // lha bdag rin chen mthon po gsal ba dang // skal ldan shing rta bsod nams blo gros dang // sbyin sreg 'od 'phro gzi phung phyag 'tshal lo// seng+ge'i stobs dang mi g.yo rab
288b2(bstod tshogs): gsal dang // 'od spyad gu dbyangs dang ni 'khor lo 'dzin// dbyings mchog 'jig rten dag dang chos zla dang // dge ba mtha' yas grags la phyag 'tshal lo// sprin tog shes rab 'gros dang spos
288b3(bstod tshogs): bzang dang // nam mkha'i dbyings dang lha dang lha rgyal dang // nor bu gsal dang nor bzang sgron ma dang // rin che na nga ro'i dbyangs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// skye dbang rgyal po sgra gcan sdod pa dang //
288b4(bstod tshogs): dge mdzad sang blo rin chen grags pa dang // don mdzad mdzad mtha' gzigs dang sred med tog/ mdzod spus spobs pa mtshungs med phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro seng mche ba//
288b5(bstod tshogs): mdzes gshegs bsod nams sgron ma bkra shis ldan// yul 'khor myang med blo gros sems blo ldan// chos sgron shin tu gzigs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo// shugs 'dor stobs chen shes rab me tog
288b6(bstod tshogs): dang // brtan pa'i dbyangs dang bde ldan don gsung dang // dgyes pa gsal ba seng+ge zhal gtsug phud// snang mdzad rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// bskal bzang 'dir byung sangs rgyas stong gi mtshan//
288b7(bstod tshogs): gang gis thos shing gus bcas sdig kun sreg/ rgyal ba kun mthong ngan song sdug bsngal spong // bzod ldan bde ba mchog brgyud myang 'das thob// byang chub sems dpa' mchog dga' rgyal po yi//
288b8(bstod tshogs): drin gyis legs bgos kha che paN chen gyis// sbyar 'di gzhan las don lngas khyad par 'phags// de ltar 'ang nyes tshul sdig kun so sor bshags// bdag gis mos blos 'bad pa cher byas pa'i//
289a1(bstod tshogs): dge ba 'di dang mtha' yas dge ba kun// 'gro ba kun sbyin kun kyang rgyal ba yis// kun tu rjes bzung kun mkhyen myur thob shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod
289a2(bstod tshogs): bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ rgyal ba'i sras po kha che paN chen gyis sbyar ba rdzogs so// @#// bya shAn panas rgya thags / rgya gar skad du/ yo ga tsa tu rdewa
289a3(bstod tshogs): sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// stan mtshon seng ge'i khri stang na// su drang dgongs pa shin tu
289a4(bstod tshogs): bzhag/ rdo rje skyil krung der bzhugs nas// gang du zhing 'dzin yongs 'dra ba'i// tir 'dzin rgyal po zhes bgyil// mnyam par bzhag cer dgangs mkhyen pa'i// de bzhengs 'phrul gyi spyan gyis ni//
289a5(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas zhing gzigs khyod la 'dud// su gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis nas// 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig ni// brgya stong drug cu drug cu ni// 'byin pa'i sku de la phyag 'tshal// mi mjed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
289a6(bstod tshogs): dra// 'od kyi snang bas khyab byed pa// 'od des reg pa'i sems can rnams// rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges gyur pa'i// 'gro ba 'dren la phyag 'tshal lo// ba spu'i 'od dang rang bzhin 'od// mi mjed phyogs
289a7(bstod tshogs): bcu'i 'jig rten du// 'od kyi snang bas khyab byed pa// 'od des reg pa'i sems can rnams// rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges gyur pa// 'gro mgon shAkya seng ge 'dud// ljags 'od bye ba khrag khrig ni/
289a8(bstod tshogs): brgya stong rtse las pad 'dab stong // de steng bde gshegs thugs mnga' bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i zhing du gshegs byon cing // pha rol phyin drug chos ston mdzad// chos thos sems can byang chub nges/
289b1(bstod tshogs): 'gro mgon sprul pa'i sku la bstod// seng+ge rnam grol ting 'dzin gyis// g.yo ldegs ltas chen bco brgyad kyis// mi mjed phyogs bcu'i ngan song kun// rgun chad lha mi'i skal mnyam byas// tshe rabs dran
289b2(bstod tshogs): zhing sangs rgyas 'dud// ngan song skyob la phyag 'tshal 'dud// mi mjed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams// 'od kyis zil mnan lham me ni// lha der bzhugs pa'i sku la bstod// rang bzhin sku brtan
289b3(bstod tshogs): lha rnams kyis// mchod rdzas mchod de dbu steng du// byin gyis me tog khang brtsegs gyur// rang 'od mi mjed phyogs bcu'i zhing // kun snang sems can ma thob nas kyang // rang 'dun 'dug ste chos
289b4(bstod tshogs): ston snyam// sku gcig du mar snang la bstod// rang 'od phyogs bcu'i zhing khyab nas// sems can ji snyed 'khod pa yis// rang 'khor bcas pa snang byed pa'i// gser 'od shAkya seng ge 'dud//
289b5(bstod tshogs): gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab thob pa'i// stong nyid mtshan med spyod yul can// rdol med pa yi smon lam ldan// chos mnyam gzungs dang bzod rab thob// blo chen sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod//
289b6(bstod tshogs): thog med spobs ldan bstan pa ni// zad mi shes shing so so ni// yang dag rig pa khong du chud// mngon shes chen po rnam par rtse// mngon shes ma nyams phyag 'tshal bstod// mnyam pos tshig snyan la

289b8(bstod tshogs): 'jigs thob la phyag 'tshal bstod// zhum med bdud kyi las las 'das// las dang nyon mongs phyir rgol bcom// phas kyi rgol bas zil mi non// nyan thos rang rgyal rtogs dka' ba// las sgrib

290a3(bstod tshogs): mtha' yas par// bstan pa ye shes 'byung mkhas bstod// chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu dang // chu zla rmi lam sgra brnyan dang // mig yor nam mkha' dri za'i grong // sprul dang gzugs brnyan khong chud
290a4(bstod tshogs): pa'i// sems zhum med la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can sems rgyu shes pa pra// spyod mkhas khong chud byas la mkhas// sdang med bzod rlabs chos mnyam rtogs// chos zab ldan zhing gting
290a5(bstod tshogs): dpag dka'// sems chos dbang thob las nyon mongs// lha sgrib la sgrol phyag 'tshal bstod// rten pa rtogs pa bstan la mkhas// rten 'brel tshul mi zad shes zhugs// lha dang bag nyal kun sbyor
290a6(bstod tshogs): spangs// las dang nyon mongs zhi la mkhas// kun ldang bral la phyag 'tshal lo// bden pa rab rtogs ye shes mkhas// chos rnams sba brnyan lta bur mos// chos bstan tshad med 'jigs dang bral//
290a7(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid ji ltar khong chud mkhas// zhing khams rnams dgongs rmi la ma zin// grangs med sangs rgyas dran la bstod// sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'i 'gro mkhas// sangs rgyas dpag med gsol btab
290a8(bstod tshogs): mkhas// sems sna yongs bskyed nyon mongs ni la mkhas// ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon par sgrub// rnam rtse ye shes rtogs la bstod// bzang skyong rin chen 'byung la sogs// khyed kyi yon tan bsapa
290b1(bstod tshogs): par ni// mtha' yas brjod kyang mi lang ste// de sogs sems dpa'i tshogs la bstod// dgra bcom zag zad nyon mongs med// dbang gyur sems ni rnam par sgrol// shes rab shin tu rnam par
290b2(bstod tshogs): sgrol// cang shes glang chen bya ba byas// byed pa byas shing khur bor ba// rang gi don na rab thob pa// srid pa kun myong yongs su zad// yang dag pa yi bka' yis ni// sems ni shin tu rnam par grog//
290b3(bstod tshogs): sems dbang pha rol mchog thob pa'i// nyan thos dge slong tshogs la bstod// dge bsnyen pa dang dge bsnyen ma// chos mthong ba yi tshogs la bstod// chos su dkyil 'khor gyiHpa
290b4(bstod tshogs): bsod pa// smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin// ma skyes mi ngag gnam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yul la phyag 'tshal bstod//
290b5(bstod tshogs): stong pa bco brgyad chos kyi sdong po la// pha rol phyin bcu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// tshad med bzhi yi lo 'dab rgyas pa la// skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu so sor smin// sa bcu chos kyi skul
290b6(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo// zhing khams thams cad gser gyis gzhi la// rin chen rnam pa mang po gtsal du bkram// me tog bun+da ri ka char bzhin 'bab// yum gyur dge ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/
290b7(bstod tshogs): gnas med ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin// spros pa med cing snang ba med// khyod kyi thugs ni nam mkha' 'ang // nam mkha' mtha' dang dbus med pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid de// dus bsum
290b8(bstod tshogs): las ni shin tu 'das// dmigs med chos su phyag 'tshal brjod// tham pa sa skyem chos rgan pa sod// gtsug lag mchod rten rjes bsgrubs shing // phung byas bya gnapas daser mos mtshan/

291a3(bstod tshogs): smras pa sad// gag sa smras sogs sa nan rnaMs// rgyud yangs su rje drung baH// nga brgyad pa bsad// dge ba'i chags sa sa byu byas dus// zhabs gang mtha

291b6(bstod tshogs): sgrol bas zhal mnyam yin// seng ge'i seng ge'i 'gros bzhud bstod// glang po'i glang po'i 'gros bzhud bstod// ngang pa dang pa'i stabs bzhud bstod// khyung mchog khyung mchog 'gros bzhud

291b8(bstod tshogs): chos ston su rim gzhol la bstod// su gsung thugs gtsang su 'jam pa// rnam dag su mnga' sru rnam dag/ chos 'dral mdzes pas yo byad rdzogs// yon tan yangs bzang mu tshe mdzes/
292a1(bstod tshogs): mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' sku mnyam bstod// 'jam pa'i chos ston sku ni bzhon// mi zhum thugs mnga' sru zhum med// mi dge spangs pas sku rnam rgyal// 'byung zad sku mkhregs

294b4(bstod tshogs): las// sa ya phrag brgya'i 'gyur du gsungs// nyi ma gza' yis zin pa'i dus// bye ba phrag ni 'bum 'gyur dang // zla ba bye ba bdun 'gyur ro// dus chen bzhi la nyi zla zin/
294b5(bstod tshogs): de dag bsod nams khyad par 'phags// dus mchod chen po bzhi'i tshig le'ur byas pa kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shris mdzad pa rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta de ki dang sgra bskur gyi lo tsa ba
294b6(bstod tshogs): byams pa'i dpal gyi bskur ba'o// @#/ dpa rgya grub pa'i bstod pa bcub bzugs// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog gi byang chub rgyu ni
294b7(bstod tshogs): dang por bskyed pa las// 'gro la rnam par phan phyir 'chi med thar mdzad de// yang dag 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro bdud las rgyal ba can// rgyal ba shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o//
294b8(bstod tshogs): thub pa'i rgyal po dam pa gzhan gyi mgon po mchog/ gcig tu brtson pas tshangs pa mchog la nges gnas shing // so so'i blo can phal rgol lag ldan dbang por ni// ri dgas
295a1(bstod tshogs): bdag po shAkya thub la phyag bgyi'o// / thub pa mar me mdzad la sogs las mchog thob pas// 'bar ba'i rin chen dam pa zor cog la 'chang ba'i//
295a2(bstod tshogs): 'dzin ma'i bdag po tshangs dang rgas med kyis bstod pa// sdig spangs shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o// 2// thub pa rgya che'i 'od zer rgyan gyi yongs su bskor// me chu'i yangs pa
295a3(bstod tshogs): ngag dang rab rgyas gsal ba'i 'od// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yul la khyab par spro ba can// shAkya thub la ded bdag rab tu phyag bgyi'o// thub pa skyes mchog bden pa mchog tu
295a4(bstod tshogs): ston pa po// bstan las lha dang lha min mya ngan 'das bgyid pa'i// thabs mdzad pa la cho ga bzhin du mkhas pa ste// dge 'os shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o// thub pa'i dbus
295a5(bstod tshogs): su mngon dgyes thugs rjes gnas pa ste// ting 'dzin mchog gis 'dod dang drag po rnam rmongs shings// mchog gi bim+ba lta bu'i zhal spros phul dang ldan// dam pa shAkya thub la
295a6(bstod tshogs): rab tu phyag bgyi'o// thub pa'i chos 'dzin pa las nad dang rims 'phrog cing // zhabs zung dag la 'phrog byed gtsug rgyan gyis rab mtshan// zung 'jug ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu
295a7(bstod tshogs): bzhugs pa yi// mchog sbyin shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o// thub pa seng ge dam pa mi yi seng ge mchog/ tshangs pa mi brjed bdag pos mchod gyur gdugs
295a8(bstod tshogs): bsgreng zhing // nor 'dzin gtso mo'i re ba'i phyag gis mngon bdud pa// phyag 'os shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o// 8/ thub pa zhi byed rnams kyi gtsug gi bde
295b1(bstod tshogs): gshegs te/ bsus zhes pa spangs shing yon tan nu la gter/ mtha' dag \u0f7f/ sdug bsngal sel la ga ter mthA// sdig sal saHthab sa
295b2(bstod tshogs): daphyag bgyi'o// thub pa brtson pas 'gro/ ba'i don sgrub mdzad pa la// mkha' lding bdag zemagon de sa bur sems can rnams/ yang dag
295b3(bstod tshogs): 'dren ning pha rol bde bar mdzad pa yi// ston pa shAkya thub la rab tu phyag brtsi'o// dpal shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
295b4(bstod tshogs): 'dzin dpal dgas kyi rin po che'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa ste/ darin po rgya mtsha'i sras bsdur/
295b5(bstod tshogs): dasrid pa gsum gyi blam gnas skabs kun tu 'gro ba rnams la phan mdzad pa/ mkhas shi
295b6(bstod tshogs): gsal ba'i blo dang bsam gtan mngon shes thugs bsgom pa/ stobs bcu mnga' ba rnal 'byoradang ni mkhyen par ldan pa khyod 'dra las gzhan pa/
295b7(bstod tshogs): lngayul sa la yod mina'ajig rten 'dir min rnam thos bu yaM gnas na'ang med// legs spyad dam pa rmad byung gcig tu mdzes pa mi yi mig
295b8(bstod tshogs): mdzes rnams dang // bde bar gshegs pa dri med 'jig rten las 'das dge ba'i gsung dang mtshan rnams kyis// nye bar bsags pa'i spyan
296a1(bstod tshogs): gzi brjid 'phreng ba ldan pa khyod dang mtshungs pa ni// lnga yi pho brang gnas mchog dag na'ang med la phyogs dang phyogasamatshams
296a2(bstod tshogs): dag na'ang byed/ man cid pa chen du drug cing ma 'khrugs gnang gas me dang la rnams pa// thub bdag khyod ces na bkang pa brnal
296a3(bstod tshogs): khyod dang mtshungs pa ni// mang du 'di ci thub pa gang gis rnam dpyod bcas pas rdzogs med par// r-i dang nags su bcas pa'i nor 'dzin yangs pa kun tu
296a4(bstod tshogs): trAs kyang rnyed ma lags/ ni dang dul la dbyes shing yang dag gsung lha dbang phyag byas pa// rmugs dang zhe sdang par ga bral shing yang srid spangs
296a5(bstod tshogs): g+hur pa/ gdul bya'i bsams pa de bzhin 'jam zhing phan pa'i gtam gyis dga' mdzadapa/ skyes buSh+Ta mchog khyod dang 'dra ba'i dge slong
296a6(bstod tshogs): gzhan dag gal zhigade ltar stobs paHmnga' bskur rgyal bas+ho/ padz+ra bzhin bdag gis kya/ nyid dang ba rjes rjer 'ab
296a7(bstod tshogs): pa'i blo gros las ni rang gi brtson 'grus kyi/ patsho chen po rol sor/ khyad kyang parloganon pa rgya che bas/ 'gro ba ma tshang med pa'i stob pa
296a8(bstod tshogs): de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo nyid gyur cig/ 'di slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// rgya pe las bod kyi skad dun la lo tsabs bskur ba'o// man laM/
